summary: Create & share photos, stories, & reels with friends you love

scraped_reviews.content:
Got a new phone and cant log in to my account that I've had for YEARS with 
the password and email address that have literally NEVER changed. It just 
keeps saying that it's a suspicious log in attempt..... so you're telling 
me that you can only log in from one device ever? Even with the correct 
information? What a joke. Also, I've contacted support multiple times in 
the past few days with no response. Uninstalled.

First, they took down my account for sharing content that's not allowed ( I never share anything ). To make an appeal, I have to give my number, which somehow they can't find. There is no other option to reactivate my account and this has happened to a few other friends too, so it really is the app being dumb. If anyone else has this problem, just hit the 1 star review so they can't take them out of Play store :)

It's 1/1/25 today, & I'm still posting stuff from my Euro trip in August, because the app crashes just as I'm about to post. 5-10 tries for it to finally go through, & the result is disappointing. I choose mixed orientations, & somehow pictures come out cropped in nonsensical ways on my feed. Some are blurry, when they shouldn't be. Stories are a wild card. Some zoomed in, some not, and no matter what I do, they don't pop up in chronological order. Forced to fix it manually. WHAT IS GOING ON?

The new update is so buggy. Let's say I am going to post 5 photos, and I select to zoom them out so they aren't so close to my face. I can only zoom out one, and if I select more than 1 photo, it unzooms all of them. It has never done this before. The comments and notifications are weird as well. They glitch out, and when I go to click on the notification in the app, it doesn't let me, or it takes multiple times for it to work and bring me to where I need to be. Hope they fix this soon.

Today, I've been having problems with Instagram. I uninstalled it, reinstalled it, and cleared the data, but now the post page won't show up and it's been black for the longest time. I can't even look at my chats either because it's so messed up, and nothing has been said about the servers being down except for Down Detector. And nothing has been done to fix the errors especially if I'm paying you guys Fix this!

Still plenty of bugs but maybe improved? If you don't have service when you upload a story it will upload when you get back into service... But not for everything. It seems like local storage does post to the story after losing and gaining connection, but videos taken within the app will just fail to upload over and over and over again. It doesn't matter how many times you press retry it just never works. In turn, stories you thought would be posted end up not posting, and there's no way to fix.

if you send someone a link to a post now, it will have your profile attached to it, even if it wasn't your post. they get a popup with whatever account you were logged in to prompting them to follow it. instagram made this change without any notification. details of your profile should not be attached when you copy / paste a link to a post that wasn't even yours, especially when you have all options to make your account visible to contacts / searchable by email disabled.

Permanently disabled my account that I only use for texting for no reason. Tried to appeal, got denied less than 20 minutes later. I don't post anything and that's been the only account I've used for years, whatever new system they have in place for reviewing reports, appeals, and anything in that nature clearly isn't working :/ Side note: I cant log into any other acc or make a new one either on the app or on my computer, I had to download an entirely different browser for it to finally work..

Every post, just photos or not, shows up in the form of a reel. This is especially annoying when wanting to just look at photos on the explore page. As well as when watching reels in the reels tab, pictures come up. This isn't the content I want to see. It makes the user experience more frustrating. Bring back posts.

Still can see. gif option. While creating a post, Instagram is adding audio music (first on the list and no way to delete it), so I can't post! We can't see comments that we're trying to post (they're hidden at the bottom of the screen) or .gif option for posts. The text for stories is out of control. We can't see or reposition the story text before we share the story and can't move labels either.

I suddenly can't comment on any post in one of my accounts. The others are fine though. It says I am unrestricted but when I try to comment, it says that "some comments are restricted" are refuses to post my response. I'm told to let them know if I think it's done in error but there's no link. I've tried going through the help section and get zero response. This has been going on for a week. I even tried being inactive for 48 hours without any effect. Very frustrating. Feels personal.

my account got compromised for no reason and I got locked out and I still can't get into it. The same thing almost just happened to my new account for no reason. And now I've been logged out of the account I changed the password on. Random restrictions were put on my account. I can't like, comment, follow or unfollow for 7 days for literally no reason. What is going on?? Edit: it isn't letting me open the chat menu. I've tried updating, resetting, and nothing works.

This app used to bring people together based on friend circles and similar interests. Now, it doesn't connect anything except ad dollars to meta's pockets. The result is a lifeless platform full of bots and ai photos where you can't seem to find any other real person. It's almost like the algorithms prefer you to feel like you're the only real person on there... I just miss the days where I could document my hobby, discover others, and be discovered by other real people.

Used to be my favorite social media, but now it's just annoying. My biggest gripe is that searching hashtags is pointless now. It won't let you organize the posts that show up chronologically let alone show all posts that use it. What is the point of having them anymore??? Floating bubbles of what friends like is annoying and gets in the way. They constantly change where buttons are. It's become a hassle to use and not enjoyable. Also, there's more ads than posts from accounts I follow.

With this most recent update (night of 10/28/25) I can't get into messages from the app. When I have a notification about a message I can click the notification pop-up but then that's the only thread I can read messages on, when going back it takes me to homefeed. Why do you constantly feel the need to change the location of the messages button? Top right, bottom middle and go back and forth with each update! PLEASE!!!

The app has gotten increasingly worse over the last few years. They keep removing useful features, like searching by 'recent' or just photos. Everything feels algorithm controlled, even my feed which constantly shows me posts from accounts that I don't even follow. They've tried to make it both like tiktok, with the shorts, and tumblr, with the reblogs, and somehow it's still worse at both. The app is overrun with videos, when it used to be a really nice photo sharing platform.

"Create & share photos, stories, & reels with friends you love" is such a lie at this point. If you scroll past ten posts on your feed, three will be people you know and follow, three will be "suggested content", and the other four will be ads. Every new update makes it harder to see posts from my friends, and the options they have to see more from your friends are hidden and time-limited (like "snoozing" suggested posts instead of turning off). It's well beyond out of hand.

It's nearly impossible to create a post. You can't save a draft, if you exit you lose all progress, the scroll bar fir photos is positioned just so you grab it and lose your place when selecting photos, since you can't post from your computer the screen is way too small to see everything you need. I've had to remake posts several times now and I'm about done with this app.

Half the features don't work anymore, it's honestly pathetic. I can't even sign in on other accounts because it goes through a never ending loophole of sending verification codes to your email, and crashes when you actually enter the code. Also when you try to follow someone, it doesn't work. When you press literally any button it doesn't do anything most of the time, and I un-installed and re-installed to see if that would help and it made everything worse. This app is so bootycheeks

See more adds than posts! In the past few weeks I've noticed that for every post of my friends I see 3+ adds before I see another friends post. I guess that's what happens when you poorly monetize your app. Meta also stripped the ability to "open in chrome" so now you can't open links in ANY external browser. Why can't companies just leave things alone! If it ain't broke then stop trying to fix it!!!

When trying to upload a Mixed ratio photos, the post blows up/zooms in my landscape/horizontal pictures when uploading. I noticed it the new updated version that gives this problem (when other iOS users view the post it's properly displayed, but not for my phone). Frustrating because I have to either view my post on the web browser or see if others are viewing my post correctly.

I'm not a frequent user of Instagram, but I like to use it on occasion. However, I haven't been able to for a while, because I haven't been able to log into my account in almost a month of trying. I've tried my email, username, and tried different passwords, one of which I was almost positive would work, and tried resetting my password. Nothing works. In my experience, this has also happened on desktop. Completely unusable if I'm unable to access my accout or even make a new one!

It's fun but there's almost always some bug or issue. Right now if I watch reels for any longer than 15 minutes they stop working and freeze about halfway through each reel, no matter what wifi or network I'm using. Also can't use DMs. Every time I click DMs they just won't open, like I can't even read what my friends are sending and I also can't see who's sending it. I've restarted my phone, deleted and reinstalled, logged out and back in, closed the app and opened it again, nothing is helping

The last update is the worst! nothing works! cant check messages. cleared cache. filters not working when making a reel. and now I cant adjust the music to a reel I want to make. fix it! we need an update asap! risked losing all my drafts because I thought uninstalling would fix the problem. nope! it actually is even worst where I cant even add music to a reel now. filters still not working. and when I did just upload a reel, it somehow made my video 2x longer by doing it twice in one video!

Great communities, terrible app. Constantly loses connection for no reason, isn't at all reliable for messaging, posting, or saving anything. I constantly save videos, reels, and posts only for them to never be found. I got it reinstalled after upgrading to Pixel 10, and for some reason, the UI interface of the previous update returned AFTER updating it, and none of the interface functions. Can't. go to messages. Can't access my For You page. It's just a husk of pictures with no function.

Way too many ads. Double ads. No longer have the option to "hide all ads from xxxx". Ads while browsing someone's page. I use it much less than I used to. Update 10/26: the new layout sucks. I don't want a reels button. I also didn't want my notifications and messages buttons to be swapped. who l What kind of simpleton thinks of this and who approves it? Also my comment replies don't nest under the original comment anymore, they get added to the main comment section

The Instagram app isn't working. My account is there, but the app is not working. I'm wondering if anyone else is having this issue? My hubby's app seems fine. But I have read others that are having the same issue. I have restarted my phone and cleared cache. It's still the same. I get notifications, and I would go an open it, but that's it. It'll close out as soon as I try to go home page.

Lately, for about the last month or so, reels haven't been opening in messages and some of the ones that do open are in a foreign language. I have checked my settings, I've uninstalled/reinstalled the app, I have cleared the cache. I have even reported the bug to IG and nothing has changed. Whatever updates they've done has made the app fail miserably. I wish they'd get it fixed.

About a decade ago this was my most used app. I was part of multiple communities, learned a ton (hobbies/work), and kept up with friends/family. But everything good about this app has been ruined. The algorithm doesn't show anyone my posts (or me what I want), I constantly get notifications that I don't want and have "turned off" many times, and now I can't even scroll back in group messages to see what people are talking about. It's really sad how the company completely ruined a good thing!

It feels like the program is being updated by recent graduates with no experience. Buttons are being placed in the most inconvenient places. I want to share a reel with my friends, so I click, select my friends, and automatically click where the send button should be, but some idiot decided that it would be better to put a group creation button in that place! Is it really true that people are so insane that they can't just shove other buttons into places that people are used to???

having problems posting a collection of my photos. Can't ajust or crop, can't edit lighting, saturation, or anything for that matter. I can barely even use the app for its intended purpose anymore, and even if I just try to post straight from my camera roll with no adjustments, I get a notification on my screen that says "unable to save image" I cant even post from my drafts. Please fix these issues.

Completely unacceptable Instagram has been around this long and still has stupid bugs. I go to take a picture on my story and it automatically turns on night mode so I have to wait 2 minutes for the photo to process. Not only that, for the past 10 months I've had a bug where the "save story to gallery" has been turning on automatically. I am left with no choice but to leave a negative review.

I think the app is Great , but I also think they should add more settings like an option to hide the stories from the feed , adding a background photo to your Instagram page , choose fonts for your Biography , and the option show your feed in chronological order or not. Ohh and it also be cool if I could slide to the right and left to go to my feed , search , add a photo and look at my Instagram. This would be awesome!

It has been one month since my account was wrongfully suspended. I immediately submitted an appeal, and I still have heard nothing. The app said it would take "just over a day" to review. Instagram has no customer support, no one who I can contact about this. I am left to sit and wait, without any guarantee that my account will be unsuspended. I have used my account for nearly 10 years to connect with friends and peers, and now it is just inaccessible. I have never had any issues before this.

Instagram is probably my favorite social media platform to use. However the app has a problem. When I recently changed a password (AND RECEIVED AN EMAIL TELLING ME IT CHANGED SUCCESSFULLY), it logged me out of my account. This wouldn't have been a problem if Insta wasn't a LOBOTOMITE of an app, but it is, and despite having JUST changed the password and having it fresh in my memory, it tells me it's the wrong password! I even double checked that it wasn't my fault by logging in on the website!

Well just learned about the Instagram machine. Finding out from friends that when I've been sending funny videos what has actually been happening is that they are sent to sites selling something. That's it for that. I'll try to find another app to use instead of this one. THAT'S DIRTY! zoom stopped working for most reels. I can only zoom in on about 10% of reel) fix please

once again instagram has updated and it's becoming worse and worse. the explore page used to be a mix of videos (usually larger, or with a reel symbol in the corner), and a mix of just infinte scroll photo posts. I used the just photos post all the time, and would just scroll down on one page. this was good because it guaranteed that (almost) all posts would be just photos without audio. now EVERYTHING is a reel!! I hate it!! I can't just scroll through photos anymore, they're all videos :(((((

One of the biggest reasons I don't use Instagram is the video pause/mute options. Some people I know could pause a reel with just a tap but I have to hold to pause the reel. If I release, it plays. One tap for me is just muting the reel. Doing research on this it seems like it's been an ongoing issue with a lot of people. Should just have an option in your settings.

crashes every time after 10 seconds of opening the app on my laptop. only able to use it on the browser but of course they don't make the browser the same as the app with the features available to be used. This has been happening for 6 months now and the instructions they have to fix this never work. Each new update makes the app crash sooner by 1 second each time. Great way to run a business on Instagram!

terrible on Chromebook os!! At first hand when I had installed instagram it worked PERFECTLY. all of a sudden it started crashing, the screen would flash white and then close it. I did everything from clearing up space on my device, clearing the apps cache, reinstalling, restarting my Chromebook to literally having to POWER WASH IT. just for instagram to say "Unexpected error." I do not recommend this on a Chromebook, its better on a mobile device or tablet; it simply just does not work.

There's a lot of frustrating things with this app. If I find a new person to follow, my entire newsfeed becomes every post that person has ever posted. Why do I need to see what they posted weeks ago, when I already browsed through their page to make the choice to follow them? Or when scrolling, if you pass recent posts and get into unknown territory, the "FOLLOW" button is easily clicked on with your right thumb. When I check my recent newsfeed hours later I see people I never followed pop up.

Great app love it, keep it up! Even though sometimes videos take a while to upload but all's good! Still good! (update: the app has changed so much, I love all the filters that are available. videos sometimes still take long to upload but what do you expect. I dislike the whole meta integration though. it feels like other apps in that aspect now.)

The app is such a buggy mess, I'm gonna be so real. Like it'll work for a week or two, then crash everytime i view an ad, make a story, try to message a friend, watch a reel, or just not show me a reel at all. I clear my cache, reinstall the app, but it stays like this, and it's genuinely frustrating. Don't get me wrong, I like seeing what my friends are up to, and I enjoy doomscrolling reels as much as the next guy, but man. The amount of crashes and bugs I've had is just infuriating

Calls hang up out of nowhere, a little bit laggy more blurry, audio goes really low at times and I have my phone volume all the way up and sometimes it goes back to normal if I end or leave the call then rejoin or recall the person I was talking too. Sometimes I believe it needs an update but it doesn't give me one, so that's not the issue. Sometimes when I'm on call my screen will go fully black then back to normal and it lot of times and some other people I know have the same issue.

Everybody knows Instagram is the best app. However, it has it's flaws like everything else. The feature of being able to see your followers likes, and they being able to see your either needs to go, or be optional. It's quite intrusive. Second the algorithm feeds way to many ads and sometimes I miss family and friends post.

Instagram used to be such a fun app and now all I experience is frustration. After editing photos for a post for the last hour it just quit and I lost all the work and time. What a joke!! 0 stars and two thumbs down. STILL HAVING ISSUES!! Can't edit, freezes most of the time. New update is glitching, won't bring up tools, and tools aren't as easily accessible and less user-friendly. Can't edit pics.

Instagram is all about the visuals. I love scrolling through and seeing beautiful photos and creative videos. It's my main source of inspiration, whether it's for travel, food, or just cool art. Stories and Reels are a fun way to share quick moments, and I find it‚Äôs a much more positive and curated space than other social media platforms.

Moderately Fun, if not Slightly Invasive. The app is an alright place to see posts made by friends, but it's basically an Ad focused marketplace. There's pretty much only social media marketing here and a few small businesses, and it's lost its original intention of being a photo sharing app. The customer service is also pretty much not there at all and there is no moderation of comments, so it's become a hot bed for the worst possible responses on social media to exist so much so its a joke.

The friends requests which I recieve have now piled up to 70+ but I can can't check for more than 10 requests at a time, because further it keeps buffering... This is happening for months now This app might be a very good app for social connections, but the bugs are increasing slowly. Now, it keeps showing notifications of the accounts that have been deleted!! I don't know if I can have a substitute of instagram, but THIS should not continue.

I've turned on notifications for several pages, but I never get notified (not even when I open the app). I've verified that notifications are on in my system settings. It's super annoying because a lot of college clubs only post events on Instagram, so if I don't check regularly I miss events. Fix the notifications!

title: Geo Tracker - GPS tracker
descriptionHTML:
If you are looking for an excellent GPS tracker, that can work with Open Street Maps or Google, love outdoor activities, or travel - this is the app for you!


Record GPS tracks of your trips, analyze statistics, and share them with your friends!


Geo Tracker can help:
‚Ä¢ Making the way back in an unfamiliar area without getting lost;
‚Ä¢ Sharing your route with friends;
‚Ä¢ Using someone else's route from GPX, KML or KMZ file;
‚Ä¢ Marking important or interesting points on your way;
‚Ä¢ Locating a point on the map, if you know its coordinates;
‚Ä¢ Showing off colorful screenshots of your accomplishments on social networks.


You can view the tracks and the surrounding area in the application using a scheme from OSM or Google, as well as satellite images from Google or Mapbox - this way you will always have the most detailed map of the area anywhere worldwide. The map areas you view are saved to your phone and remain available offline for a while (this works best for OSM maps and Mapbox's satellite images). To record and calculate track statistics only a GPS signal is needed - the Internet is only required to download map images.


While driving, you can turn on the navigation mode, in which the map automatically rotates in the direction of travel, which greatly simplifies navigation.


The application can record tracks while being in the background (on many devices, this requires additional configuration in the system - be careful! The instructions for these settings are available in the application). Power consumption in background mode is greatly optimized - on average, the phone's charge is enough for a whole day of recording. There's also an economy mode - you can turn it on in the app settings.


Geo Tracker calculates the following statistics:
‚Ä¢ Distance traveled and recording time;
‚Ä¢ Max and average speed on the track;
‚Ä¢ Time and average speed in motion;
‚Ä¢ Min and max altitude on the track, altitude difference;
‚Ä¢ Vertical distance, ascent and speed;
‚Ä¢ Min, max, and average slope.


Also, there are detailed charts of speed and elevation data available.


Recorded tracks can be stored as GPX, KML, and KMZ files, so they can be used in other well-known applications like Google Earth or Ozi Explorer. Tracks are stored locally on your device and are not transferred to any servers.


The app does not make money from ads or your personal data. To support the development of the project, a voluntary donation can be made in the application.


Useful tips & tricks to solve common GPS issues with your smartphone:
‚Ä¢ If you start the tracking please wait a bit until the GPS signal is found.
‚Ä¢ Restart your smartphone and make sure that you have a "clear view" of the sky before you start (no disturbing objects like high buildings, forests, etc.).
‚Ä¢ The reception conditions are permanently changing because they are influenced by the following factors: weather, season, positioning of satellites, areas with bad GPS coverage, high buildings, forests, etc.).
‚Ä¢ Go to phone settings, choose "Location" and activate it.
‚Ä¢ Go to phone settings, choose "Date & time" and activate the following options: "Automatic date & time" and "Automatic time zone". It may occur that it takes longer until the GPS signal is found if your smartphone is set to the wrong time zone.
‚Ä¢ Deactivate the airplane mode in your phone settings.


If none of these tips & tricks helped to solve your issues, deinstall the app and reinstall it again.
Be aware that Google uses in their Google Maps app not only the GPS data but also additional data of the current location from surrounding WLAN networks and/or mobile networks.


More answers to frequent questions and solutions for popular issues can be found on the website: https://geo-tracker.org/faq/?lang=en
summary: Record gps tracks of your trips, analyze statistics and share with friends!

scraped_reviews.content: Starts and finds it's location instantly, maps my walk or disc golf game, and gives me lots of stats afterwards. While many other apps are made for bosses to track their drivers, GeoTracker is perfect for me to track myself without sending my location to others. It activated faster than my smartwatch, which would require using my phone anyway to see the data afterward. If I was running and needed to go light, I would use my watch, but this is perfect for my needs.

Excellent app that does what it's designed to do, and does it really well. No bells nor whistles, no frills. I've been using it for quite some time to track hikes, runs, and nowadays all of my work delivery routes that I do. It allows me to keep a very accurate log for my trips: both mileage as well as date and times. I can export all that info and generate a complete log file from the individual files that Geo Tracker creates. Excellent work. Only small issue is the mislabeling on when the track was created (Today, Yesterday, etc., ) But that's a MINOR thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, Ashley! I'll take a look at the issue with time labels, and hopefully will fix it!

scraped_reviews.content: Exactly What I Was Looking For! I needed an app to trace my path while out in my kayak. I go out in the ocean and through tiny openings in mangroves, lagoons, and coves for several hours at a time. I was worried about getting lost. Won't happen with this app. And I can save my trips so I can explore new spots or save good fishing locations. My last trip was almost 6 hours & it brought my battery down to 42%. So it's pretty damn efficient considering it's using GPS.

My initial review: 5 stars - Awesome! Love it! I use it when I'm walking my dog. It will lay out your track on a satellite image, with the names of the streets and then give you details of exactly how long the walk was, minimum altitude, maximum altitude, rate of climb, it's great! Update 4/6/19: it stopped working. Keeps track of time only, no GPS functionality, no maps, no distance. I wrote the developer twice, with screen prints, and have had no response.

Great app to map your route and track stats for just about any activity, motorized or not. But FYI, there are better apps for skiing or snowboarding that will differentiate between a lift ride and downhill. TIP: if you don't have cell service, this will still track you but without a satellite background image. Go to Google and download an offline map for the area you will be using this app. Then you are good to go!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tom, thanks for your feedback and valuable suggestion! Hope to add this information before the next ski season starts! üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: Best app for giving your phone the functionality of a stand alone GPS device. I have been using it for years to conduct field work, backcountry skiing, hiking, and anything else that needs a map. For work I often have a $25,000 GPS unit with me, but I still use this app as any easier way to navigate or view map details. It is super flexible in terms of importing and exporting data.

Functional & easy-to-use app. Easy to make waypoints & export for use in Google Earth. You can overlay your current tracks on the same map as an earlier recorded one, but unfortunately they all appear in the same color so it's hard to distinguish the two. The one other issue I found is that if you should loose GPS lock, the phone doesn't alert you so you could be hiking for a while before you realize that it's no longer mapping your path. That could be rather dangerous if your depending on it.

I use this for work, doing plant surveys. The only con I've come across so far, and maybe the function exists and I just haven't figured it out, is deleting and adjusting waypoints as well as the path. Sometimes I forget to turn off the tracker and go beyond my planned trip. I would like to edit the path and remove that extra distance. Also, sometimes a drop the marker too late so I'd like to be able to adjust the drop spot.

I use a lot of mapping apps for work and fun, and this is one of the best. It's intuitive, doesn't drain the battery, and accurate enough for my uses. Love the ability to quickly and easily email my tracklog and waypoints from the field to my work account. Would be nice if had the option of taking georeferenced photos at waypoints and export all as a single kmz. Thanks for developing this app, I've been using it for years.

If your trying to map trails off road, this app is not for you. I had to pause my ride to record a point, then start recording again. My trip was just straight lines. Could be me as a user not doing something correct. But, I needed something that would let me start tracking. give the track a name, show every little turn, elevations if possible, and give me distance. The only thing accurate about this trial run was my start, pause, start, pause,......and End points.

I've always enjoyed GPS systems, to keep track of places I've been. When I found this one, I stopped looking further. I can track where and how long I've been to a place, not to mention the lat/longs of each location. I can pinpoint the precise time I was at a location by simply holding my finger on a line until a marker pops up with time and distance from start. Love it.

Geo Tracker is the best offline mapping tool. I use it mostly when I have spotty or no signal. It records all the track info plus a ton of neat features like track coloring, charts and data for altitude changes and length. It doesn't drain my battery noticeably and handles loading maps with spotty data, gracefully. Import and export is great for sharing tracks that aren't stuck in a walled garden. Make sure to enable run in background for the app, data and gps. NO ads! only a donate link. I did

I'm a kayaker (long boat, not the 'wannabe' kayaks from chainstores). This app is letting me keep track of my milage and speeds, giving me a way of tracking my goals. Excellent coverage, have had no drop-outs like I was experiencing with my Garmin a year ago. Not dis-sing Garmin, I did have an older model that was 'over the hlll'. Works,,, simple enough to use, that I sometimes forget to shut it off at the end of a float. (using the non-subscribed version,)

I've used the app for a few years and like it well enough to pay the small fee. Two annoyances: the waypoint symbols are balloon shapes that block the view of the track and the arrow isn't pointy enough. If the symbols were +'s or x's and the arrow was thinner and maybe a different color from the track line, it would be about perfect.

I use this app all the time for hiking, 4 wheeling, and MTB riding. It's great for that. It's great for tracking your stats (without competition). I have used it to get unlost in the back country. You can upload your tracks. I recently transferred all my ridess onto another newer phone, which had some glitches, but it did work. 4 stars because on my newer phone it keeps wanting for me to set my notifications to on, but when I do the notifications happen at every 15 sec for each GPS point.

I love this app. It's pretty straight forward and easy to use. I like keeping track of some of the statistics it keeps like elevation, walking speed and I use it to drop pins where I set up my trail cam. The ability to retrack a past route is pretty simple. Gentle tip try to stay still for a good thirty seconds to a minute so it gets your bearings straight. Five stars Geo Tracker! Update 7-31-24. This app seems like it doesn't work as good as it did even a year ago. I'd still give it four stars.

If you give the app permission to access location data only while running, the app stops recording data as soon as you put it in the background. It's still running, but doesn't work. But then when you give it permission to have location data at all times, it randomly looks up location data in the background even when the app is not running. This is shady. Otherwise, the app is a good substitute for My Tracks.

Like many others, this once great app stopped working a few days ago. Wouldn't even open. No response from the developer. Finally deinstalled and reinstalled. Guess what? All my tracks are gone! Very bad. Does anyone know how to find the missing files - what folder are they in? Update: I found the folder where the *shared* (and therefore saved) tracks were kept, but it seems that unshared tracks have vanished with the app uninstall. Ugh. Very poor design. Recommend the RideWithGPS app instead!

This app is amazing, it's easy to use and the subscription is awesome and affordable. I am a school bus driver, we are required to map out our routes, to make it easy for a new driver to step in and take over. It's perfect for after school programs. Record your route and add new stops for each student and easy to update. I just need to figure out how to print my route. regardless this app is still worth 5 stars hands down.

No longer accurate. I love this app and have been using it for years, but just in the past two weeks it has stopped being accurate. I was suspicious of the distances it was giving me so I grabbed a second app, and sure enough, Geotracker was missing big chunks of my walk. (And yes, I have disabled Android's battery management for this app and the other one.)

Used to work very well. Stopped working several months ago. Shows errors: "No signal""Cannot add a point because GPS coordinates are not available". Also it's now harder to export at once selected trips data e.g. in the GPX format.

I've been using this to track my exercise routes and it's absolutely superb. I got totally fed up with Google maps making sudden spikey jumps on all my recorded paths. in contrast, Geo Tracker seems to have rock solid gps location fixing and the paths look accurate down to single metre scales.

I wish it can show stop time of trip. I can only see start time and duration. you need to press and hold on map to see speed history which is counter intuitive. I wish the paid version a one time purchase instead of monthly subscription

This app works very well, very inexpensive to us. it tracks my route and records it so I can ride the same route again if desired. Works well navigating, allows you to create a route you want to ride and mark your stops and turns. Very usable, would recommend.

Good app but the only way (hopefully) to communicate is with Google review so I try to get the developers attention with a 3 star review. Could you please add a kilometre marker on the map like other free GPS apps do? I somehow managed to combine the map and the information page on one screenshot. How did this happen as I couldn't do it again. As soon as I get a response, I will amend my rating.

App is okay for distance and speeds. BUT: it seems that the developer is doing some sort of AVERAGING on cumulative vertical ascent which makes the values unreliable. E.g. You ride a bike up a hill and reach 150 m of ascent at the top...if you then descend quickly you may end up at 140 m of total ascent. The calculation are simply incorrect.
so far it does an excellent job of plotting where I have travelled plus it also seems to have the ability to follow a pre-existing track but I'm still exploring the possibilities

ATTEN USERS: Be sure the app location setting/permission & your phone GPS set "precise",or you will only record Time and nothing else. Great app for recording treks, biking, driving etc. Functional, reliable & stable. Included in real time stats : Number of satellites; Accuracy level; Lat x Long; Heading; Elevation etc .

High quality App which has been consistently brilliant. Possible developments: 1. When pressing record, checks if another recording exists and asks confirmation to proceed adding to current or create new one. 2. Have a speed cutoff in settings. If user travels over x mph/kph it stops the recording (leaving app recording after getting in car after a walk can ruin the Statistics). Thank you!
Well designed and does what I want. Wish I could add comments to trips. They added comments and also just allowed one to break a trip up into components. Great app!!

Glitchy. Why does it keep saying 'weak signal' or 'no signal' when I'm standing in a wide open space, with 28/32 satellites and with a small blue dot on Google maps? The phone hardware knows exactly where it is but for some reason this app doesn't. Update: this was fixed by a reinstall Update 2: that was a very temporary fix. It soon went back to not working. What you need to do is empty the cache. That fixes it but needs repeating regularly
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Giles,
Please make sure you're using the "General" recording profile in the app - wrong record settings might be a very probable reason for this. If that doesn't help, feel free to drop me a message, I'll investigate further. Thanks! support@geo-tracker.org

scraped_reviews.content: hello, it seems while position recording is really good, speed recording has become really fragmented, with speed tracks having a length of hundreds of meters instead of some meters like before. I think this is a bug, just to let you know

I really appreciate the amount of information provided in the recap post event statistics page. Prior to discovering Geo Tracker, I was using a basic app provided by the eBike manufacturer. This app has been my go to instrument of record for all of my rides and hikes. The subscription is worth it!
A very Easy to Use and Clear App specially without the use of Internet or Data. Highly recommended!

scraped_reviews.userName: EARTH_ROT .Man was not meant to be led by Man
scraped_reviews.content: Used this app to drive from up North all the way to Niagara Falls. it was spot on all the way there. the directions were perfect. it even easily got us out of a traffic construction jam. keep up the good work.

Awesome app for saving tracks. I use this to correlate my photos to my trips. Easier than touring along my dedicated Garmin GPS. Doesn't seem to affect battery life to badly for short trips. Highly recommended. And WILL GIVE DONATION because there are NO ADS! Thanks.
This app is very helpful for tracking path on map. We can export it on kml file which was surprising.

this is by far the best app that I have ever put on my phone. I use it all the time. I love that it just runs in the background to record where I've been without chewing through my battery or data. Great job to the developers.

I used the program to map new snowmobiling trails and I am very impressed with the accuracy and ease of use. It's so amazing to have an app on my phone that works better than a handheld gps from only 5 years ago. Update 01July20: I dont know whats changed but this program no longer works. After several years of use, even on Precise tracking it doesn't track properly. I uninstalled and reinstalled but still doesn't work properly. Im very disappointed. I will be uninstalling permanently.

A great app for hiking Update: after few years of use, this app is still solid. Very accurate tracking. One thing though, make sure your phone or tablet is right side up. I had few times I put my phone in a pocket up side down, the tracking was way off and it lost GPS signal all the time... Very weird but as soon as I put it the right side up, it works perfectly.

This is the perfect tracking app. Simple, but does exactly what you want. There is just one fundamental flaw: I always forget to turn it off after a walk. When I get home, it has tracked the car drive as well, which messes up all the statistics. I don't need elaborate track editing, but a simple trim feature to remove the tail of the track would be nice.

A marvellous app. The only thing is, since the recent update it's become harder to stop after a journey. You have to be 100% certain you've switched it off properly, otherwise it keeps recording. Equally it can be difficult to start. I just did a walk I haven't done for years, I got home to look at where I went and I discover it didn't start, even though I switched it on. FRUSTRATING! The altitudes always seem a bit on the high side.

I think this is one of the best trackers out there. Very light on the battery, accurate, nice statistics. I use it for both walking, biking and skiing. It even has separate statistics for actual moving (in case you don't press the pause button - yet another great feature) One remark in case the dev reads this: max speed could use some smoothing, it sometimes picks up spikes of sudden movements that aren't realistic for the trip you are doing. I think a rolling average of a few seconds?

Great app. Does what I want without a lot of fuss. Easy on the battery. I found that when I am not set for precise measurements, I can get a lot of apparent movement when in real life I am sitting still. this is due to small, but noticeable, variations in my calculated position. Over an hour, these variations add up. Measuring on "precise" works fine.

I like this app because it works with local storage instead of cloud. But I just had a huge frustration when I reinstalled the app from Google play and found out that all my tracks disappeared. I used to think that it is storing on my phone separately by default, there was not any disclaimer about this. Its extremely frustrating to lost all season running statistics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, and we're truly sorry about the frustration. Unfortunately, system restrictions don‚Äôt allow us to store data in external/shared storage by default. However, the app offers an option to enable automatic sync for backup. We‚Äôll definitely consider making this option more visible to avoid such situations in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: Very cool app that tracks my location very well with low battery usage. The stats are also amazing. Price for the "pro" version is also reasonable. My only gripe is that it constantly tracks my location, even after closing the app from the application overview. According to my battery usage it's not even running in the background, but it still requests the location. Why? I therefore have to set location access to "Only while using the app" and be annoyed by the warnings.

I have a habit of going off the beaten trail and more so than often, I come home to an irritated wife tired of hearing the same old excuse for not coming home on my scheduled time. Thanks to this app I have no excuse to be late ever again. Plus I have proof off being lost. Good app, thanks from my wife.

i use this app to track the paths i take when i walk. the statistics page records track speed, max speed, duration, average speed, and elevation, which is quite detailed and very appreciated. its simple to use, I've never had any bugs or issues, and it doesn't use wifi or mobile data which is perfect. great app, ive recommended to friends and family as well. thank you developer!!

I used on a river in Rockaway NJ. I took a short cut that was not on gps map , this app took me right back the the junction I came out of, couldn't eyeball it , it's like all woods. so this app is awesome and may have saved me from be stranded, I love it , thank you.
I've been using this app to gather Telemetry data for YouTube videos... I'm able to add Telemetry such as speed altitude a map even bank angle directly into my videos... Go Tech...!!!

title: Opera News: breaking & local
description:
Breaking News, Local Stories, and Live Sports ‚Äî All in One App!
Opera News keeps you informed with breaking news, live football scores, trending stories, and personalized updates. Join millions across the U.S. who trust Opera News to stay updated on what matters most.

Key Features:
‚úî Breaking News Alerts
Get live updates and instant notifications for breaking news, trending headlines, and urgent stories ‚Äî delivered straight to your phone.

‚úî Customizable News Feed
Follow the topics you love: from politics and crypto to sports, weather, and Hollywood. With AI-powered recommendations, Opera News delivers stories that matter to you.

‚úî 15,000+ Trusted Local News Sources
Stay connected with reliable local news from over 15,000 publishers across the U.S. Get weather updates, community events, and local headlines in real time.

‚úî Live Football & Sports Scores
Never miss a game! Get live scores and match updates from the NFL, NBA, Premier League, and World Cup. Track league standings and follow your favorite teams.

‚úî Trending Videos & Viral Clips
Catch up on trending news videos, celebrity gossip, and short clips. From Hollywood buzz to sports highlights, discover viral moments that keep you entertained.

‚úî Offline News Reading
Save articles for offline reading and stay informed anytime, anywhere ‚Äî even without Wi-Fi.

‚úî Dark Mode for Comfortable Reading
Enjoy late-night scrolling with Dark Mode, designed to reduce eye strain and enhance your reading experience.

Why Choose Opera News?
‚Ä¢  Real-time Updates: Stay ahead with breaking news notifications and live event coverage.
‚Ä¢  Personalized News: AI-powered recommendations deliver stories tailored to your interests.
‚Ä¢  All-in-One App: Breaking news, local updates, live sports, and viral videos ‚Äî all in one place.

Stay Connected. Stay Ahead. Download Opera News Today!
Join millions of users who rely on Opera News for trusted updates, live sports scores, and the latest trending stories. Download now and see why we‚Äôre America‚Äôs go-to news app!

summary: Get global and local news as it happens, wherever you are.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is great for news, like the layout and news/information it provides, so why one star? Simple, the notifications!! So annoying, doesn't matter what setting I have the notifications set to, I get bombarded with news notifications. Just way too many. I've set it to standard, to low and I've even turn off notifications in the app and still get them!! Please sort it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your kind words about the app's layout and content! It sounds like the notification settings aren't working as they should, which can be quite overwhelming. Thank you for sharing this feedback; we‚Äôve escalated your concerns internally. Your experience matters to us! The Opera Team

scraped_reviews.content: I was looking for something better than Google news and thought I found it. Sadly, I did not. I really liked where this was going with the layout and trending news items etc, but the ads were SO overwhelming it undermines most positives about the app. I've only had the app for less than 10 minutes and 5 tiktok ads have popped up forcing me to wait to exit. Who is giving all these great reviews?? So people like intrusive gaming and TT ads? Baffling and questionable. Nope! it's a no from me!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi PA C, we appreciate your feedback about the ads in the app. It‚Äôs important for us to know how our users feel. Your insights are valuable, and we'll keep them in mind as we strive to enhance the experience for everyone. Thank you for sharing your thoughts! Regards, Opera Team

scraped_reviews.content: Decent. Good content and better than Googles version especially since they are moving aggressively into AI generated news stories. However, the ads in this app are very annoying especially since it's audible. I would prefer a pay version (though definitely not subscription based). It's unlikely that I will stick with this in its current form.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback and understand how disruptive audible ads can be. It‚Äôs great to hear you enjoy the content! We‚Äôre always eager to learn how we can enhance your experience. Your thoughts on a pay version are valuable, and we‚Äôll keep them in mind as we strive to improve. Thank you for sharing!

scraped_reviews.content: the ability to access multiple news outlets is excellent, but the app is let down by the number and type of adverts, which, based on my experience, are hard to get rid of and hang around. Their advertising policy, which shares your data with 144 vendors, means you can expect plenty of annoying and intrusive ads but with no option to switch to a premium plan to remove them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi SeEl E-HN (SeEl), we appreciate your feedback about the ads in the app. It‚Äôs important for us to know how our users feel. Your insights are valuable, and we'll keep them in mind as we strive to enhance the experience for everyone. Thank you for sharing your thoughts! Regards, Opera Team

scraped_reviews.content: Ads are so bad, let me start by saying I love opera, use the browser on PC for years. Saw this app yesterday, installed and love the look. However, everything you click on, gives you a partial read of the article, AS SOON as you click to see the remainder, an ad comes on. I have to say, this is so infuriating that I lasted only 1 day of use. Going back to Google news.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brandon Sandretzky, thank you for your feedback about the ad experience. We're sorry to hear it affected your enjoyment. Your insights are valuable, and we hope you'll consider trying us again in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: Overwhelmingly full of spammy tabloid articles with clickbait headlines. Occasionally there is something worth reading. The only reason to even consider this app is the offline feature, and even then, I'm sure there must be better alternatives. I'll certainly uninstall this app when I get the chance to find one.

When we are replying to comments and tap the screen, probably to correct an error in the replies we are typing, the entire reply we are typing will vanish. It doesn't happen when we are commenting directly on a post. This has lingered so long for Opera News not to notice it. I have written many feedbacks to that effect with no improvement. One star review may be the better option.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Solomon, It‚Äôs disheartening to hear that your replies are disappearing while you're trying to correct them. Your concerns have been noted, and we‚Äôre committed to enhancing the app for a smoother experience. Thank you for being patient with us! Regards, The Opera Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Useless app, their is no option to unblock things, for example I went to block a news provider due to there pay to reject cookies policy (which sadly seems to be the majority of news sources on the app) and accidentally hit block news from my local area by mistake, if you are going to allow us to block news sources or even locations, you should give us an option to see what we've blocked with an unblock option for when mistakes happen, using a different news app now as fed up with this app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Vincent, We appreciate your feedback regarding the blocking feature. It's important to us that users have control over their experience, and we recognize the need for an option to manage blocked sources or locations. Thank you for sharing your thoughts; they help us understand user needs better. Regards, The Opera Team.

scraped_reviews.content: This is my THIRD review after my 2019 & 2023 Reviews. NOW IT'S THE BEST AFTER THOSE YEARS. I WILL SOON ELABORATE. THANKS VERY MUCH. Thank you very much for your reactions to my brief comments. Indeed there tremendous improvements including updates and report coverage. Thanks for the outstanding improvements on the Opera news application.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Elimosaria Maeda, we truly appreciate your kind words! It's wonderful to hear your positive feedback after all these years. We're delighted that you appreciate the improvements and updates‚Äîyour support means a lot to us. Thank you for sharing your experience! Best, Opera Team

scraped_reviews.content: Allows any kind of content even blatant lies, unverified news and inreliable storage for instance if post a comment and someone likes or replies, I get notification but I never get to see it. Phoenix is more reliable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Jambo Okumu, It's concerning to hear about your experience with content reliability and notifications. We appreciate your feedback, as it helps us improve. While we strive for a better user experience, your insights are invaluable. Thank you for sharing your thoughts! Regards, The Opera Team.

scraped_reviews.content: this is a brilliant news app,I spend hours reading articles, it's also up to the minute,there's also sections for health news,international news ,local news even regional news, on par with Google news app.

title: Goods Puzzle: Sort Challenge‚Ñ¢
description: Get ready to embark on an exciting matching adventure like never before in Goods Sorting: Match 3 Puzzle! This matching puzzle game offers a unique twist on the classic match 3 genre, combining strategic sorting, and rearranged challenges with thrilling puzzle gameplay. FEATURES: ‚ú® Challenging Sorting Gameplay: Dive into a world of goods and engage in addictive sorting puzzles. Swap and match 3 identical goods to clear them from the board & earn points. ‚ú® Unique Goods and Abilities: Encounter a wide variety of goods with different properties & special abilities. ‚ú® Exciting Power-Ups and Boosters: Unlock & use a range of power-ups & boosters to enhance your sorting abilities. These useful tools can help you overcome obstacles, clear difficult levels & achieve high scores. ‚ú® Engaging Levels & Stories: Explore different stories on this 3D sorting adventure, each with its own set of challenging levels. From bustling marketplaces to serene gardens, the visually stunning environments will keep you captivated. ‚ú® Obstacles and Limited Times: Face various obstacles and limited times as you progress through the game. Plan your moves carefully and strategize to overcome these challenges and complete objectives within the given limit. HOW TO PLAY: üéÆ Swap & rearrange adjacent goods to create matches of 3. üéÆ Match 3 goods to create powerful combos & earn bonus points. üéÆ Use power-ups and boosters strategically to overcome obstacles & clear levels. üéÆ Achieve high scores & complete objectives to progress through the game & unlock new levels & stories. Embark on this sorting adventure & challenge yourself with the unique gameplay of Goods Puzzle: Sort Challenge‚Ñ¢. Get ready to sort, match, rearrange & conquer the exciting puzzles that await you!

I didn't buy ad free for this reason: Occasionally you'll get to levels that are nigh humanly impossible to beat within the time limit without an absurd amount of luck. The game is designed to frustrate you so you'll buy micro transactions. Without the ability to progress without buying boosters and items, I uninstalled. Make it fair and I'd have bought ad free.

scraped_reviews.content: Good graphics, challenging gameplay. Really good game til you hit one of *those* levels. As mentioned in previous reviews, you'll eventually get to levels that cannot be won without *multiple* boosters/power-ups. I've accumulated enough boosters to push through them, but it does get old. I have friends who have quit the game because they are stuck and cannot get past one of these levels. Maybe make it so a player can use coins to skip if you insist on having such ridiculously hard levels.

scraped_reviews.content: Copy paste garbage with too many ads. The only reason I downloaded it is because of rewards for another game, which I actually enjoy. At first its fine. With a constant "remove" ads pop up. AND THEN it makes the ads longer on purpose. I got part of my reward for playing this stupid game.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm well into the 1,000s on my level. I loved this game and played it daily. A LOT. But what used to be 15-30 second ad breaks are now at least two minutes. I can't sit for 20 minutes watching ads for 5 minutes of actual game play. Really. Who thought this was okay.

summary: To-do list, Habit Tracker, Routine Planner and Reminders. All in just one app!

scraped_reviews.content: Out of the three different habit / todo list apps I've tried, this one seems much better so far. And its 1-time premium payed tier is much cheaper than the others I tried. Personal wishlist for the app: 1. It'd be nice to have some kind of celebration animation if we complete all our habits for the day 2. It'd be nice if on the Habits screen, I could go to previous weeks. I really like that view, but if I want to see how I did last week I have to look at the monthly view for each habit alone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Parker, thank you for your review, we truly appreciate your support! üéâ

scraped_reviews.content: it works really well. i take a few medications and it helps me track them as well as get me in the habit of taking them altogether. my only problem is, with some recent update (could be app update or software update), the widget is a little bit broken. it no longer displays the day (for example 05/24/25) when you scroll back a day. it also doesn't display the app widget in the corner, or the divider at the top. otherwise, extremely easy to use and helpful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedbac, we‚Äôre happy to hear you find the app useful! Please email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com and we‚Äôll provide you with more information about the issue you are experiencing. üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: I love the app, it's helping me get out of depression rut. Only have three negative things to say about it. If you set an alarm instead of just a notification and you finish a task early or try to shut it off for the day by skipping it, the alarm will still sound, and two I can't get it to stop notifying me even if I have already completed the task and checked it off for the day. Three notifications are always late.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Lanesa, thank you for your review! We're glad you find the app useful. Currently, you can mute completed activities from the settings.
