scraped_reviews.content: I initially rated this app 5 stars. But now that I've used it for a while, I do have 2 minor suggestions that would make this app perfect. 1. Please give us the ability to copy already existing tasks and habits, so that we can quickly create similar items without having to start from scratch every time. 2. It would be nice to have additional color options when creating categories. Or even better, a customer color picker where we can create our own colors. Other than that, 5 stars!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedback! We appreciate that you find the app useful. We're actively working to make the app more complete based on the users' suggestions. Feel free to email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com if you have any other questions or suggestions. üéä

scraped_reviews.content: When the app works, it works well and does the job. But often my alarms stop working out of nowhere despite the entry still existing. So I don't get notifications on time, which is troublesome for medication and I don't know why. Also, some old entries from years ago that I deleted before show up again out of nowhere. I have a Xiaomi, if that matters. It's the only app that does this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your review! Please, email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com and we‚Äôll be happy to assist you. üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for the premium version, because it is not a subscription, and because they did not aggressively or obtrusively advertise in the free version. The actual setting of goals can be confusing though. like I want to exercise at least once a week, but there's no straightforward way to do that without it trying to track every single day. it only has an option for once a day, and not for once a week
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Joseph, thank you for your review! We truly appreciate your support. It‚Äôs currently possible to create that frequency. Please email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com and we‚Äôll be glad to provide you with more information. üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: I finally purchased the premium out of desperation. And it's so relieving to be able to have unlimited number of habits. I am really in a helpless state right now with my sleep deprivation and procrastination. If you could allow us to customize the alarm sound for every habit, it would really be helpful since there is an alarm sound that sounds like "pressure" while another sounds like "a new start". Also, a plain white background color will also be great for the eyes. Thank you so much.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Thricia, thank you for your review! We're happy to hear that you like the app and find it useful. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us. We're actively working to make the app more complete based on the users' suggestions. Feel free to email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com if you have any other questions or suggestions. ü§ó

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app, so much that I paid for it. The only thing I wish you would add, is the ability to add hyperlinks..url and uri. Will give 5 stars if you could make it happenü§©. Thanks. Sorry for the edit, but I remembered one other thing, re: the 'Lists.' I would like to break them up into 'morning' and 'evening' routines, but my routines include all categories, so they don't really help, since the lists can only be divided by categories. Thanks, again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you very much for your review. Your feedback is really appreciated! We're actively working to make the app more complete based on the users' suggestions. Feel free to email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com if you have any other questions or suggestions. üòä

scraped_reviews.content: Got it recently and I hardly ever leave reviews but this is exactly what I was looking for. The free version is more than enough for most but I might get premium just to support the devs. It's a one time purchase that isn't shoved in your face all the time which is a good change of pace compared to other apps that try to be sneaky. Only con I can really think of is that the UI can be a tiny bit overwhelming at first, but even that is a stretch.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Emmerson, thank you for your review! We're happy to hear that you like the app and find it useful. If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com. Your input helps us enhance our app! ü§ó

scraped_reviews.content: There are lots of things I like about this app. It took some getting used to moving around in it but now I find scheduling most things easy, and I love that I can have the reminder pop up every day until I mark it complete. However, it's missing some key repeatability features that make it not a five star app. For example I have things I would love to schedule for quarterly. Instead I have to go pick specific days of the year because you can only set up the repeat for a certain number of days.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Kitty, thank you for your feedback! It's gratifying to hear you like the app. We're actively working to make the app more complete based on the users' suggestions. Feel free to email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com if you have any other questions or suggestions ‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! I went ahead and got the premium version, which was a really fair price. I appreciate that it is a one-time purchase. I will not pay for app subscriptions. I schedule everything from daily tasks, fitness habits, weekly self-care and housekeeping, monthly tasks, and even once-a-year tasks, like washing my house's exterior. It really motivates lazy me to get things done!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Rebecca, thank you for your wonderful review! We're happy to hear that you like the app and find it useful. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us. We truly appreciate your support! ü§ó

scraped_reviews.content: I like it, but I do really wish it gave more options for cumulative amounts for a week or month. For instance, I try to eat 30 different plant foods each week, though with no specific number each day as long as I hit the overall goal. All it would take is a drop down for the numerical value option where you can select week. I'd also like to add a certain number of minutes of exercise per week but run into the same issue.

This is exactly what I was after. It's easy to use and has a really easy user interface to check out stats and to select habits or routines you want to select for the day. Didn't see any ads and have seen no bugs. I tried a few apps and they were over complicated or just not right. This is the perfect habit tracking and habit streak app you can get. If you want the extra features it's only a small one time fee too. No subscriptions which is refreshing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Seb, thank you for your review! We're happy to hear that you like the app and find it useful. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us. We appreciate your support! ü§ó

scraped_reviews.content: Very good, but could be better. I wish I could build different lists that have different items. Right now it seems that while I can have different lists, they show more or less the same items, which defeats the purpose of having multiple lists if they're mirrors of each other. Other than that, which in my book costs it a star, excellent app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Timothy, thank you for your review! It is possible to hide repeated categories from the lists. Please email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com, and we'll be glad to provide you with more information about it! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I didn't try the premium (paid) version, which unlocks even more features, but from what I've experienced it's possible to say it's the most complete habit app I've tried. It may not be the best in every point, but it's definitely the most complete one - cloud backup, statistics, possibility to set a habit as both good or bad, tasks, define the exact days a habit/task should be performed, categorize habits, useful and helpful widget, etc., all that within a nicely designed app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Caio, thank you for your review! We're happy to hear that you like the app and find it useful. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us. We appreciate your support! üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: There is something I don't like about this. I can't put my finger on it. I don't need a reminder in the morning that I have reminders that day. I do like the templates for putting in your habits. But I found it a bit awkward to use. I didn't understand the labels on the buttons when starting a habit. I also felt the pop-up for inputting the notification alert was very awkward. All the notifications get stacked in one block in my menu. So I have to go into the notification, open to see them all.

So far so good. Just started using this app about a week ago. It's working well and is pretty clear cut as to adding or editing the habits. I like the option for reminders. If it continues to work well in the next few weeks, am thinking of buying premium at discounted " launch" price of $4.99 . That describes widgets as an extra and I am just wondering what that means.

I've been using this app for a while, and it's honestly made my life so much easier. I can easily set up and edit routines and habits, as well as keep track of my to-do list in one place, even set alarms for time sensitive habits like taking medications, etc. As a working parent with 2 pets and so many other things on my plate, this app really helped take some of the mental burden off me when it comes to scheduling tasks, maintaining habits, and generally planning my day and managing my time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Lin, thank you very much for your review! We're glad you found our app useful and truly appreciate your support! üéâ

scraped_reviews.content: I use this to remember to do my usual chores and maintain my writing and workout habits. It's not a motivation thing so much as a forgetful thing. This app ensures I do it all. Haven't really noticed the ads on this app, so that probably means they did them very well. Ease of use for me would be if they removed one off tasks as the primary focus, I'm not going to write down every little thing I'm going to do for just one day. That's not really a critique though, just a personal preference.

DO NOT USE THE ALARMS!!! In general, this app has been helpful and seemed to have all the features I was looking for, so I paid for the premium version, but I'm writing this at 3:19 in the morning after my 10:30pm alarm has yet again gone off hours differently from when it was set for. None of my timed reminders come through at the set time, or even anything close to the set time. It's not just useless, it actually has been preventing me from sleeping because they'll randomly decide to ring.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your review! The app is being affected by the device's integrated battery optimization features. Please, contact us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com. We'll help you to configure them! üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: I'm a SAHM wanting to establish a better daily routine, as well as fit in some bigger tasks each day if possible. This app is absolutely perfect for what I need. I love that the daily items don't get carried over to the next day if you don't complete them. And I love that the app doesn't constantly ask you if you want to go premium. But I went premium after one day, because I loved this app so much. Plus it's a one time fee, not a monthly fee, so I'm far more inclined to purchase. Thanks devs!

The free version is more than adequate for smaller habit tracking, but the premium version is great to track a lot of the habits you want to build. plus the one time flat rate is a deal breaker especially with all these other apps not even letting you see the app before asking you to put in card info or sign up for the free trail which is only designed for you to forget. most apps have a higher fee per month than this app's one time, (optional btw), fee. Definitely recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Tyson, thank you for your review! We're happy to hear that you like the app and find it useful. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us. üéâ

scraped_reviews.content: I love the interface and usability, especially the checklists. I wish it had the ability to checklists up throughout the week. For example, doing dishes (unload and load) is set for twice a week. Sometimes, I do the items on separate days but it doesn't save the progress when I go in the next day to check off the next item. It'd be nice so I don't have to create separate tasks for each step. I'd also like to see how many things I did each day on the calendar to have a visual of productivity.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Natasha, thank you very much for your review. Your feedback is greatly appreciated! We're actively working to enhance the app based on users' suggestions. Regarding your first suggestion, the app includes some features you might find useful. Please contact us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com, and we'll be happy to assist you! ü§ó

scraped_reviews.content: Looks really nicely made but not what I was looking for. I needed something i could use to make a list of everything I wanted to remember to do every day (brush teeth, wash face, eat breakfast, exercise, etc.) so that i could check them off as i did them. This does exactly that but you cant add more than six things unless you are a premium member which is totally not worth it for a simple checklist. I'll be looking for something more basic.

Had it an hour before deciding to purchase the app. Great way to manage my specific workout schedule as well as other daily habits and tasks. Took me some time to figure out how to organize everything best for me because my workout plan changes. For example, I want to burn 1200 or more calories a day, sometimes more, so I set the habit at least 1200 and can enter actual burned calories. It calculates for the goal duration how many total I burned. Love this app!!

This is replacing a somewhat simpler habit tracker that I've been using for a couple years. The UI is intuitive and easy to set up and has a lot of options for habit frequency and targets. I like that you can set a full time period, including the start date, for the habit. My old tracker just had a target end date. Glad the option to sort the habits manually is coming (or at least that is alluded to on several previous responses to reviews). That would be a good improvement to the UI. I do wish there were a way to synch data across devices, however. The cloud backup option may work for that, but I think it could be simplified using the linked account data. There is also not a "sync on start up/close" or "daily" option for that, so I'd regularly be getting stale data on the second device upon upload of the backup.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your review Cim. We really appreciate the feedback! We are currently working in new improvements for the app. Please, feel free to contact us to habitnow.apps@gmail.com anytime üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: This app has helped me be more mindful and consistent in how I spend my day, and in what I want to accomplish. I recently switched phones and had an issue with the backup, support didn't take longer than 24 hrs to respond...it was a weekend so that's fair. Definitely pleased with how I can keep track of things, whether by checkbox, list, number of times during the week etc. From daily bible reading, to house cleaning, this app is IT. It would be nice to share tasks but not a deal breaker. GET IT

There is no customization of color allowed. Also no separate priorities for separate tasks. There is no web interface. So if you login from a different device, with the same username, everything is blank. You have to manually back up, restore and thats how you transfer them. Not a straightforward way. My phone died, and with that, vanished all my data. Overall, it is a useful app but not a reliable one. I am a premium user. No auto backup made.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! There is an automatic backup functionality, the app shows a message suggesting to enable it when the user turns premium. About the color customization, it's possible to change it from the themes section. About the web app, we're currently working on it. We appreciate your feedback. Best regards, HabitNow Team

scraped_reviews.content: I love this, definitely worth the purchase. I tried the free version for awhile, but the free version had limitations. I am not one to purchase apps, but I needed a personal assistant and this one is the way to go!! I love it sends reminders to my fitbit. I can pick certain days for reminders; ie: Monday trash and recycling. Thursday and Sunday I can set up my plan for my days off. Etc. I can make new habits or tasks. And now won't loose my lists, which uses to have lists lol
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your review Ashley. We'll add new useful features soon! üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: Holy Flexibility, Batman!! I have never found another app as flexible or as easy to use "right out of the box" as this one. The free version is good to get you started, but the premium version is the way to go. More importantly, it won't break the bank to get it and its lifetime - not a subscription (as of this review). The goals and awards keep you motivated and the simplicity means that it isn't a chore to keep track of your chores. I highly recommend HabitNow! Thanks, Devs and great job!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Krissanne, appreciate your kind words! We're happy to hear that you like the app and find it useful. Your feedback is valuable to us. If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to reach out via email at habitnow.apps@gmail.com. We appreciate your support! üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: Just downloaded this app and giving my first impressions. Was easy to get started. Created a list of 6 habits right away with ease. Very intuitive controls and nice interface. I like that I can have multiple reminders and they can be notifications or alarms. Update: I've uninstalled this app because if I dismiss an alarm while the phone is locked, the vibrate keeps going until I restart my phone. I haven't found a fix for this yet. Haven't reached out to company yet.

The Premium version is SO worth it. I have ADHD and could never figure out how to remember to do all the things that need doing, or even usually that they needed to be done. Stuff like changing the air filter, giving monthly pet meds, paying yearly fees, weekly trash days. I can track them all with this app! Even better, it's helping me build great habits that are SO hard to build- I start and forget. Now I start and the app remembers for me!

Habit now is really helping me get into a routine to drink water, take medication, reminder to call people, I even use it to record my weight & blood pressure measurements and see my results on a chart! It would be great if the reminder alarm could display the reason for the alarm much bigger. I have to stop and find my glasses so I can read what it is telling me before I can turn off the alarm. I have made all tasks & habits in caps to help with this, but it's still hard to see sometimes.

Ive tried a lot off habit apps and like it better than others (paid). I like: -the options for icons, which also show in notifications -robust notification options -works offline. I've changed how I use the app, I use it for my tasks mostly. But it's great for that simple enough, I don't get overwhelmed. But the biggest problem with it is the icon in the notification tray is too generic. If I'm distracted, I don't instinctively know which app it is.

I like the app, but I wish it had two features: 1. A web interface - it would be a lot easier to use a computer to set up all my habits and it would also be nice to use it on my work computer for work tasks not strictly on my phone. 2. Google Calendar interface - again, it's OK to have a calendar in the app, but it's stuck in my little phone. Allowing it to be shown in my Google Calendar would help me see how it all fits together. Thanks guys!

Best, most versatile free version habit tracker I've tried. I love the whole thing. Update: the free version is absolutely great as a basic habit tracker. After over a year I still loved it so much that I bought the paid version, because there were a few features I thought would really enhance my habit tracking on the paid one (i.e. more habits and checklists within habits, which are a game changer). Even if I didn't want those features I would've paid just to support a truly fantastic app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much! We're working to add many new useful features soon üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: Been using this for a couple weeks, it really is helpful & rewarding to interact with! However, sometimes we plan to do something on specific days of the month, but miss one day and end up actually making up for it on an unscheduled day. There seems to be no way to add this into your existing track/statistic. The only thing you can do is make an entirely new track that includes your modified date. It's very demotivating to need a new track every time I mess up, and also dullens stat utility.

Excellent app that's easy to use and love that they don't have ads all over the place even on the free version. It actually makes me want to pay for the premium all the more. Edit 3/2/22: Not only a great app, but amazing customer service too! I switched phones and ran into an issue with transferring my premium license. This was completely my own fault and they were responsive and provided a complimentary premium membership on my new phone.

Excellent. Exactly what I wanted. Set up your habits and mark them as complete or not complete. Set a time for them so they're in order, and that time can also be a reminder notification or an alarm. You can look back at your progress, % complete, and its good. Had ti buy premium for more than 7(?) Habits I think but it's well worth the cost.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Appreciate your positive feedback! It's great to know you enjoy the app. For any questions or suggestions, please email us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com. üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: Love it! It's been helping me keep track of my habits, and when setting new ones, putting an alarm as a reminder is great! I say that because even when you silence your notifications, the alarms still go off with sound so no matter what you do to try and blow it off, it makes you focus and keep at it. It won't let you quit. It's something I struggle to do. I set things up to better myself but I always end up quitting half way through, and this app won't let me.

There's one bug that's unfortunate. The stopwatch is highly inaccurate when outside the app/sleeping screen, so it's hard to keep track of how much time you're actually putting into the goals. I tested if the watch was inaccurate, and after about 2~ minutes outside the app, I think the timer stops counting, since the stopwatch time only changed 2 minutes after I externally timed ~30 minutes. Other than that, it's wonderful! Bought premium as well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mary: Thank you for your feedback! The device is blocking the timer process. Please, contact us at habitnow.apps@gmail.com and we'll help you to configure the app to work in the background.

scraped_reviews.content: It beautifully displays, tracks, and reports all of my important habits that I want to develop. Unfortunately, it doesn't have an option to set recurring tasks - things that I need to do regularly, but that aren't necessarily vital to my personal development. I paid for the full version, but actually stopped using it because I don't like that it won't differentiate between a habit and a recurring task. Looking for something to better suit my needs ...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Summarah: We programmed habits exactly as repeating tasks. We highly suggest using them instead. If you have any doubts or suggestions contact us to Habitnow.apps@gmail.com and we'll be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: It's like someone else is watching your habits to keep you in check so you can create new habits, without someone telling you have to to where you don't want to do it. The set up is perfect abd easily customizable even without paying for the premium. Definitely would recommend. No annoying ads getting in the way of running the app for what you need.

i like that this app is easy to use, without much of a learning curve. great and simple functionality! i can track all of my recurring tasks, one-time tasks, and habits, all in one place. awesome. my only complaint is that I can't mark a recurring task as complete until the day it's scheduled - so if, e.g., i have a bill due on Oct 25 and I pay it on Oct 15, i cannot yet mark it as completed. regardless, though, i paid for the premium version, and i almost never pay for apps. it's just great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your feedback Kelly! We're actively working to add new frequencies based on the users suggestions. New updates are coming soon üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this app so far, it has a clean look and is simple to use, without the unnecessary frills that clutter up some similar apps. I also love that it's a one-time payment for premium rather than a subscription! The only thing I wish it had is an option to leave completed tasks/habits showing on the list, but have them faded or grayed out. I like being able to see what I've done today, but the little checkbox isn't enough for my brain to seperate them out from the tasks I have left to do

This app is super easy to use, helps me stay on top of tasks, and offers a good selection of options. It would be nicer if they had more options for tasks. Unfortunately you have to pay for some of the extra things like having unlimited habit creations. It limits to about 8 for the free version. Overall, great app üëç even with the limited amount of tasks, this is the best one out there. Plus there's no ads üòÄ

This is the best app ever for someone who loves to track habits and tasks. The widget feature is amazing. The fact that you can set a habit to occur a certain amount of times in a certain period (3x/week, 4x/month, etc) is amazing. My only feedback is to be able to track the number of something without having a minimum of 1. E.g. I want to not drink alcohol most days, but when I do drink I want to track how much I drank. But don't want to set a minimum of 1 cus really it should be 0.

I like what this app has to offer. However, there is one thing I would change. I have set up a few weekly and monthly goals as checklists and unfortunately, if I don't mark all items on the checklist by the end of a respective day, the habit is marked as failed/incomplete and the checklist resets. I would love an update that allows for checklist progress to carry over throughout a desired period (week, month, etc) so as to be reset/deemed as failed only when the week/month/etc has passed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback Xpoz! We're currently working on new pending frequencies for habits with checklists. We'll add them in the next app update üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: I looked at a lot of habit tracking apps and this one was the closest I've found to what I was looking for. Unless I missed how/where to do them, there are three things I wish I could do in the app. First, create custom categories/subcategories, especially under health. Second, edit start dates without having to delete and retype to correct. Three, have the ability to add notes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lee: To add a note, long tap on any habit entry in the to-do list or any habit calendar. We are working on a multi-track feature to add more that one schedule for a habit. After that, we will start to work on categories edition and online backups. Thank you for your review!

scraped_reviews.content: I downloaded habit now to get myself healthy again. I needed an easy way to keep track of how well I'm doing for certain goals like stretching every morning, drinking water ect. Being able to look and see if your if your improving or not is great. I paid for premium and love it. Keep up the good work! NEW PAID USER TIPS! Look closely at everything! Play around in your habit settings. You can customize a lot more than you think at first glance. Alarms, category/icon creation, widgets ect..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your great review Cian. We are working to add many useful features soon! üôÇ

title: Airbrush: Face & Photo Editor
description:
üì∏ Master Your Selfie Game with AirBrush ‚Äì The Ultimate Photo and Video Editor! Unlock Your Full Creative Power ‚ú® 300+ exclusive presets & makeup looks üé® 400+ filters and stunning effects üé≠ Unlimited access to all stylized tools üîì 100+ premium-only features & retouch options üì∑ Join millions of users who trust AirBrush to edit their photos & videos with ease! üì• Download AirBrush now & start creating stunning selfies & videos today!

üì∏ Master Your Selfie Game with AirBrush ‚Äì The Ultimate Photo and Video Editor! With our easy-to-use features, you can master your face, hair, body and backgrounds with AI-powered tools designed to enhance your natural beauty while maintaining your authentic charm.

‚ú® EXCELLENCE IN EVERY SHOT
‚úî AI Retouch ‚Äì Upgrade your portraits with AI precision automatically, refining every detail to perfection.
‚úî Teeth Whitening ‚Äì Brighten your smile instantly.
‚úî Blemish Removal ‚Äì Instantly erases acne & imperfections for flawless skin.
‚úî Smooth ‚Äì Soften wrinkles and even out skin tones for a youthful glow.
‚úî Highlighter ‚Äì Accentuate your best features with added texture & glow.
‚úî Reshape ‚Äì Fine-tune your face & body proportions effortlessly.
‚úî Contouring ‚Äì Enhance your facial contours to always look your best.
‚úî Eye Enhancer ‚Äì Fix red-eye, remove under-eye shadows, or change eye color.
‚úî Virtual Makeup ‚Äì Apply AI-powered makeup for a polished look.
‚úî Hairstyling ‚Äì Discover fresh hair colors & trendy hair styles ‚Äî from bold highlights to soft waves in AirBrush.

üé® SPARK YOUR IMAGINATION
- Background Editing ‚Äì Blur, replace, or enhance your background with ease.
- AI Eraser ‚Äì Remove unwanted objects in seconds.
- AI Enhancer ‚Äì Adjust brightness, saturation, & temperature automatically.
- Filters & Effects ‚Äì Transform your photos with stunning filters & artistic effects.
- AI Repair ‚Äì Restores low-quality images and brings every detail back to life.

üìπ VIDEO SELFIES REIMAGINED
- Face Retouch ‚Äì Apply real-time beautification to your videos.
- Object Removal ‚Äì Remove distractions from your scenes.
- Quality Enhancement ‚Äì Boost video clarity for a crisp & cinematic look.

üòä ENJOYMENT WITH AI
- Pro Headshots ‚Äì Generate studio-quality headshots instantly.
- Mood Swapper ‚Äì Change expressions with AI-powered mood adjustments.
- Style Explorer ‚Äì See yourself in different styles & artistic portraits.

Unlock Your Full Creative Power
‚ú® 300+ exclusive presets & makeup looks
üé® 400+ filters and stunning effects
üé≠ Unlimited access to all stylized tools
üîì 100+ premium-only features & retouch options

üì∑ Join millions of users who trust AirBrush to edit their photos & videos with ease! Whether you're making a quick touch-up or a full makeover, AirBrush gives you the best result.

üì• Download AirBrush now & start creating stunning selfies & videos today!

summary: Change hairstyle, whiten teeth, smooth skin, reshape body & erase acne

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a member since 2022. I loved this app and had a subscription for quite some time. Now the app is unusable. It will not access any of the pictures on my phone. I can only modify ones I take with my camera and that's irritating. I am so disappointed. I've done everything I can to get it to load but nope. I'm not about to get another subscription just to see if it fixes the issue. edited to add... uninstalling and reinstalling helped so I bumped up to 3 star as I am still wary.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre really sorry for the trouble you experienced accessing your photos. Our team has identified the cause, and a fix will be included in the next app update.

scraped_reviews.content: I loved this app so much, I even paid for the subscription, but lately the AI eraser has not brrb working, which I used the most. I updated the app and my phone, but still no. I have paid for multiple months even though it hasn't been working because I hoped it was a glitch, but it's a waste of money now since I hardly use the app anymore and I've canceled my subscription. I hope they fix it as it's been like this for over a month at least
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Apologies for the trouble! üß° To help us resolve your issue, please create a screen recording demonstrating the problem and send it through Help Center in AirBrush app. Your cooperation is invaluable in improving our app. Thank you! ‚ú®üß°

scraped_reviews.content: Greedy. I've used this app for many years. It was the first downloaded on every new device. I used it for work. lately, it's become almost unusable due to all of the greed of the app. The insufferable video ads just to save your photo to your gallery. The high cost. It crashes now due to ads you can't close even after viewing. I'm so sad to see it change so much. I always wrap talked FaceTune app over this to anyone but now I found myself making the switch myself. it's cheaper and less ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for using AirBrush. We understand that ads can sometimes disrupt your photo editing experience, and we appreciate you sharing your thoughts with us. I will be bringing it to the attention of our product development team to consider how we can improve moving forward.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app for years and the AI filters were the best I've ever seen. They still made you look natural. After the last update that's stopped and now the filters make you look fake and almost cartoonish. I'll be looking for a different app if they don't change back the "upgraded" AI. It's pretty much useless now. and the hair color changer is basically only the same color blonde and all the reds are pink. Stop fixing things that aren't broken.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry about your disappointing experience. If you're experiencing issues, please try reinstalling the app. Should the problem continue, reach out via Settings ‚Üí Help Center ‚Üí Send Feedback with a screen recording of the issue. This will aid us in providing a quicker resolution. üôèüß°

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app... easy to use, basic and did a great job of photo editing. I can do most things I want in Photoshop but this was a time saver for a quick filter to clean up photo artifacts. Sadly, the features have no drastically improved but the price is unreasonable for what it is. Last year I subscribed for less than $30 a year. Now it's over $40. Apps like this will quickly discover there is a point when you "price yourself out of the market." Time to look for something else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry about your disappointing experience. We will try to offer a better user experience in the future versions of our app. Hope you can enjoy our app again in the future. Thank you for your support.

scraped_reviews.content: Update 2 - What a nightmare, this is by far one of the trickiest apps to get an actual human or find any account information. Update 1 - the article didn't do anything to resolve the situation, it just wasted my time. Watch your credit card!! They have charged me 3 times for the annual fee! I disputed and they didn't reverse it, got charged again so I disputed it again and now I won the dispute but they canceled my subscription. Time to find another app, be warned that this one is a scam!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! For issues accessing Premium after purchase, please consult our help article: https://help.airbrush.com/hc/articles/22809417902615
Still need help? Navigate to Help Center in the app. We're here to assist you! Thank you üß°

scraped_reviews.content: this is a great app I have used for many years. slowly over time they took away features available to the free version. That's fine. I understand that everyone needs to make money. When I decided to subscribe, my payment wouldn't go through! it kept giving me some error and blaming the Play store. gave up and tried a competing photo editing app, and it took my payment with no problem, so it's clearly not the Play store, but this app that can't get its act together for payment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry about your disappointing experience. If you're experiencing issues, please try reinstalling the app. Should the problem continue, reach out via Settings ‚Üí Help Center ‚Üí Send Feedback with a screen recording of the issue. This will aid us in providing a quicker resolution. üôèüß°

scraped_reviews.content: After years and years of using this app, enjoying it and recommending it to everyone, I can't stand behind it any longer. It was fantastic, easy to use, lots of helpful tools. But in the last year or so something changed. IDK if it's new leadership or what. Basic tools that were once available became locked behind a paywall üíé I would understand if it was a new feature, but locking things that were once free is obnoxiously greedy. Hope you turn things around and do better. Off to find a new one
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback!

We're sorry for any inconvenience this update might've caused you üôà Please remember AirBrush has a variety of great free tools to edit your pics & selfies!

For more inspo on how to use our free features go to üëâüèº https://appairbrush.com/the-best-free-airbrush-tools/

scraped_reviews.content: Update: I get that they need ads, like 30 sec or less. But, I just timed one at 4 minutes long. üëéüëéüëé This used to be an amazing app. When I first downloaded the app, the majority of the tools were free. Slowly they started changing the free features to paid features, until there's barely any features available to use without paying a subscription. Now you have to watch long ads to use the features or save your photo. I'm definitely ready to switch to a different photo editing app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, üò¶Ô∏èwe usually don't have advertisements that are as long as the one you mentioned. There might be an issue with it. Could you please send us a message through the Help Center in the app? This will allow us to access your ad records and resolve any problems. ‚ù§Ô∏èThank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app for over 5 years, I loved how simple it was and it never had too many ads. I've even paid for it off and on for the premium features. Lately it has become overrun with ads. Even then I stayed by this app. My final straw was requiring an additional ad just to remove the watermark from my pictures. The ads are long and will immediately download to your phone if you mistakenly tap anywhere on your screen during the 2 minutes you're stuck watching them. Un-installed :(

Lots of feature were free and with each update they take more and more away. So finally I caved and purchased the subscription, then a couple weeks later is said I had to purchase it again, so I thought maybe I did something wrong. I went ahead and purchased the subscription again. Then about a week later (today) I went to edit a photo and it AGAIN said I had to purchase the subscription. I went and checked my Google Play subscriptions and boom two recurring subscriptions to this app! Scam!!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We're sorry for any inconvenience this update might've caused you. Please remeber AirBrush has a variety of great free tools to edit your pics & selfies! Try out Acne, Blur, Stretch, Filters, and many others. For tips and tricks go to https://appairbrush.com/airbrushs-free-features/

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be my favorite free app for editing pics. I even purchased some of the extra filters in the past to support it. But since then, the incessant ads have become absolutely unbearable. Ads after trying to save, extra ads after using certain features that used to be fully free, then suddenly it'll force a watermark onto your photo until you watch a whole other ad without skipping. I can handle some banners and skippable ads, but this is an insane amount. I'm switching to a different app.

This app was perfect until February. It lost my subscription, that I paid for in January! I hit "restore purchases" and nothing changed. I logged out and logged back in (and yep, I'm logged into the correct account, so that's not the problem), i uninstalled and reinstalled. I was told by customer support on 2/11 that they were aware of the problem and trying to fix it, but it hasn't changed and they still keep trying to charge me for something I already paid for a year of and cannot access.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for reaching out to us! ‚ú®

We are aware of this bug and we are currently working to fix it. Please bear with us while we find a solution.

Thanks for your support and patience üß°

scraped_reviews.content: I am editing my rating from 2020 from a 5 to a 2 because since I've had this app, one by one, they took away all the things you could use for free. Now, all you can do is give yourself a tan and use a handful of filters. Basically, it is less than what your phone photo gallery offers for editing options. To have to pay a price for a subscription to use all other tools is ridiculous. What happened to just watching an ad? I really wish that it was the way it used to be! Very disappointing!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback!

We're sorry for any inconvenience this update might've caused you üôà Please remember AirBrush has a variety of great free tools to edit your pics & selfies!

For more inspo on how to use our free features go to üëâüèº https://appairbrush.com/the-best-free-airbrush-tools/

scraped_reviews.content: First of all, I want clarify! This is the best free photo editor of tried.Ive.If you want to doctor up a selfie and put yourself in a cool background of your choice. And it does so much more. That is on my android phone. I thougt I get more creative by downloading "aitbrush" onto my Chromebook. I soon discovered it almost imposible to even zoom in and out. I didnt get to far, before I just uninstalled. I love your app. I wish I could use it with a mouse on a bigger screen..

This rating USED to be 5 stars. This was my main editing app even with the ads. As of a couple days ago, they put a massive amount of features that were available behind a paywall. What a joke. There were plenty of features that were already unavailable for free use and were a perk of subscribing. Forcing users to pay by removing a lot of basic tools? Nah. Good luck!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi! "Magic" has the beloved free feature we all know and new premium features that might have activated automatically.
To use free "Magic", please tap on the premium features marked with a small badge and move the sliding bar to 0, afterward try to save your photo.

scraped_reviews.content: One of the best editing app! Easy to figure out and You get an outrageous amount of fabulous options with out having to pay anything. NO ADDS while you're using the app, when you click save, then you'll see a 4 second add.. they have a subscription option. I think its $1.99 a month, if you pay 22 for the YEAR. Which is definitely worth it.

I love this app for basic editing. However, their AI Avatars should not have been released if it doesn't work. ESPECIALLY if you are going to charge people money for it. I just lost ten dollars because of this. The app makes you pay for the avatars before they're generated like most apps do, but then you get an error that says the photos can not be found or do not exist. Every time. It's pretty frustrating. I'm a long time user. Fix this!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are sorry to hear about this technical issue.

For faster resolution, please contact us from within the app:

- Go to Settings and tap on ""Report a Problem""
- Fill in the form with:
‚úîÔ∏è A screenshot or video of the issue
‚úîÔ∏è The steps leading up to the issue
‚úîÔ∏è The device and version of the app you are using

scraped_reviews.content: Do you like paying for features constantly that you won't get to use? Then this is the app for you! And when the "restore purchases" inevitably doesn't work like so many other reviews also state, the company just endlessly tells you to uninstall and reinstall. I would give zero stars if possible. I shouldn't have to reinstall an app 20 times a month to actually use my subscription. UPDATE: Canceled subscription, not worth it to be constantly told you aren't subscribed to something you are paying
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for the inconvenience. To further assist you, please contact us from within the app. Go to settings (3 line icon), tap on "Contact Us", and tap the orange envelope ‚úâÔ∏è. Fill in the form with the issue, the steps leading up to it, a screenshot or video, and the type of device and version of the app.

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for some of the features but now items that used to be free they charge for. Every update more items tend to be added to the charge list so they are outpricing me, and in the process, losing customers who pay for some things but don't want to keep shelling out money for features that aren't even new. So instead of getting some of my money, they will be getting none of it due to their own greed.

Wow.... Really? They took things that were completely free before and made it to where you had to pay for them. That is not cool. I'll be finding another app now. Reshape, resize and magic were all free to use and now they decided to make you pay for them while in other apps that feature is free. NOT worth it and not okay to take the free items away.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We're sorry for any inconvenience this update might've caused you. Please remeber AirBrush has a variety of great free tools to edit your pics & selfies! Try out Acne, Blur, Stretch, Filters, and many others. For tips and tricks go to https://appairbrush.com/airbrushs-free-features/

scraped_reviews.content: I've had this app downloaded to my phone for years, and was using it for years... Until now. I have uninstalled it as of yesterday, due to the many features that used to be free & now, you have to pay for almost everything in the app. And you can't screenshot and then go back and edit your photos that way because of "security reasons".... It's just ridiculous.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback!

We're sorry for any inconvenience this update might've caused you üôà Please remember AirBrush has a variety of great free tools to edit your pics & selfies!

For more inspo on how to use our free features go to üëâüèº https://appairbrush.com/the-best-free-airbrush-tools/

scraped_reviews.content: Used to love, but the greed is getting real lol. There's basically nothing I use that's free anymore, everything that is free is in my phone's built in editor already at this point. I'd pay a few bucks for this but not what they want. Their pop ups to pay are over the top now too. I don't want to crazily change what I look like, but sometimes you need to touch up little things from a bad angle, lighting, or a pimple lol...and this was my go to for that. Guess it's time to look for a new one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback!

We're sorry for any inconvenience this update might've caused you üôà Please remember AirBrush has a variety of great free tools to edit your pics & selfies!

For more inspo on how to use our free features go to üëâüèº https://appairbrush.com/the-best-free-airbrush-tools/

scraped_reviews.content: I first downloaded this app in 2016, when it had its starting basic features and used it for everything. There used to be a premium purchase for around $20 that unlocked all the features, which I paid for. Now, it's a subscription based, I get constant pop ups to get premium again and I no longer have access to the features I originally paid for. You used to be able to save your images but now you can't even do that without having to watch an ad. I'm switching to another editing app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any inconvenience. üß° For help with restoring purchases, please see this guide: https://help.airbrush.com/hc/en-us/articles/22809417902615-How-to-Restore-My-Membership. If issues persist, head to "Help Center" in AirBrush and email us the details of your problem. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I loved this app and recommended it to everyone... that is until they started charging for just about every feature. It's honestly to the point where using the photo editor on my phone is better. Basically all you're getting is crop, vignet, some filters (not all are free), and a few other small features you can pretty much find anywhere else. I didn't mind "paying" by watching ads or sharing on social media, but paying for some small editing features isn't worth the money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Airbrush has a lot of great free tools available to make your pic & selfie wonderful! Try out Acne, Blur, Reshape, Resize, Stretch, Filters, and many others. For tips and tricks go to http://appairbrush.com/airbrushs-free-features/

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: since the last update, a lot of previous options have stopworking. I can no longer edit the makeups, when I select filters, they're all blank. I would've given 5 stars, but some free options, now cost money. I also think if I could just pay a reasonable amount of $ one time to purchase everything, I'd be more willing to pay, but I'm not interested in a monthly subscription!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please try to uninstall and reinstall the app. To further assist you, please send us an email to support@appairbrush.com with a screenshot and the steps you took for the bug to appear, as well as the type of device and version of the app. We're happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I seriously love this app and I really want to rate it 5 stars but I was just about to purchase the full version until I noticed how much memory it uses per hour. If I could move the app itself to my memory card that would help a lot but regardless of where it's saved, it still uses a lot of memory and I have limited ram space so I'm uninstalling. It's a shame, though. I love the way my photos turned out after just 3 clicks
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for this suggestion! Let us forward your considerations to our development team - we are constantly working to improve our app. Thank you for your comment!

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATED REVIEW #3 - I used this for years. However, They just locked out some of the most basic functions. They have done this before as well. Two of the primary tools I have used for the past several years were just locked out today. The vague brushes, lowering of image quality, inability to recognize a face quite often, and some of the other available features just do utterly nothing whatsoever. More and more tools keep getting locked out, only for paid users. Not worth it! I'm out!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for reaching out to us!
We are sorry to hear the update on the features wasn't working as it should be. This little problem has been fixed in our latest app version. Don't forget to update your app to the latest version so you can see the improvements üòâ

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be my favorite app. But have not been able to use it now for a month. I've been emailing support for a month and none of their solutions have helped and all I get now are template emails. A vicious cycle. It's horrible. I think I know why. They want you to rate the app which I can not using work identity. Im not allowed. But it appears when you keep declining to rate it they punish you. This happened to me with another app. So now I have to call credit card company to get refund.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are sorry to hear about this situation, but don't worry, it's very easy to fix it! Just go to Settings from the home page menu and select ""Restore Purchases""

‚ö†Ô∏èIt's very important to make sure you're logged into the same account you used to make the purchase ‚ö†Ô∏è

If this doesn't work, uninstall and reinstall the app, then try again

scraped_reviews.content: This was my FAVORITE photo app. I have had premium for 3 years. It's not up for renewal until the end of April. I haven't been able to use my premium features in a month. Restore purchases doesn't work. Uninstall/Reinstall doesn't work. Custom service doesn't help. I want this fixed ASAP and credit for the time lost. I probably won't be renewing because of this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for reaching out to us! ‚ú®

We are aware of this bug and we are currently working to fix it. Please bear with us while we find a solution.

Thanks for your support and patience üß°

scraped_reviews.content: Far and above the best, free editor app I've used. Disabled it by accident & just now found it again. So excited to do some touch ups, like photo tan, get some lighting issues fixed, and play with the filters. I'm not a pro, but with this gem, you can't tell by my pics. I like the ads, for ads. I plan to get some! Remember, without the ads they you can't make money & offer cool, free apps.

Most of the tools are for the pro version; my review is for the free one. This app is fine for a quick edit. Things I wish it had: The ability to choose where it saves to. Ability to input text. When cropping, the edges that you pull should be a different color; they're sometimes hard to see and move. Mostly, I use this tool to crop photos and I use the acne tool to remove blemishes.

Best selfie app I've tried so far. Smart and intuitive. Also great for editing photos after taken with regular camera or elsewhere. Love how if you find a favorite filter, you can leave it set to that one and the next time you open the camera feature it's already preset. Also filters are adjustable from 0-100% intensity, and can be layered on top of one another. 5 stars right out the gate ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're glad that you like the app! Please let us know if there's anything else you'd like to see in future updates. We value your suggestions and are always working to improve our app.

scraped_reviews.content: Could be the best photo editor, but my only complaint and what keeps me going back to my other app over this one is the lack of variety in filters and having to pay for certain features that are free in Candy cam. Regardless I'm still a huge fan, but if you're going to charge a fee, give us more incentive to pay for your "unique|quality" product over someone else's or make it more affordable. most people will not pay more than $3-4 for an app as an impulse buy. It is easily a 5+start app w| that
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the suggestion! We'll forward your considerations to our development team. We are constantly working to improve our app and your feedback will help us to continue building a better AirBrush.

scraped_reviews.content: Great options, can make your pictures look beautiful. But there are a lot of extras not available unless you are willing to go "VIP" & that means paying at least $13 for only 3 months use. For a year its $28. I find this ridiculous. I would've considered the $28 if I'd be a permanent VIP user, but to pay it every year? No. ü§îüëé You also can't save photos in the same resolution as its original, which is crappy. I did a pic that was 1920x1080 & it saved at 900x1600. Yes my settings are set at HD.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your message. Our app has a lot of great free tools available to make your photos wonderful! Some of our tools are available to unlock and you can try them for free. And we are working to improve image quality in next updates.

scraped_reviews.content: This app was a long time favorite & mostly the only one I used. Now I can't save a basic filtered edit anymore bc I'm being told to pay for it. I slowly saw the changes but didn't expect to see the entire damn app become a "premium" expense. There's so many good apps out there that I can use, looks like my sign to delete & move on has come. Such a shame. I refuse to pay for something as petty as a filter for a picture. Everything now has to be paid for if you want to save anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Kiki, which filters where you trying to use? You can actually download more free filter packs if you go to the "+", and then tap on Free. Also, Airbrush has a lot of great free tools available to make your pic & selfie wonderful! Try out Acne, Blur, Reshape, Resize, Stretch, Filters, and many others. 
http://appairbrush.com/?s=free

scraped_reviews.content: The app works really well and has alot of cool features. However, keep in mind most of them are only useable if you pay and while it isn't too expensive per year I don't feel it's fully worth the money. There is alot you can't do like remove objects from photos or flip the orientation of special filters. Because of this, I find myself using it only here and there and it's often in combination with another photo editor.

This photo editor/enhancer is easy to use and gives the user quite a bit of control. It is quick and enjoyable to use! "Automated" features can be semi-customized by altering the intensity/area of coverage. The makeup feature is awesome, after turning it down by a 3rd on each of the selections. This holds true from lighter to darker skin tones. The app saves to your gallery. This is opposed to the many photo editors that save pics to an obscure location.

Pretty much anything you want to do costs additional money and not even a reasonable fee but a subscription. I would pay a reasonable price to unlock certain features. Don't need all of it and the subscription price is recurring and too steep. Consider a one time fee and a la carte feature unlocking. It also needs a clone brush badly, which it doesn't have. About all its good for is smoothing and "blemish removal".

I'M OUT. After 2 years almost no features are free anymore. The app is decent (it's no Photoshop). Fairly simple but with more-than basic features. While understanding the need to profit, I paid $27 (or so) for a year-long subscription (2 years ago)- that was a little high for only 1 year on a simple edit app. That should have been enough for a few years access at least. Instead, here I am- deleting an app I spent 30 bucks on cuz I can't even use it anymore. Off to find a different one I guess.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:

scraped_reviews.content: I've tried many photo editing apps, but this is by far the best one. It has tons of free options. I gave it 4 stars cuz it could include more free options for makeup, especially lip colors. For the options that cost money, I just use the tool on my photo and take a screenshot of the photo, since you have to pay for those options to be able to save it. Then, just crop all the side stuff out!!!!

Decent editing app. I just see no reason why the image needs to be compressed so much when you save it, with the compression getting worse the more you do to it. (Changing highlights, saturation, adding filters, etc.) I'm considering switching to something else because they just get so crusty after being put through this app. Disappointing. Everything else is nice, but if I'm paying money to use this, I'd want my pictures to be higher quality.

app works very well for most picture editing. Ive discovered suddenly however, that after using it for over a year, they want me to pay a ridiculous subscription fee.....to use several editing options, that were disabled out of no where. i previously paid extra to get the pro version, just to avoid this kind of trickery. obviously they don't honor previous purchased ..don't waste your time with this app!

title: BiliBili -HD Anime, Videos
description:
About this app

The TOP 1 Anime Platform in Southeast Asia, with the 2000+ licensed anime titles, offers you the ultimate anime viewing experience with multilingual support. 

BiliBili is not just about anime‚Äîit's your gateway to a thriving community filled with diverse, high-quality UGC. Dive into a world where creativity and connection come alive!

Explore a New World of Short Dramas

Bilibili now brings you hundreds of high-quality short dramas‚Äîconcise, emotional, and endlessly binge-worthy. Dive into new life stories in just minutes. Alongside our vast anime library, the community is buzzing with even more to watch, share, and love.

Catch October 2025 releases, now streaming!

SPY x FAMILY Season 3ÔºöWatch how this secretive family continues to hide their true identities 

One-Punch Man (Season 3)ÔºöAs Saitama grows stronger, more hidden secrets behind the battles will be revealed

TOUGEN ANKI Ôºö Can a descendant of Oni rewrite his destiny? 

Campfire Cooking in Another World with My Absurd Skill Season 2ÔºöWith new companions joining the journey, the otherworldly gourmet adventure begins again!

Enjoy timeless favorites, watch some of them for free

One Piece, Naruto: Shippuden, Hunter x Hunter, BLEACH, Detective Conan, SPY√óFAMILY, Jujutsu Kaisen, Black Clover, Oshi No Ko, Dragon Ball Z, Attack on Titan, Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba, Blue Lock, Haikyuu!, Tokyo Revengers, The Eminence in Shadow, Solo Leveling, Horimiya, Sword Art Online, Chainsaw Man, WIND BREAKER, Heaven Official's Blessing, The Daily Life of the Immortal King, etc.

title: Lezhin Comics - Daily Releases
description:
## New Comics Every Day
We curate the highest quality content and bring them to you everyday (5:00am PST/ 6:00am PDT). Come back every day for something new, 365 days a year.

## Exclusive Titles
We bring you exclusive titles from top talent in the webtoon industry!
We have something for absolutely anybody - from office workers to students. Experience the hottest new titles from the giants to crazy, new ideas from the up-and-coming writers and artists. Only on Lezhin!

## Free Episodes
We provide free content everyday. Whether you're into romance, horror, action, or even something queer, come back everyday to check what we're offering for free.

## Genres Galore - BL, GL, Gore, Mystery, Martial Arts, and Many More
For hardcore comic fans and new readers alike, we are the only premium webtoon service with every genre imaginable - even BL, GL, and gore for comic maniacs!

## Save and Read HD Quality Comics
All Lezhin Comics are available in HD image quality. Collect your favorite picks in 'My Library'. Experience comics in crisp HD on your smartphone.

## Sync between Desktop PC and Mobile App
Sync your reading lists and purchases across desktop internet and your app. Continue reading seamlessly from home on your PC, at work, while commuting on your smartphone - wherever, whenever, however. Read Lezhin Comics on a large screen on our desktop website, then switch to your smartphone app and continue reading where you left off!

## Manage your Reading Lists on 'My Library'
Keep track of the comics that you want to read for life by managing 'My Library'. A couple of taps, and you're good to go!

## Easy to Navigate, Easy to Search
Finding comics from our vast collection is easy as 1-2-3. Hit the 'Search' button, find what you like, and start reading!

## Follow Us
Facebook: facebook.com/lzhncomics
Official blog: social.lezhin.com
 
* Sign Up and Password Recovery Support 
You need to sign up to enjoy Lezhin Comics.
- You can reset your password any time.

* Payment Support 
- If you experience payment errors contact help@lezhin.com and we'll get it fixed immediately. 
- Customer Support hours: M~F 10:00am - 6:00pm (KST)

* Lezhin Comics Customer Support: help@lezhin.com

summary: +Not your everyday comic. Everyday.

scraped_reviews.content: It's easier to read comics in the app, but it's harder to find them. For example, half of my subscribed items do not show up in the app. Also, when I search for a comic most of the time it only shows me the introduction/free sample. If I want to read/subscribe to the whole thing, I have to go the website and buy it there first. Even then, it rarely shows up in my subscribed list, so I have to find it via my purchases or just use the webpage version instead. Super annoying.

I enjoy and use it for its content, but its sales and bundles are of terrible value. "Points" are useless, because you can't redeem them without also spending a ridiculous amount of money. It's roughly one dollar per chapter, and the series on average have 60+ chapters each. Even on sale, they can total 2000+ coins, which is still more than forty dollars. For that much money, I'd at least like to know how much the author is actually being paid.

Why did my previous review get deleted? Look, the comics on Lezhin are good. The platform is not very good, which makes the high prices frustrating. I'm willing to pay, but they clearly need to invest more in infrastructure, usability, customer service, advertising, etc. which is making me want to go elsewhere. This is not about not being able to read mature content in the app, I know that's not Lezhin's fault.

I really enjoy the app! It has great stories and it's really easy to use! My only problem is that I wish there was more ways to unlock episodes instead of coins like watch a ad get a certain amount of coins or share to a friend or even like a minigame section! I just think it could make it more memorable to come back to as well! Like "Hey, I should go on that really cool app to read my comic,I can't wait to play *Insert game name*!",You know?Just a thought...but otherwise,10/10! 100% 5 stars! :)

scraped_reviews.content: I really enjoy the variety of webtoons available in this app. It took me a while to figure out the layout, but the app works fairly well and is stable. Right now it seems that each version is considered separate from each other, so it looks like the Korean versions must be purchased separately from the English versions of the same comic. I'd like to access all languages.

It is also a little annoying how it gives coins specifically for certain comics but shows those coins in one section so I dont know how many I actually have. Other than that it is a great app 4/5 stars

It usually takes about 3 chapters to get into a book, and im not ab to pay $100 to unlock the full comic. Whats the point of having an app if it just brings you to the website? Also, coins are hard to get without paying. Maybe you should do a login system where you get a certain amount of coins each day.

Just saying, overall this is actually a nice place to read for my Fujoshi mind.

scraped_reviews.content: For you to get access for any of the chapters, you have to pay for coins to unlock chapters. To me, who ever made this app, they are one, money hungry and two, haven't thought about their life choices very carefully. They are going to be pissing off a lot of people, especially those who fell for this on ads. I found out about this on a YouTube ad and became interested, but didn't realize that I have to pay for chapters of a story that I wanted to read. I am very disappointed and hope that the developer(s) have some sense reading this.

Really good stories. I don't like the coin system, though I know everyone says it. Some good ways to get coins: Daily login rewards, watch paid advertising, get some after a certain amount of chapters are read, special events, reading for a set amount of time, etc. Everything else is spot on, and when the coin issue is resolved I will happily give this app 5 stars. Edit: There is a problem with one of the comics I'm reading. (A Guy Like You) I had previously read up to episode 5, free of charge, but now when I get on to read it there is only episode 1 and 2; episodes 3 - 5 is locked and I have to spend 3 coins to unlock them again. Please fix this, thanks.

I really like the comics that are offered. My problem is the fact that it just costs too much to read. The free coin zone also just takes too much time with little reward at the end. scraped_reviews.content: The comics are absolutely amazing. The comics on Lezhin arent the problem, but the payment method. The coin system is out of date and way too much for what you're getting. Most comics I read are over 100 chapters, meaning it can cost over 50$ for one story. The free coins also dont work well. I completed a high end one for over 200 coins and I received none. I double checked I completed the task correctly and I did, but received nothing. I wouldnt recommend this app.

Don't use this app if it doesn't get fixed. Their coins are horribly expensive and free doesn't work anymore.

The coin process is a bit confusing and the only way to get a good amount of coins would be to play games or buy things online consistently. It's troublesome and tiring for the most part. Otherwise the app is pretty enjoyable.

title: Boddle
description:
Boddle is an interactive 3D game that makes learning and practicing math, reading, and science both fun and engaging!

Used by thousands of schools, teachers, parents and students, Boddle is proven to provide young learners with healthy screen time while providing adults with the insight and assurance of learning progress.
 
ENGAGING, EFFECTIVE, TRANSFORMATIVE
- Filled with thousands of math and reading questions, lessons, and instructions
- Unique bottle-headed game avatars that kids love, adore, and grow with
- Fun mini-games and awesome rewards to increase engagement and motivation while learning

PERSONALIZED LEARNING
- Using adaptive learning technology (AI), our program tailors instruction and practice to each child at their very own pace.
- Learning gaps are automatically identified and addressed while providing parents and teachers with real-time reports the moment they appear.

CURRICULUM DEVELOPED BY EXPERTS
Our team of instructional designers and educators have developed over 100,000+ math questions and lesson videos that aligns to standards and skills that are trusted by schools and parents at home.

REPORTING FOR PARENTS AND TEACHERS
Boddle comes with both a classroom (teacher) and a home (parent) app that provides teachers and parents insight on each learner's 1) progress and growth, 2) any learning gaps found, and 3) overall game usage.

In addition, both teachers and parents can create and send in assignments and assessments that automatically gets graded and transformed into easy-to-view reports!


Boddle's bottle-headed characters uniquely are designed to let students know the importance of filling up with knowledge (like filling up a bottle), valuing others for the content of their character (like how bottles are valued for their content), and to pour back to help others (illustrated with pouring back out to grow plants in the game).

Backed by Google, Amazon, AT&T, Unity3D, and research!

title: MoneyLion: Banking & Cash Back
description:
Make better money decisions with MoneyLion. Access mobile banking, personal finance resources, personal loans, fast cash advances, & cashback rewards for extra money when you need it.

BANKING WITH ROARMONEY - GET PAID EARLY (UP TO 2 DAYS)¬≤
Fast forward to payday with RoarMoney‚Ñ† direct deposit. Open a RoarMoney banking account and invest your extra cash with Round Ups¬≥. Unlock cash advances up to $1000¬π with qualifying recurring direct deposits.

CASHBACK & REWARDS- MONEYLION WOW‚Å∑
Get your cash back and even earn rewards on big financial decisions or everyday spending. Access exclusive benefits like cell phone insurance, travel protection, and more.

CASH ADVANCES UP TO $500¬π
Access up to $500 of your paycheck, any day with Instacash¬Æ cash advances. Get money with no interest, no mandatory fees, & no credit check.

FAST LOAN OFFERS‚Åµ
Need to borrow money? Get personal loan offers from partners on the MoneyLion Marketplace. Compare personal loan offers, small loans, online loans, & savings accounts.

CREDIT BUILDER LOAN WITH A MEMBERSHIP‚Å∂
Credit Builder Loans up to $1,000 with no hard credit check. MoneyLion helps you earn rewards as you improve your credit health. Get alerts and report credit scores to all 3 bureaus; Equifax, Experian and TransUnion. 

MoneyLion is not affiliated with other money apps, loan apps, or instant cash advance apps such as Dave, SoFi, Ally, Chime, Self, Varo Bank, Possible Finance, Albert, Klover,, Earnin, Empower, Cleo, Brigit, Kikoff, Credit Sesame, Credit Karma or Credit One Bank

1 Instacash is a 0% APR cash advance service provided by MoneyLion. Your available Instacash advance limit will be displayed to you in the MoneyLion mobile app and may change from time to time. Your limit will be based on your direct deposits, account transaction history, and other factors as determined by MoneyLion. This service has no mandatory fees. You may leave an optional tip and pay an optional Turbo Fee for expedited funds delivery. For a $40 Instacash advance with a Turbo Fee of $4.99, your repayment amount will be $44.99. Generally, your scheduled repayment date will be your next direct deposit date which can range from weekly to monthly depending on your deposit cycle. An Instacash advance is a non-recourse product, not a personal loan, and there is no mandatory minimum or maximum timeframe for repayment; you will not be eligible to request a new advance until your outstanding balance is paid. See Membership Agreement and http://help.moneylion.com for additional terms, conditions, and eligibility requirements.

Increased Instacash limit requires recurring direct deposit into RoarMoney account. Instacash is an optional service offered by MoneyLion. Terms and eligibility requirements apply. 

2 With direct deposit. Faster access to funds is based on comparison of a paper check versus electronic Direct Deposit.

3 Round Ups is subject to terms and conditions. This optional service is offered by MoneyLion. You may be required to have certain MoneyLion accounts to use this feature.

5 MoneyLion displays personal loans in our marketplace with repayment terms from 12 months to 84 months and APR ranges from 5.99% to 35.99%. For example, if you receive a $10,000 loan with a 60-month term and a 16.21% APR, your required monthly payment would be $244.30 ($135.09 Principal + $109.21 Interest). Assuming all 60 payments are made on time, the total amount paid would be $14,657.87. All loan offers on the MoneyLion marketplace require your application and approval by the lender. Depending on the lender, other fees may apply, such as origination fees, or late payment fees. See lender‚Äôs terms and conditions for additional details. You may not qualify for the lowest rates or the highest offer amounts or may not qualify for a loan at all.

6 Credit Builder loans are made by either exempt or state-licensed subsidiaries of MoneyLion Inc. NMLS 1237506

249 W 17th St, 4th Fl, New York, NY 10011

scraped_reviews.content: I like this app. it has helped me several times when I'm in a pinch, BUT i HATE when it keeps asking for a tip!!! none of my other cash advance apps do that. when people have these apps, it's usually because we don't have any extra money... specifically to tip. it charges you extra to get it instantly. and it only lets me take out $100 at a time! it charges way too many fees on top of requesting tips!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Trust accepted. Thanks for the endorsement!

scraped_reviews.content: 0 STARS..Up until last month, this app was an amazing financial lifesaver; however, a few mnths ago, they attempted to charge me fees, claiming it wasn't paid when I received my instacash. Well after multiple attempts, I was finally refunded my money, but noticed the same charge to my bank acct yesterday w/out my authorization. In addition, they've also reduced my borrowing limit because I choose not to tip every time - which is quite expensive. If I could afford to, I wouldn't be borrowing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the frustration this has caused. Please copy and paste this link into your browser so we can follow up: https://mlion.info/customerhelp

scraped_reviews.content: I like how you can get a cash advance for a quite small fee if you're willing to wait a day or two, and the amount increases over time as you use the app. Plus you have a per transaction limit instead of a daily limit. The fees if you want an instant advance are kind of ridiculous though, so make sure you plan in advance if you think you'll need money.

Customer service on this app is actually so useless it blows my mind. I've been trying to get them to help me with my issue since August. They either straight up ignore me or point me to another service rep that might know more than the one I was talking with. It's a never ending annoyance loop. The games and reward system is a scam. Even after completing the tasks in the correct time frame, I still didn't receive the rewards earned. I wasted so much of my time and got nothing out of it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre very sorry for the frustration and lack of support you‚Äôve experienced. That‚Äôs not the experience we want for our members. Please copy and paste this link into a browser, and we'll reach out: https://mlion.info/customerhelp

scraped_reviews.content: This app is actually a really great tool for me as I'm trying to organize my finances a bit better. I can play games for some extra change, get a bonus $50 on top of my direct deposit from my job when I sign up, and get my own physical debit card like some of the other online banking apps. It's easy to use and is aesthetically pleasing as well. You can also look at your account balances all in one place, plus get advances on paychecks when needed. Cool app if you use it correctly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Cassidy, you're using the app like a pro. Rewards, tools, design‚Äîwe built it for power users like you.

scraped_reviews.content: I haven't been able to cash out my game rewards for the last 5 days. Uninstalled & reinstalled app, forced it closed, restarted my phone, every troubleshooting they gave me but just get an error message that says, "Error Oops, something went wrong. Please try again." And not even ONE of the 5 agents ive spoken to about the issue helped at all
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you had trouble with redeeming your rewards, Harleah. We want to look into this, and a Customer Advocate will reach out to you.

scraped_reviews.content: Nope. You basically can't cancel the membership fees that withdraw weekly. Every day the app says the payment is processing and I have to try back later to cancel after the payment processes. I asked for a manager = perpetual hold and no manager. My bank did a stop payment block them.

scraped_reviews.content: *Update* If I can change this to 0 star, I would.
