Still haven't gotten any follow after being told they would and it's been three days. Just be cautious when using this service that the customer service is bad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you had trouble getting a Credit Builder Plus loan, and we want to help out. Please copy and paste this link into a browser, and we'll reach out: https://mlion.info/customerhelp

scraped_reviews.content: It's a poor app. often offering loans or credit building services. once you're in though, soon realize you don't qualify for a lot of stuff, need to sign up for additional premium services and there's fees at every turn. Be careful on the cash advance service in this platform. often changes eligibility and/or amount available with regularity and vague explanation. Makes it look like you may have alot of money for cash advance but it charges exorbitant fees then have the audacity to ask for tips
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you haven't enjoyed your time with us, Christopher, and we're so grateful for your feedback! We'd appreciate a chance to speak with you about this. Please copy and paste this form into your web browser: https://mlion.info/customerhelp, once it's submitted, a Customer Advocate will contact you directly.

scraped_reviews.content: So many freaking fees. I use the advances to help when needed, but Jesus crist, if I could have just one fee instead of several, would be great. also asking to tip 3 times is ridiculous. I like the information it gives overall, but there are several apps where you can have a good amount of cash advance and only pay one cheap fee, unlike this one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hear your frustration about the fees and tips. Instacash has no interest charges, only the optional Turbo fee for faster delivery, and tips are never required. We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team as we work on improving the experience.

scraped_reviews.content: Very Intrusive, wont allow you to just select what you want and complete the agreed transaction. Forces you to jump through hoops and hides buttons trying to also force you into giving more money back to them. Lied about the amount it said I could borrow. Gave me only a fraction of the promised amount. Had to click through the process 3 or 4 times before it would /actually/ process the amount, giving me bs pop-ups the while time. I recommend the other lender apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're so sorry that your recent experience with us fell short of expectations. If you'd like to discuss this further, please complete the form at https://mlion.info/customerhelp, and a member of our Advocacy Team will contact you.

scraped_reviews.content: I love Moneylion, been using them for many years now. So many great features they offer like rebuilding credit, payday loans, credit monitoring, and most importantly, investing in stocks and crypto. You pay a money fee for some of these benefits but if u log in daily and use their debit card you get that money back put into ur business investment account. The only issue is when it's time to renew the debit card. my just expired and I still haven't received my new one nor did I get notified.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Woah, we appreciate the review, Ryan! We'd also love to help out with your RoarMoney Debit Card. Please copy and paste this link into a browser and we'll reach out: https://mlion.info/customerhelp

scraped_reviews.content: I find Money Lion helpful in a pinch. I dislike some of your less honest tactics like how your system tries to trick you into paying more. For example the tip (which I think is BS ... just charge a reasonable fee) ... it asks on one page and the lowest option is 6% you click that then on the next page it changes the tip to 10%. You have to go back in and lower it or pay the higher amount. If you use, don't rush they count on that as they do try to trick you into spending more.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your review. We truly appreciate your feedback on Instacash tips. Your insights are invaluable to us, and we will definitely use them to enhance your experience in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: it's an alright banking app. I used it for instacash when I needed it. However, I went from being approved for 1000 to 800 and now 700 the past 2 months with no changes to my income. after paying it back twice, they pretty much made over 1k. yes, it's my fault in a way for paying the turbo transfer fees and relying on it, but after it going down like that and how much money I lost, I'm done using it and now using a different app that guarantees the same amount all the time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We totally understand your frustration with Instacash, Myke. We want to learn more about your experience. Please copy and paste this link into a browser and we'll reach out: https://mlion.info/customerhelp

scraped_reviews.content: When I first utilized this app for credit rebuilder it was great. Trying to get anything done now is a different story. Can't remove bank info. Can't delete account. I've been hacked once, I want my info off of here!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you had trouble with your account, Latricia. We want to look into this and help. Please copy and paste this link into a browser and we'll reach out: https://mlion.info/customerhelp

scraped_reviews.content: After all the steps to sign up, it only offered $10. The extra cost to go to my bank account was $3.99. I decided it wasn't worth it and went to delete the account. Got a message that said "Unable to delete account." They will make you call a number to delete your account. It is not worth the trouble. If you need help with your account or closing it, please copy and paste this link into a browser, and we'll reach out: https://mlion.info/customerhelp

scraped_reviews.content: I have been charged an additional $600 for my Instacash. scraped_reviews.content: This platform used to work well before the changes now when I play I have days left to hit the level and reach it only for it to say I missed it. This has happened twice. Was told that the past due amount were retrying(not true)

I'm really disappointed with this app. I loved it when I first signed up & it was working fine..now I can't ever transfer money to my checking account without getting some type of error. First I kept getting an error to try again later, then I needed to re-link my bank account, then it asked me to make sure my app is up-to-date (it is) & NOW it says I didn't have enough funds when I clearly do! And this is despite that it shows less than whats actually in my account (either way, it was plenty!)

The money came in handy when I was short. However there is a $8 - $10 convenience charge if you need the money right away, which is obviously the case or you wouldn't be using the app. In addition, they ask you for a tip. I declined and there were 3 pop ups asking me to reconsider because "money doesn't grow on trees" . When they deducted the money from my account they withdrew an additional amt. for the tip I declined to pay. After a recent update the app now shows paid ads from the clock app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear about your experience with InstaCash, and we will be sure to forward your feedback to the appropriate team to review. If you'd like to speak to someone about your account, please fill out this form: https://mlion.info/3wDGxLS , and a Customer Advocate will reach out to you.

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app for about 6 months and I absolutely loved it. now all of a sudden my InstaCash amount went down from $285 to $50 because it says that my qualifying income is not detected. I have the same paychex coming from the same company so there's no reason why this should be happening. So incredibly frustrated and extremely disappointed. *Edit: After 3 months of run-around, issue was finally resolved. I love the app again, but still am not super impressed with customer service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Mariska, We‚Äôre sorry your conversation with our Customer Care team wasn‚Äôt the positive experience we aim for. We‚Äôd love to make it up to you by getting in touch and resolving your concerns directly. Thank you for your patience and we look forward to resolving this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Moneylion is outstanding, I've used it now for 4 years and still find them going above and beyond to help you have an enjoyable experience. I've slipped on payments a few times, and they bend over backward to help you get back on track. I am greatly recomending as they have many, many credit building, bill paying, and loaning to help you get to a better position in your life. Thank you, moneylion!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for being with us for so long, Anthony! We appreciate your detailed review.
¬© MoneyLion

scraped_reviews.content: So far the app itself works well (will edit as needed). Business practices could use some work however; hence the 3 stars. Loan terms state next business day, FAQ goes into timeframes, etc BUT they do NOT send the info to your bank like they claim. My bank does not hold ACH deposits of any kind, they are immediately processed upon receipt. When support was contacted regarding the lack of deposit they went into the immediate stance of "it can take 3 days or more for your bank to process it." Again, no. My bank does not hold ACH deposits. That can only mean that the processing delays are on MoneyLion's end and they like to blame the bank. I can't yet comment on withdrawals for loan payments or investments, those aren't scheduled for two more weeks. But I'm not optimistic that those won't be messed up as well based on some other reviews stating early withdrawal. Full disclosure: I downloaded this app along with other investment/loan apps for a long term comparison research article.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there Jessica Meredith! We appreciate you taking to time to let us know your feedback. If any questions arise or assistance is needed, feel free to contact us at 1-888-704-6970 or email us at support@moneylion.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Very hard to use. Very confusing, making transactions, requesting loans, making transfers are all very difficult (at BEST), and virtually impossible in most cases. Customer service only available by e-mail, and responses are insufficient and take approx. 2 days to receive. Don't waste your time with MoneyLion. It was a good concept, but nothing more.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we have made a lot of updates to the mobile app, if you continue to have problems or have questions about the mobile app and our products and features, please feel free to call our customer service agents at 1-888-704-6970 Monday-Fridays 6am - 6pm  & Saturdays 8 am - 6 pm MST... Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I just discovered they tried to take my payment on credit builder a day early, marked it as late and dinged my credit!!!! Despite the $19.99(!!!!!) charge a month they still try to get you to tip and charge for Instant cash without clearly showing the option to get it in a few days. There are FAR better ways to build credit (I'm trying to get out fast, not sure it did anything but lower mine). If you need a cash advance, use Earnin!Customer service when you finally get them, reads off a script.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rachel! Thank you for bringing this to our attention. A member of our team has reached out to you to discuss this concern further, and we can't wait to help you with this please keep an eye out for our communication.

scraped_reviews.content: This has saved my a$$ so many times. Out of all of the payday loan apps, this is the one to use. I can get up to $355 at any time, almost instantly (for a fee of course). Also, they do only let you get out $100 at a time which compounds the fees but if you REALLY need money then I can look past this. This is by far the best payday loan app and has gotten be out of a few jams when I needed it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This is so great to hear, Kyle! It makes us so happy knowing that we've been able to help you out when you've been in a jam. Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this kind review!

scraped_reviews.content: It was one of my favorite apps until recently. It was very helpful and helps people for sure. The problems started when I got a new debit card. Ithe app will not recognize my new and unfortunately after checking that my information was correct multiple times, the card was still declined. After filing a complaint I was informed that they could not help me and to just get a new debit card. I won't do that so I guess I have to get rid of the app. Beware, the verification is extremely inaccurate.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for your experience, Matthew. We'll have a Customer Advocate reach out to you directly to see how we can help.

scraped_reviews.content: Well, I gave this app a try. Recently, I can't log into my account. And it's not because I forgot my password or username. Also, the support desk does not cover all the possible issues in its menu choices. The format should allow you to specifically type in your issue, not just make a selection that doesn't describe one's problem. Don't try calling them, either. You can, but the wait times are always 30 minutes, and there's no 24/7 automated phone system.

I have to re enter my information like every 3 days it seems. Customer service never calls back. I have no idea what is going on. One screen says my account is locked because I didn't make a payment (credit builder). The other screen says I'm on time? Help center leads me to areas in the app that don't exist. Im trying to to build my credit, but it seems like it's just going to get worse wirking this company. If there was a negative 5, I would rate it as such. Software engineer should be fired

They want their money ASAP but won't give you yours when they say they will. I was ineligible for a cash advance due to being "past due" on my credit builder loan payments (struggling a bit financially), so I spent the last of the money I had to pay off any past due payments, and it still showed that my payments were past due.. I called customer support, and the guy says " I apologize there's a problem with the server so you won't be eligible for 3 to 5 business days." How convenient
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for leaving this review and feedback. We are sorry to hear that your issue is unresolved, and we‚Äôd like to help. Paste the link below into a browser and fill out the form. Once submitted we will reach out to you ASAP! https://mlion.info/customerhelp

scraped_reviews.content: The newest update crashes every time i try to open the app. I sent an email requesting assistance and got a reply sending me to a site to open a ticket. BUT, there is no way to open a ticket for technical issues. Not happy at all. Edit: After several upgrades, the app finaly works. The customer service person did not follow through with the updates he promised via phone call, but at least i can see my money and info again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sarah! We're really sorry to hear about the technical difficulties you've experienced with MoneyLion and our mobile banking app. We'd like to learn more and contact you to help resolve your issue. Please use the link below to schedule a callback time that's convenient for you: https://moneylion.youcanbook.me/ Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Great way to organize your funds and get a little help when needed. One major benefit is no overdrafts so this is a great card to have for a safe haven on your monthly charges.....netflix...disney.... Etc Update... I had to drop my rating to 3 stars because of how hard it is to actually get someone on the phone. I think its a bit much to ask someone to put their whole check into a place and I cant talk to someone when I need to. The automated service just gives you info and the run around.

App used to be great but since the most recent update it has been buggy, slow, and refuses to log me in to my account unless I try multiple times. Also, when I do log in it doesn't seem to register that and I've lost my login streak (so long 262 days...). They're adding new features and trying to be more like a real bank but they seem to be losing hold of their basics in the process. Not a good way to do business. Next time it lets me log in I'll be transferring my money out and deleting the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there Nicole Touchette! We appreciate you taking to time to let us know your feedback. If any questions arise or assistance is needed, feel free to contact us at 1-888-704-6970.

scraped_reviews.content: WOULD GIVE ZERO STARS! Previous 4 star rating. Have been using app for over 2 years. All of a sudden they need to add a debit card for repayment backup payment method. But, they can't verify my debit card, no matter how many times I re-enter info. Customer service was no help! Told me to enter a different debit card bc we all have multiple DEBIT cards lying around.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Kimberly! Our Customer Advocates have attempted to reach out by phone and email so that we can assist you. Please respond at your earliest convenience.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this bank, it has all I need. However I will give criticism on a few things. 1. New layout is horrible, the old one was much easier to grasp and nice to look at. 2. The 100 insta at a time is, well isn't fair, Instead of letting you pull out all at once and get one fee, you are wanting more money from your customers by making them pull a 100 at a time and charging a fee each time...not cool 3. Check Scanning isn't working Other then that, it's great!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We truly appreciate your great rating and feedback, Christopher. We will forward your suggestions! Instacash funding is FREE if you decide on standard ACH delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours.

scraped_reviews.content: MoneyLion has helped make and save money. They also make it easy for me to borrow money when I need it. However, my only issue is the fees for Insta-Cash. They may offer you $300, but you can only get it in small increments--lets say $25, $50 or $75 at a time. You are charged a fee with each increment if you want to request up to the max. Plus they want a tip. I think they should let you get all the amt you need upfront and charge one fee.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for this positive review! It‚Äôs members like you that help makes MoneyLion ROAR! Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

scraped_reviews.content: Moneylion is an okay app, but it has a lot of glitches,and some things seem suspicious. If you're in a pinch, it's there, but with that being said, there are issues. The cash advance works, but if you use it and then need it again, Moneylion might take it all back, essentially making you pay double without receiving anything in return. There are other problems with the app as well, such as difficulty logging in, lack of updates, and constant notifications, not just bank information.

A bit expensive but they offer a lot of things in the app at no cost!

And it doesn't let me remove the "syncing account" and when I go to add a new bank account it never loads for me to type in a username or password. It's getting to the point where I keep reaching out and keep getting the run around.

Reporting is nearly a week late on every transaction so I can't use it for daily check-ins on my balances. A pay off loan payment takes over 7 business days to post. Customer service calls take 30 minutes. I wish these things would be fixed because the idea is amazing. Update: cancelled due to horrible customer service and delays with every type of transaction. Did not help my credit at all.

title: Netflix
description:
Looking for the most talked about TV shows and movies from the around the world? They‚Äôre all on Netflix.

We‚Äôve got award-winning series, movies, documentaries, and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute, or just take a break.

What you‚Äôll love about Netflix:

‚Ä¢ We add TV shows and movies all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favorites, and stream videos right on your device.
‚Ä¢ The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV shows and movies you‚Äôll love.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy a safe watching experience just for kids with family-friendly entertainment.
‚Ä¢ Preview quick videos of our series and movies and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

For complete terms and conditions, please visit http://www.netflix.com/termsofuse
For privacy statement, please visit http://www.netflix.com/privacy
descriptionHTML:
Looking for the most talked about TV shows and movies from the around the world? They‚Äôre all on Netflix.

We‚Äôve got award-winning series, movies, documentaries, and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute, or just take a break.

What you‚Äôll love about Netflix:

‚Ä¢ We add TV shows and movies all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favorites, and stream videos right on your device.
‚Ä¢ The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV shows and movies you‚Äôll love.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy a safe watching experience just for kids with family-friendly entertainment.
‚Ä¢ Preview quick videos of our series and movies and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

For complete terms and conditions, please visit http://www.netflix.com/termsofuse
For privacy statement, please visit http://www.netflix.com/privacy
summary: Netflix is the leading subscription service for watching TV episodes and movies.

scraped_reviews.content: Please fix the pausing issue. I am trying to watch Monday night Raw. I paused it, talked to a buddy for about 5 minutes, came back and it automatically goes back to the beginning. Plus trying to pick up certain times leads to frustration and me deciding just to wait until I get on my computer. Why have an app if it isn't going to work properly? If it wasn't for HAVING to have Netflix to watch raw, I would cancel my subscription just for how poorly the app works.

After paying for the standard subscription, I came to know very soon that even though you're a paying customer, Netflix still restricts most of the movies and shows that I want to watch. It didn't clearly state in the subscription that you had to get the ad free subscription to have access to all movies and shows. This is deceptive and basically burglary of my hard earned money. What's the point of paying for something that doesn't even work properly?

Netflix has gotten greedy and the content is not worth it. The change to limiting Netflix to one household prevents me from using the app while traveling. Their help page states that you can cast. But their app doesn't even provide the casting option so that you can. If you have a job where you travel often, then you are paying for a product that you can no longer use properly. On top of that, the content has gotten extremely poor that Netflix no longer is different than watching regular TV.

There are a lot of things that have become annoying about Netflix, but most of those things are annoying about all streaming services. However, not being able to cast to my TV on an ad-supported plan is app breaking. The usability of the service is entirely shot without being able to watch on my TV screen. There's literally no point in having it anymore, I'm not going to watch movies on a phone. Cancelling, this was a terrible cash grab idea for y'all.

Really close to canceling my account after over a decade of having netflix. The level of GREED netflix continues to display and act on is disappointing. I can no longer access my account on multiple devices. Instead it wants me to add a member and of course pay more when already paying $16 a month. Disappointing and ridiculous. Honestly, I guess this will force most of us to go back to basics, owning physical copies of our favorite TV shows and movies, instead of paying to own nothing.

The app CONSTANTLY freezes when casting, randomly restarts itself, disconnects from casting for no reason, and often disconnects on my phone, but continues playing on my tv yet I can't control the pause or stop to turn it off. This is the only streaming app that does this and it's EXTREMELY ANNOYING!!! For the amount of money we pay each month for this service, the app shouldn't be such garbage!

Does not play, freezes and sound goes but the screen doesn't. I have tried uninstalling/ reinstalling, I have tried downloading the episode. I have also tried on both wifi and mobile data but it still does it. Add that in with the fact that I cant open Netflix in my browser, I have to use the app and it is more frustrating. It's already annoying that we can't use the mobile browser but it's even more so when your app is also useless.

I like Netflix, but there's a lot of major issues I have. I think it's kind of ridiculous to have an ad version/no ads version now considering they used to always have no ads. and the fact that Im not able to cast Netflix to my Chromecast because I didn't pay for no ads is stupid, and there's content on here that you need to have the ads free version to watch. and you need to be in the same home to be able to access the account?? stupid. you have some good Netflix originals, though.

When watching on a console, the frames will get pixelated. I have gamer wifi, so I know it isn't a wifi problem. I will close the app and restart it. Sometimes that works but often it'll start with high definition and then 5mins later it's pixelated again. Also, this is the only app that takes 3mins to load fully. I have HBO, Hulu and YouTube. All three of those apps have no pixelation issues or loading problems. NETFLIX SUCKS

What happened to this app? Netflix is NOT cheap. So youd think I'd be able to do the basics. Rewinding, pausing, fast forward, ect. Pressing play on the show you choose to watch. Not the case at all. Netflix freezes or crashes anything you attempt. I don't remember it being like this in the past. Can't handle how big it has become perhaps? I have cheaper streaming services that don't do this. Why keep spending money on this one?

yes they have a decent selection but good GOD. Do not believe their lies that there aren't "that many ads" on the affordable subscription. I genuinely think they rig it to where the first couple of things you watch wont have very many ads but before you know it, you'll be watching a horror film with at least 10 immersion breaking, nod ruining ads. it literally makes it not worth it. I'm so tired of these companies charging so much for the subscriptions.

So netflix allows you to pay extra for multiple profiles on your account. But they've changed it so that all your accounts MUST be used at the same address or they lock up your login forcing you to use two factor authentication and tell them why you're logging in from somewhere else. If im PAYING for multiple profiles I should be able to have them logged in ANYWHERE. Yet another reason to switch streaming services.

Not a bad app... definitely better than some others. One very helpful function I'd like to see added... on your "Continue Watching" row, when you tap the three dots and it brings up a menu, please add the option to "share" from there. This saves having to do a search for what you want to share only just to be able to share it. Also, if I only have one profile on the app, why do I need to keep choosing it? The app should start and go right to the main screen without having to tap my profile.

The app will only stream while I'm using WiFi. Otherwise, I receive an error, "We're having a problem connecting to Metflix. Please try again later or try am alternative Netflix connection. (3.1)" I have full bars and all of my other streaming services and apps work without exception. It's just Netflix that won't operate unless I'm connected to WiFi. At that point, I may as well use the TV since the app only works when I'm at home or work.

the app for the phone absolutely sucks. There's no reason I should have to deal with things not being able to load every other episode. I'm able to stream with no problem with other apps, just netflix. I've restarted my phone, cleared the cache and data and uninstalled and installed it again just to have the same issues. It's annoying and needs to be fixed.

This service has gotten worse than ever. Support for casting from your device to a TV has been discontinued, so now we can no longer watch Netflix on our TV without a remote. I asked about this change to customer service and was told over and over that they were sorry for the "inconvenience" that this caused but it was supposed to be for our benefit. I can no longer use this service, so if nothing is done to return the cast function, I will be cancelling my subscription.

There's been a consistent problem with the videos pausing but the audio keeps playing. Trying to rewind either makes whatever I'm watching load until I just close it or it plays fine until it gets back to the part where it initially stopped. This is annoying for me and clearly a lot of others have had this problem. You'd think Netflix would fix the app, but no

App won't even get past the splash screen. When it did I was constantly getting "there is a problem playing the video" error messages... UPDATE: Weeks later and now it lets lme login butocks up my entire tablet whrn I try to play shows. I would look at other streaming services at this point. Netflix has become way to problematic in recent years. Not to mention, when it did briefly work a month or so ago, I was getting yet another error, saying "this device is not part of your home group".

It's all downhill from here apparently. I have had an active Netflix account since they were a DVD service but recent changes have finally prompted me to rethink my sub. Forced autoplay on TVs and a return to a horizontal scrolling watching list is a bridge too far. these changes are just another deliberate tactic to entice people to watch their new content, which itself has slowly degraded over time. How the mighty have fallen. Game over Netflix... you were getting free money, no longer.

I'm starting to really hate this streaming service for many reasons. One of the major ones, The app struggles to stream constantly! At times the sound will play but the screen is still loading and then it struggles to catch up and then completely logs out. Over and over. I end up using a different streaming service. The quality of the app/service has been going downhill.

No problems with the app initially, however I have always used my phone's mobile data to watch Netflix since I don't have WiFi, but now I can't because all of a sudden after 6 months with no issues I can't use my phone since its "not connected to the home wifi". Why is this suddenly a problem when I've never been connected to wifi in the first place? What is my "home wifi" if I don't have wifi? Can no longer use the app which makes the app 0 stars

Great app, but I wish you didn't have to subscribe to it every month to even get into it. So I give it a 4 star rate. I love the variety of movies you can watch and how action-packed it is. So, I think it's good... I love how you can choose the no ads subscription. It makes your experience every month when you subscribe to Netflix so much worth it!

TERRIBLE app/streaming service. If using on my phone, the ads interrupt and skip 10-15 seconds into my show/movie. I rewind it, and it makes me rewatch the ad and still skips several seconds of what I'm watching. If I use it on my TV, it will automatically play the next episode of a show when I'm only halfway through the current one. I don't know how it can be this terrible of an app when they were once the biggest streaming service. Trash.

The search is horrificly bad, showing stuff that isn't even related to what I typed most of the time. The subscription seems to get more and more expensive every few years, and then they still cancel half the shows I watch! I'll never forgive them for canceling Dead End: Paranormal Park on a huge cliffhanger, for one outta many expamples! It's done it so many times that I can't even watch a show on Netflix these days until I know it's completely finished and got a proper ending.

PLEASE give us dialogue-only English subtitles in addition to English [CC]. CC clutters the screen with sound cues like [door creaks] or [music playing], which is distracting for the huge number of us who want subtitles for clarity, not full captions. Netflix already offers both options in other languages (German, Italian, Spanish, Japanese, Portuguese). Surely more people use English subtitles than all those combined. Please escalate this feedback

Great selection and app other then the listing/categories is very annoying. I don't like the categories in rows as side scrolling isn't as easy or as common as vertical scrolling. There is no way, that I can see, to list only a specific genre. The UI definitely needs work and can't even run in the background!! This app isn't long for being paid for if this keeps up.

I have been using this streaming for a very long time. I have had no issue at all until recently, the apps can't recognise my device as the Household. I thought, some glitch or whatever happened. Hence, I've used the temporary code, and now even I can't open the link for the code. It kept prompt that the link has expired even though I've opened it within a minute after I've received the email. I'm getting frustrated and not sure to whom should I reach out about this. Please somebody assist me.

I'm logged into the app and have it up to date, but keep getting "Failed to connect to Netflix" when I go to my profile, and try to watch something. This problem needs to be fixed immediately. And no automated bot. I will not contact customer support. You guys should have staff watching for specific reviews like this to prevent problems like this.

I do love Netflix. I've had it since 2012 before any other streaming service. I don't have many complaints about it other than the having certain things locked if you're not a premium member, the commercials, and I don't like the game thing. But times are changing and I understand the change. I still love Netflix over any other streaming services. However the commercials are louder than the shows or movies and I have tried everything on my end but it's not fixed so I think it's a Netflix thing.

Your app is splendid, no doubt. However, I am having major issues playing new seasons of series, and recently released movies. I don't know why. For some shows, their season 1 is showing well, but from the season 2 till latest releases, the episode never shows, it only hangs at the loading screen. If it's a bug, kindly get it fixed immediately.

2/5 ‚Äì Great content, but overly restricted The shows and video quality are great, but the app is far too restrictive. It doesn‚Äôt allow casting to external screens like portable monitors or Miracast, even when I just want to watch on a slightly bigger screen than my phone. In this day and age, who still enjoys watching movies on a tiny display? Netflix should focus more on the viewing experience, not just DRM protection that ruins it.

Don't watch any series cause they'll just cancel it. Netflix is only good now for movies (That's subjective) and limited series. Other than that it's been garbage. And to top it off with their price increases, streaming restrictions. They've truly shown that they don't care about good content. Just that you keep paying them. What an abysmal platform now. They could have been great but chose the money grabbing route (enshittification).

I have been a Netflix customer for many years now, and the new interface is absolutely atrocious! You can no longer scroll to the left to easily access a menu for searching, categories, and other general use options. The movie icons are so big that you can only see four options at a time. You were previously able to more. It takes so much time just to find what you want to watch now. I switch to other streaming services just for the ease of use. May be cancelling soon. Please revert to old UI.

more glitches and issues then ever before. YouTube has better movies in their free section. netflix now has ads. and whenever I click on a movie. it'll start playing a completely different movie. no joke. I'll click on breaking bad. then it'll start playing the walking dead. and it also does not save the progress. I'll watch 3 episodes of trailer park boys then I'll go do something and come back trying to continue watching it. and it'll replay the 3 episodes as if I didn't just watch them.

It is becoming greedier year after year. It used to be where you pay and watch your shows without ads. When they added ads, I knew it was for more money, and thought it was terrible that customers who paid for over a decade still got ads- whatever. But today I tried to cast my show from my Netflix app on my phone to my TV, spending over half an hour trying to trouble shoot, just to discover the ad supported version doesn't support cast- a feature that wouldn't hurt its pocketbook. VERY SCUMMY.

Best selection of movies and shows, but almost not worth it anymore. Despite "starting at $7.99 per month" the minimum subscription cost is actually $17.99. There is no 1 screen/device option, minimum is 2. After the recent changes, you can no longer share your account with a family member or friend if they do not live in the same physical location. So why am I forced to pay for 2 screens minimum? Netflix will lose a lot of business over this, possibly myself included.

Your app is terrible!!! The only way to "manage Netflix household" is thru the TV, which would be fine EXCEPT all it says is: "this TV is already a part of your Netflix household" meanwhile keeping me from using Netflix on any of my other devices!! And before anyone says to check that the internet connection is the same on all devices, I've already done that; it's clearly your app. And frankly, until you fix it I don't see myself paying for something I can't use.

You changed the interface of the menu. It's not as user friendly as it used to be. Not sure why you broke something that was perfectly fine. I will no longer suggest Netflix content to people. There is no sense in suggesting an app that only suggests shows and movies you've already watched. I have used this service since you mailed DVD'S to the house. That interface was easier to use than the one you just changed to. For the price we are paying, it's not worth the aggravation.

It feels like they are sacrificing content for games. You can't open the app without the entire screen being taken up by a game advertisement. If they are going to continue on the path of prioritizing games, then having a way to control if the games are displayed on the main page or not would be an excellent feature. Similar to how to allow the user to turn off auto play on previews.

WHY..... WOULD.... YOU.... CHANGE THE UI????!!!! This is one way to set yourself back 10 years. Its absolutely horrible. I cannot find anything. You took out all the tabs on the left side that easily helped locate movie types or the coming soon. Everything is enlarged for no reason. I just wrote customer support about the issue and I will keep reaching out to customer support till you change it. This makes me not even want to bother opening Netflix at all. Paramount it is then.

Netflix is a great platform with top-quality shows and movies, but it feels limited as everything is behind a paid subscription. Unlike other apps that offer some free content, Netflix gives nothing without payment, which can be disappointing for new users. Even the login process is not always smooth. It would be better if Netflix allowed a few movies or episodes for free. This small step can help users explore the platform before buying a plan. Netflix should focus on making the app more acces

I'm truly disappointed that the app lacks the basic functionality to zoom out. This means that content with a wide aspect ratio is covering the whole screen, even the cutout for the front camera. There's basically a hole on the side of the videos. You can pinch in but not out. This is available on Disney+ and for some apps (not Netflix) can be managed separately in Android settings. Really disappointing

I have Netflix for Fire TV. Is there any way to roll back the UI? UIs that auto expand what you happen to be focused on mean there is significantly less overall information on the screen and the UI is constantly in flux which I really can't stand. I like to choose whether to view more info on a particular item. Not the app assume that for me. The latest update is really annoying. TBH, I like the content, but if my better half didn't use Netflix I'd unsubscribe it annoys me that much.

the interface changes way to often. the interface designers constantly make it worse to navigate. more difficult to see shows that are of interest and constant loads the suggestions with things I'm not interested in. as a company they seem one fiscal quarter away from beginning to show advertisements. I didn't care about Netflix games but I can't remove the many lines of suggestions for them. Netflix is no longer providing for customers at the price point my subscription affords me.

New interface is terrible!!! I will definitely be canceling if it stays this way. Which really sucks. I have always loved Netflix. The one streaming service I have never canceled. Only being able to see 4 titles at a time is ridiculous!!! Admit your mistake Netflix, give us back the better format!!

Netflix was the gold standard of streaming. Now it feels like someone‚Äôs teenage nephew rebuilt the app after watching one YouTube tutorial. Any time I watch a live event after it ends, it keeps starting from the beginning every time I try to jump to the next segment. It‚Äôs like they forgot how the internet works. This is basic stuff, not rocket science. For a company that pretty much invented binge culture, it‚Äôs crazy how far they've fallen.

It's pretty mid. Which isn't exactly what you want given the price of the subscriptions. Videos freeze somewhat often. The selection of stuff is alright I guess but, for example with JoJo when it doesn't have all the parts, which is basically essential to get the full picture of the story, then what's the point? And when other (wink wink) alternatives provide a better experience with a wider selection for FREE. Then I don't see the point of this app existing other than maybe the Netflix orgs.

bad experience when trying to subscribe again. First, the payment is complete but I can't access the movies. After chatting with the CS, I need to pay the double amount and the previous payment will be refund. The second is I can't make any payment using gopay. I mean the payment process is confusing. In the end, I can't subscribe, thus uninstalled it.

Wow, just wow. The app won't let me play anything unless I agrees to the price change on my Netflix account to take effect next month. I'm not even the main profile. So, I tried with my kid's profile. App won't let him watch without accepting the price change either. How does a CHILD accept that on behalf of the parents? Good thing I saw it first. This is beyond unacceptable. Only the main profile should be able to accept account changes. Swing and a miss Netflix.

You can't share, then you decide to go solo now you can't travel with your own Netflix! It's very frustrating to use Netflix, you can't travel and use it, not user friendly at all. I was told you have to subscribe to different regions for every travel you make that's absolutely ridiculous and a big joke in Modern times. Good riddance! Cancelled and using Amazon prime rather than paying in different currencies every week without a bank acct. 1 star is for the times Netflix was Netflix.

title: IP Camera Viewer
description: Watch the live view from your network IP cameras comfortably on the big TV screen, on your phone or tablet. Playback video recordings and receive events from your cameras or NVR recorder. The application works with most IP cameras, your WiFi cam or the entire home security cctv system, works very well with Hikvision and Dahua devices. Designed for home and professional use. The application is optimized for phones, tablets, TVs and TV boxes with Android system.
descriptionHTML: Watch the live view from your network IP cameras comfortably on the big TV screen, on your phone or tablet. Playback video recordings and receive events from your cameras or NVR recorder. The application works with most IP cameras, your WiFi cam or the entire home security cctv system, works very well with Hikvision and Dahua devices. Designed for home and professional use. The application is optimized for phones, tablets, TVs and TV boxes with Android system.
summary: IP camera view and playback, for your WiFi cam or home security cctv system.

scraped_reviews.content: 2 Reolink C1 Cameras looking very clear and audio working. Free version. Try to connect with Ethernet cable if possible because a weak Wi-Fi signal could be the issue that's not allowing your camera to connect? 9/23/24 update - took away 2 stars mainly due to the constant buffering during daytime. I'd seriously consider going premium if this issue was corrected because the picture is extremely clear & visible. 11/02/2025 -latest update seem to correct most of the buffering issues
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Please ensure that your TV or TV box has a strong WiFi signal as well. We recommend unchecking the 'Very low latency' checkbox, as this will improve performance on slower connections.

scraped_reviews.content: üôèüôèPlease add an option to save camera passwords to the app's password bank. This would allow the app to automatically connect to all cameras with identical credentials without requiring manual entry for each device. Thank you ! Please add an option update IP for current camera , sometimes a camera changed its IP , then it stops show video on the app , then no option update it only delete and add again . Thank you .
It found my camera's just fine. All info is correct, but it won't make the connection. I even tried manually and still can't connect. I gave 4 stars for the effort.
Cp plus Screens showing black, even after all the details entered are correct , with pro version

Looked promising until the autoscan found nothing, so IP address it is, until we have a power cut and half the IP addresses change. That works, but only 2 cams allowed. I wanted to make sure it could find all six cams, four vendors, five models. Nah, not gonna muck about.... If it had got all six then that would allow me to get rid of 3 apps and upgrade to one pro app. Pity.

I tried a few other ip camera viewer programs. This one is super easy to setup. And streams in 30fps which most don't. As soon as I saw it running for a bit, I purchased the paid version. Highly recommend this software.
Was working pretty well until version 9.8.6 -- now just shows black screen
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Can you please send us more details via email?

scraped_reviews.content: since the last update it will no longer allow my ycc365 cam saying "incorrect username or password" when there is no password
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Can you please send us more details via email?

scraped_reviews.content: Tried to get it to work and COULD NOT,would find my cameras but when I tried to view would reset all my cameras and said there was error. Looked for any info to help fix my problem but there is none I bought the Pro version when it could only find my 2 cameras I have 5, thought that might fix the problem, it did not
It very good but onnnection with drop box is not happening

This has all the makings of a great app but behind the basic setup page there's no way of changing your camera settings. I have 6 Hikvision cameras and individually they all work fine and the picture and sound are very good. Sadly, they settings page only offers 1FPS under the single resolution offered. The multi-screen works for maybe 5 seconds then all panels pixelate and turn grey. I have submitted a ticket. Hopefully somebody will get back to me.
simple and stable app, without ads, good backup to DropBox, but it seems the app won't support connecting to NVR, local nor remote. GUI is a bit old fasioned...
Easy install, a great interface & easy to use! No major experience required, highly recommended and very affordable!
issue of buffering video a lot.

Has potential as a fast-loading simple viewer, but bizarrely, cams can't be edited (only deleted) and the limit is 2. Without these odd flaws, I'd rate it 4 stars. Most of the UI is nice and the rest of the viewer seems okay, although an immersive mode option would be better. I haven't tried the advanced features like motion detection or recording.
this app can use your device as the camera but you need to start the stream before you can see and i can't connect my true camera but still good
good for Android TV but at least two device must be added in free version.

This app is awesome - no need to select the make and model of camera you're looking for, just scan the network for devices identified as IP cameras, punch in the name you want to save it as, the login user and password, and you're off to the races! You can even view multiple camera feeds at a time, which is awesome. If I HAD to gripe, the only thing I would complain about would be the display efficiency of the multi-feed view. I feel like they could lay out the view frames so they're bigger.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We're very proud of our algorithm for optimizing feed layout in multi-view, but it looks like there's still room for improvement! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I really dislike leaving reviews that are not good. I installed the app and it did what I needed initially so I purchased it to get the pro options. I ran into a glitch and contacted the developer and they did not respond after a few weeks. So I purchased a different app that is working out nicely and will uninstall this one. There's no way to edit your cameras to my knowledge in this app. So if you need to change anything you have to delete it and re-setup the whole thing.

Worked well on Android TV where other apps just failed. Takes a little getting used to and the webserver portion needs better internal navigation links to get around a bit. Would be nice to config cameras through the browser without being on the add screen. Final note... would be great if the setup pages had descriptions of what they for and how they work. Still a 5 :)

I downloaded this app and I paid for the pro plan and even paid for the Google drive app which they say is required for this to work. Well, it's been over a month now and I can't get it to.l work at all! I have requested assistance several times from their customer service/support department which can only be contacted via email, and I haven't received any response yet! I hated to give them one star because they definitely don't deserve it. I want my money back!!
last update broke it, Black screen on both Amcrest cameras

Works great with my camera zoom tilt turn. How ever there are a couple of issues I have I can't figure out how to preset the camera so at the touch of a button it goes to a predetermined position. Also I can't make it work when I'm not home on a different WiFi or on 4G which is a same as I like to look in on my house every now and then when I'm not home.
easy setup and even the free version has plenty of options
a little bit hard to set up but once you've got it working it's great

Its not a good app i just wasted money. The viewing is very small, the buttons on the console is so small you can bearly operate the camera without pressing other buttons on accident. Theres no zoom no focus and no option to control lighting very bad app im disappointed.
Works as described. I have been using the premium version for a few months now and I am very pleased.

pretty decent but feel dodgy when it comes to payment and support (no means to get in touch to ask questions or access info on exactly what you get buying into the pro version :( I would possible have bought the pro version had I gained access to more info AND means to email support but sadly not available
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review! Please feel free to contact us through the customer support screen in the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app. It is one of the few IP cam apps with a native Android TV interface and is not a phone or tablet app made to work with remote like many others. The developer is also very responsible and took my feedback to improve the app. The app gives me everything i want from a straight forward TV app to view all my static position cameras in one place that is easy to access
No good. Glitchy and couldn't find 2 different cameras.

It worked displaying my one amcrest camera while @ home. Will need to learn more before upgrading. Would not display in landscape mode. Considering Blue Iris purchase for computer. They have a camera app 10$. This needs to display in landscape mode we're already on a small screen.
You always have to pay and it's very glitche.
nice picture but no working functions.
one time payment option is goog app user friendly

I have first downloaded it it was showing only two cameras, then I purchased it for 4 cameras view every time I scan it only connects two cameras, while other two showing without ports, tried everything possible manually adding the other two still failed even sent email to the owner of this app, what is this a scam?

Good cam viewer but no sound, bought the upgrade to rectify,Removed the sound off tick to find the picture has blanked also the zoom function doesn't work,Otherwise all good,pan and tilt and different viewpoints ok on the Tapo C500 security camera.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review! Your cam‚Äôs current audio codec may be unsupported. In the Tapo app change the sound codec, then re-enable audio‚Äîvideo should appear again.

scraped_reviews.content: Would not connect to my Tehys IP camera (misspelled "Thethys" in the app and also unable to show any model numbers). Really only needed it for one thing and could not use it for that, so it is of no use to me. Surf Wisely.
It detects my onvif cameras simply enough, but trying to add it using the very information that it discovered, it fails instantly.

Multi camera (4) screen reverts to just cam1 and 2 randomly after several hours. In latest update 9.5.7 multi camera screen closes by itself. Also, digital zoom mode not present anymore, when launching app directly in multi screen mode. Sadly, there are some untested updates. Old issue, you cannot connect to remote onvif, only local network onvif in Android TV app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. A fix for the nagging screen issue on some devices is on the way. The digital zoom in playback should now work perfectly. Please send us an email with more details if you still experience any problems with this.

scraped_reviews.content: 1) It connects to my surveillance system, which isn't IP as I understand it. 2) Will not connect to any others. 3) When connected to that set of 6 cameras there are two sets of choice, the 2nd being multi camera, but it will only do a single view. 4) Will not connect to the IP camera I'm trying to set up.

was a good app, I paid my bucks, and it did everything I needed it to do. Last night it quit working on all of my phones and tablets. Any one else have that problem too? I have 2 other camera apps that are stil working.

was working great until I updated to the paid version now won't even add any cameras. now almost a year since posting this I've only got two out of 6 cameras working, these aren't monitored either. shave now email my device iPs etc and awaiting some real cures
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry for the trouble. Please reach out to us through the ‚ÄúCustomer Support‚Äù form in the app and we will assist you right away.

scraped_reviews.content: works well as a baby monitor. the only thing annoying me is that the screen can't be turned off during capture. guess it's a limitation of the operating system?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the review! In the next version, we will add the option to hide the preview during streaming. It will be published shortly.

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible app. Bought the paid version hoping it would work - but only a day or so until it lost all settings. Refund requested and received.

Simple app that added all my cameras & gave me exactly what I needed, a full screen of multiple camera. Need to pay small amount to add more than 2 camera. Only query if you cant rearrange the order or at least I can't

So you can connect to up to 2 cameras. Using IP Webcam, to access them externally I've only managed to get the address rtsp.ip:port/h264.sdp to work. My setup is a little technical, and I needed to access my camera from the HTTP address, not RTSP. Just use TinyCam, all these limitations are removed.
You can view camera only.Subscription cost far too high.No features work without subscription.Cannot view recorded without subscription.
Working as intended, support for 2 camera for free version. Really nice and easy to play both of them at the same time when you configured them both properly, very fast.

Useless app. Tried all options to add my imou cameras. It's detecting the ip of all five cameras but unable to add a single camera. The 65 inch smart tv (Motorola) shows blank screen. I paid for app subscription too. Need a refund.
password cannot be null. really bad coding

title: Weverse: Connect with Artists
description:
‚ñ† A Community for Fans and Artists
¬∑ Check out the daily moments of the artists and leave comments and likes. 
¬∑ Want to know what fans from other countries/regions are saying? Use the auto-translation feature to overcome the language barrier! Posts and comments by artists can also be auto-translated into the selected language.

‚ñ† Communicate in Real-Time on Weverse LIVE
¬∑ Watch the artists stream in real-time on Weverse LIVE!
¬∑ Send chat messages and hearts in real-time on your favorite artists' streams! 

‚ñ† Share your music and connect ‚Äì Listening Party
¬∑ Connect your streaming service to Weverse, listen to music together, and communicate in real-time with the Listening Party.
¬∑ From artist official to fan-hosted parties, enjoy shared experiences through music.

‚ñ† Get Closer to Your Favorite Artists on Weverse DM
¬∑ Subscribe to Weverse DM, where you can talk directly with artists! 
¬∑ Use Jelly, a digital currency you can purchase on Weverse, to subscribe.

‚ñ† Shop on Weverse
¬∑ Head to the Shop tab to purchase official merch and albums, check your order history, and get real-time notifications more conveniently!

‚ñ† Tell Them How You Really Feel with Fan Letters
¬∑ Write and decorate fan letters to send your love and support to your favorite artists on Weverse.
¬∑ Unleash your creativity and try out various templates and decoration features offered by the fan letter editor.

‚ñ† Archive Your Fan Activities with Collection
¬∑ Earn badges and Collectibles through your fan activities.
¬∑ Complete specific missions to get badges and Collectibles. Collectibles are digital items that can range from digital images to videos.
¬∑ View your badges and Collectibles at a glance for each community you joined in My Collection.

‚ñ† Track Your Community Milestones with Collection
¬∑ Find out the badges you've earned for your community activities and the badges you can earn in Collection. 
¬∑ You can earn badges by completing missions. The missions and badges available for each community will be different.

‚ñ† Diverse and Exclusive Media Content
¬∑ Everything from official content to Weverse-exclusive media content!
¬∑ Watch a wide range of media content on Weverse with subtitles!

‚ñ† Official Membership-Only Content and Benefits
¬∑ Enjoy the exclusive content and benefits only available for official membership holders!


[Service Access Permission Details]
* Required Access
- Device and app activities: For checking app errors and improving usability
- Device ID: For identifying devices

* Optional Access
- Camera: For writing posts, scanning images, and recording video content
- Microphone/Nearby Devices: For recording video and audio content (nearby devices: Android 12 or later)
- Photos/Media/Files: For writing posts and downloading media
- Location: For using Weverse Queues and purchasing certain products
- Notification: For receiving notifications on content, notices, and more (Android 13 or later)

* You can use the service even if you do not agree to the optional access permissions. However, some features may be restricted if you do not agree.  


[Get Closer with Weverse]
- X: @weverseofficial
- Instagram: @weverseofficial
- YouTube: @weverse
- TikTok: @weverseofficial


[Subscriptions on Weverse]
‚ñ∑ Weverse offers two monthly subscription services: [BTS behind] and [TXT behind].
[BTS behind] monthly subscription: KRW 3,900 (Based on the KRW price, VAT included)
[TXT behind] monthly subscription: KRW 3,900 (Based on the KRW price, VAT included)

Terms of Use: https://weverse.io/policies/terms
Privacy Policy: https://weverse.io/policies/privacy
Inquiry: support@weverse.io
Customer Service: 1544-0790 (Available only in South Korea)
