scraped_reviews.content: I can't even log in to this app after sign up and it keeps showing me network not available after I tried reopen the app. I thought this was supposed to be an app with little to no bugs yet I encountered the biggest problem of not even being able to use the app from the start, and they have now basically stolen my data and I can't even use the app! I've signed up for nothing. Please fix this problem, it's so embarrassing for such a big platform to have silly problems like this.

I love this app! It's amazing! Sometimes, what really ticks me off is that I can't leave groups I no longer stan. It says to fix my internet connection, when I litearly always have perfect internet. Also, the subtitles are sometimes a bit slow and don't always work. It will also sometimes not let me post at all, which is freaking annoying! Edit: I can Unfollow groups, but I'm still having problems posting stuff. Same reason!?!

Weverse used to be a good platform, but in the last year especially it became a pay for everything app. I already have the fandom membership, but now they charge for autogenerated subtitles, no ads, and who knows what else. The subtitles used to be free (fans would do it free for the love of the group) and I felt brought non Korean speaking fans closer to their idols. But now it feels we are being pushed away unless we have money to spend. And that's not the message of my idols, just the app.

its is a good app you can connect w/ others and the artists themselves!! Some things you cant use unless u pay for it which is weird. ALOT OF THE LIVES DON'T HAVE SUBTITLES EVEN AFTER WEEKS AND WEEKS!! The Only Problem I have with this is that I hope they can change it to an email/phone number verification!! Other than that, it is pretty good.

lately for the past couple months I can't join a live. the app basically crashes and freezes (yes it's the app, I uninstalled and reinstalled and restarted my phone) and I can't open the video. then on my computer I can't send chats or it won't show real time chats after I've attempted to send a message. I've been a user for a long time now (since vlive) and this hasn't happened before. everything was working fine in August and started being weird in September

Its recently updated version isn't that convenient for us. Could you bring back the bomb for ARMY because we're more prefer the original one to this. Also, you should control the notifications because even though I didn't join others, they're still notified about it, and I am really sick of that. Also, the translate part has some errors and is not exactly the same as Korean. So overall, it's a pretty cool app, but if you fix these issues ASAP, it'll be more enjoyable.

The app is very organized and easy to use. But the translate button doesn't work 99% of the time. There's always an error message saying "Translation delayed due to a high number of requests." Its really annoying because althiugh I enjoy the content, I never know what the weverse community is saying, if it's it's no in English. Please fix this issue asap.

The app was working really well at first. I was able to use it without any issues at all but for the last couple of days, the app won't let me log in and keeps saying to check network connect-- even though my network connect is perfectly fine, since other apps that also run off of network connect are running perfectly fine. As of now I can't even open the app most the time and when I do, I still can't access anything like the groups or my profile outside of the groups.

Is a good app overall, but they have made a lot of changes lately that have not being the best. They discontinue the gift box membership for BTS in the middle of last year, but they still were having new boxes for the rest of the year. My membership ran out later in the year and I was not able to get the last box of the members album related boxes. I think this desicion was made very poorly. They could have just let you renew until the end of the year is you had that type of membership.

Would be 5 stars but the app is really, really slow. It keeps saying network error or something while loading, when it definitely isn't. And when I try to click on anything, like even the discover page or the my tab it's just a blank white screen. Extremely frustrated and sad. If it wasn't for this annoyi g error I'd be really happy with the app, as it's quite friendly and nice.

The app WAS working perfectly but all of a sudden, it just stopped working! I can't see content, photos, everything takes FOREVER to load and the contents just don't work! I am on Weverse daily and I'm so disappointed! I've logged out of my account, logged back in, uninstalled it, reinstalled it but nothing works! PLEASE fix this problem ASAP!

Vlive was better. It didn't lag as much especially when it came to concerts/videos and they always made sure to give us subtitles. I'm learning the language but it's hard! And weverse doesn't care for for those of us who are broke. Merchandise is so much more expensive and more for the rich. But we have to deal with it since it's the only place to communicate with BTS or any other group.

I can't really say much about this app because its doest let me sign up. like i clicked on the login/sign up but it just leads me too login no opition for signing up, but I was think maybe it connects right so I connected it to my twitter and changed the password. but when I went back to login and put all the gucci stuff it take me back to the first page saying "please login" and I've tried many times and it's still doesnt work. I'm really hoping it's just myself being dumb. I want to use it!

There's no download option for the media you purchase so you can always have access. I tried to watch In The Soop and every time I tap on it (I bought it in December) it pops up for about 4 secs and then backs me up to the main screen. I paid $60 for something I can ONLY watch on this app and now the app won't even allow me to watch it. atleast Netflix and Disney let you download shows to your device for a short time. I'm disappointed. Update: They changed the app and it's more difficult :(

Their motto is "Official for all fans." which couldn't be farther from the truth. They don't put up subtitles, not even Korean ones. It is not at all user friendly, you have to click through so many things to set up your profile. The user search doesn't work, so finding your friends is nearly impossible. Even the most basic option of dark mode isn't available. Auto translate is complete trash, good luck trying to understand things properly. Customer service is non existent.

weverse application does not work on Android cell phones. This has been a problem for two weeks or more. I called Samsung technical support, and they went through my device and said it's not my phone. It's the Weverse application. The application works on my Apple desktop just fine. I sent complaints to weverse via online application help and got standard. Check the most current app version; etc. Basically, I got nowhere with them. I've checked with a couple of Android users, app not working.

The translation needs to be improved. It's not always accurate. The kpop idols/artists should be able to have a post translated into their language. Notifications don't work (I don't get any). I have the setting for notifications turned on. I log in daily to see if there have been any posts. This and the translations need to be fixed. There should be English subtitles for the livestreams.

We used to be able to connect army bombs to BTS music videos through Bluetooth - either this feature has been eliminated or it just doesn't work any more as i dont see a way to do this. Its overall more difficult to navigate than it used to be, which is frustrating. I was hoping to connect my army bomb for the busan concert, but i dont know if ill be able to now

There are connection issues very frequently when there's a high amount of traffic (ex. When bts posts). It takes minutes to refresh and actually see the content they post. Also, I wish there was a way to see the comments you posted and easily see and friend other Army. It feels like a lesser version of Twitter because you can't even friend others. I think the organization can be a lot better.

Before the update, I would have given 5 stars. Now, I can't use a landscape pic I took for my background because it "violates community guidelines," there aren't translations for lives, I get notifications hours late (especially bad when I miss lives), and every time that I post a comment I get some form of spam. I also think it could be damaging to add in the ability to follow individuals in a group as this could hurt self-esteem for the less followed members (but I get why they added it).

Edit: This app isn't as good as it used to be. Almost all the useful features are behind a paywall now. You no longer get translation unless you want to pay! I love this app. It's a great way to communicate with the artists and other fans. A bit of a warning though, just like any other app or site when you get millions of people trying to rush in at once to see what the artist post the translator does freeze up and won't translate.

I understand bighit is still exploring their options but tbh this has been such a mess. At first, I didn't mind the server being full/crashing because the post will be there for a while, the translations are not that great as well (but I know Korean) nor did I mind always logging in. HOWEVER! There is only so much a person's patience is! After logging in for the nth time I think I had enough. I would like or prefer if the creators take our feedback seriously. I just want both parties to enjoy it

so, the concept of this app is great (being able to connect directly with BTS), but it's honestly really chaotic without any sort of organization. too many people arguing over "hide from artist" and trying to tell other people what to post when we should honestly just have separate channels for different types of content. like, for example, a channel for introductions, one for memes/silly posts, one for longer heartfelt messages, one for fanart, and one for armys to interact with each other.

I wasn't able to use weverse since the last update! I updated the app but every time I open it, the "update now" message pops up and when I click on it, play store shows that weverse is already updated and there's no update option! (only open and uninstall options available). Uninstalling and reinstalling the app also didn't resolve the issue. Please help and fix the problem.

Weverse and Weverse Shop used to be great but when they combined the 2 it's now a hit or miss. I used to receive notifications and alerts about Merch drops and now nothing. I'm finding out through other social media outlets that items are up for sale or literally log in every single day so I don't miss anything. I have all notifications alerts allowed and even put in a service request with the app technical support but I didn't get any resolution.

I need help. I have many issues. One of them being that I had just purchased something for $28 and it hasn't popped on my history purchases. Then when I'd search for it to see if it's available to watch, it isn't... when I click the purchase button it says "oops looks like you already own this item" which I do but I can't watch it.. my last issue is when I try to log in to my apple TV from qr code because nothing else is available to log in, I can hit log in from app, but it does nothing to tv..

The connections are really bad on this app because everytime you enter this app, sometimes it will say 'network error' and it's annoying. I want weverse to fix it ASAP. Also, I want them to create some sort of chat option or a comment/like history where you can see what you wrote or liked. Overall, the app is okay, but not in its best condition.

I like the idea of the app, I love how we get to interact with the artist so easily, especially international fans. But every single time you try to use the translate button it always says "translator isnt working due to high number of people trying to use it, check back later". You do realize #BTS uses this app right???? you need to upgrade your network to be able to keep up with #Army fans. It's very frustrating to have to wait, and unfair to make other fans do the translating for you.

I can no longer see pictures, thumbnails, or posts... everything is blank and won't load, and i can't save pictures either. I can watch lives, but that's the only thing. Whatever this last update was, it's not compatible with all devices. Please fix asap!!!!

Can you bring back the lightstick cheers please instead of the hearts? That was a cute unique part of the app that I liked... also I wish it was easier to search for run bts episodes... bc with the new update they still haven't fixed that part and now the play/pause button isn't working right. I have to tap a bunch of times now before the video plays/pauses again

This app is really good, especially for K-pop fans, as it helps them easily connect with their idols. However, it repeatedly asks for membership, and not everyone can afford it. In addition, only one minute of subtitles is provided for free, and to access more subtitles a membership is required. Since many users do not understand Korean, it would be much better if subtitles were completely free. Overall, the app is fantastic üòç

It was a great app, until the company decided to discontinue Weverse TV. I'm sorry, but I think it's just a bad decision to discontinue Weverse TV. I know that we can still watch the videos using Google Chromecast, but with the Chromecast, the subtitles no longer have black bar that allows us to see the subtitles clearly, and sometimes the video quality depends on the internet connection. I was watching a video on Weverse using Chromecast, and then the quality of the video got low all of sudden.

The app was great at first, but as time went on and I started posting organically, my account started receiving penalties for no reason. Sometimes it would be hidden, and after it stopped being hidden, another problem arose: people couldn't interact with my posts. The problems became so frequent, and for no reason, despite me sending numerous emails asking Weverse to review the matter as well. I hope these matters will be looked into. Thank you.

it is good but sometimes it doesn't tell when an artist is live . Also it requires subscription and money for subtitles üòî Need to improve on these as immediate notification should be given when an artist is live. Hope u can consider these suggestions and improve it!. Thank you.

it's a good app, but can the subtitles be free it's the one thing I ask for, and I know a lot of people do because not everyone has money to buy after the one minute trial I feel like it's the least that can be done as alot of international fans don't understand korean as I am on aswell.I'm begging pls put english subtitles

This app is really good for someone who really loves K-pop!! But it has many problems like sometimes the app doesn't open, and I don't get notifications on time... And I would like if the subtitles will be free cause not everyone can get the membership... Other than this, this app is really good!! I'm very happy using it!! I hope you'll solve this problems as soon as possible Thank you

The app itself has good content, but the notification system is really poor. Important updates, posts, or lives either come very late or don‚Äôt appear at all. Sometimes I only see notifications hours later, which defeats the purpose. Even after turning on all settings, it still doesn‚Äôt work properly. For a fan platform, timely alerts are important, and this really needs improvement.

This app is really good for all kpop fans but there is only one problem that is SUBTITLES. Only one minute of subtitles are provided for free. As many fans do not understand korean, subtitles should be provided for free without any membership. Over all this app is really good. I face only one problem of subtitles that I had discussed above.

October 22 My profile is Hidden and I don't know why. Customer service basically said it's done by the system, usually due to a violation or being reported. Of which I've done neither. Customer service should be able to reverse this when there's no viable violation. I'm really annoyed as a paying member to have this stipulation on my account, without knowing for how long it will remain.

There is now no way to edit your profile in each community. When you go to edit things like your pfp or nickname (it gave me a randomly generated string of numbers and even after I set my own when setting up the community), there is no save button. The only option is to exit out of the edit and not save changes. Please fix this problem so I can get my nickname back.

I've been using this app for about 4 months now, and I love it! We can interact with our idols and watch their lives. It would be even cooler if we could also send images in the comments‚Äîwhether during lives or on posts. But anyway, I'll still rate this a 5-star! ‚ú® Great app!

How I wish I could give 0 stars! This app never sends the live notifications on time... It's okay if it's 5-10 mins late but I've really missed so many lives just because they couldn't send notifications on time! And it asks you to buy membership for live translations but it's no use at all!! it's just the same as not buying!! And there are too many ads even wt membership!! it's too tiring to use the app

This app is amazing. I really love how we can connect with our idols. send them posts to which they reply to some lucky ones. but there are problems with the translation and network. the app crashes sometimes especially when artists are online chatting or something. and translation is most of the time wrong. and the notifications needs improving too, they don't notify exactly when the artist started live or commented something oe posted something. for me it takes half an hour to receive it.

It‚Äôs so frustrating that I can‚Äôt get full translations of my idol‚Äôs Live! I really want to understand everything they say, but the app only gives one minute? That‚Äôs not enough at all. Please make full translations available for everyone, not just membership. We just want to feel closer to our idols.

I can't join/watch any live streams of my artist after the new update. I tried creating new account twice. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app again. clearing catches and clearing data nothing helps. What should I do? Every time i try to watch a live show, the app hangs and gets closed on its own.

The app was great when it was just for BTS but now it's a mess but it's ok and they keep asking for subscription for translation seriously isn't it supposed to be free? also the live notifications are delayed 4-10 minutes which has caused me to miss a lot of lives anyway I downloaded this app just for BTS

The app is over all very good.It helps fan and artist get closer The visuals are also very updated.Only problem is that the are subtitles are included in digital membership which many people cannot afford.its main reason is most of the fans are teenager and they are not allowed to buy it.please make it free

Great app but the auto translation feature is pretty bad. Often shows ridiculous sounding translation. It's very frustrating. Otherwise it's a great way to connect and keep updated on our favorite artists

THIS APP IS VERY GOOD BUT IM FACING SOME PROBLEMS LIKE IM NOT BEING ABLE TO OPEN THIS APP AND NOT BEING ABLE TO POST SOMETHING, IT WAS SOMETHING SOMETHING LIKE:- TIMEOUT!! PLEASE FIX THIS PROBLEM, YESTERDAY I CLICK THE LIVE NOTIFICATION BUT IT WAS TAKING TOO MUCH TIME TO OPEN , AND WHEN I FINALLY JOIN THE LIVE AND I DID THE BIG SCREEN AND IT WAS SHOWING NET PROBLEM!! THIS REALLY PISSED ME OFF!! PLEASE FIX THIS PROBLEM!!

Weverse is a really great app! Whoever created it ‚Äî I want to kiss their hands! I watch BTS‚Äôs live streams through it. But the problem is, it doesn‚Äôt always send notifications, and the English subtitles are only for one minute.

title: Delta Force
description:
The biggest update of the year‚ÄîDelta Force New Season AHSARAH is Live! 

Operators, get ready for the Ultimate AAA Mobile Warfare!

[First Mobile Warfare: All-Out 24v24 Combat]‚Ä®
Experience never-seen-before modern wars on mobile in this epic All-Out Warfare. 48 players clash across land, sea, and air. Pilot a Black Hawk for air dominance, command a tank to break defenses, and unleash chaos with C4 or missile strikes. Everything is destructible‚Äîleave nothing standing!
10 Warfare Maps, 7 Unique Modes, 100+ Weapons: Gear up and dominate! Or just blow it ALL up!

[Next-gen Extraction Shooter: No Pay to Win, You Play to Win]‚Ä®
In Operations mode, remember this one rule: Loot, Fight, and Extract When the Time is Right! Equip your best gear, team up in squads of 3, and take on AI Mercenaries, powerful Bosses, and the most feared player squads. No risk, no reward!
NO PAY-TO-WIN. Start your fair fight stress-free now with a FREE 3x3 Safe Box!

[Become An Elite Operator & Build Your Dream Squad]‚Ä®
Choose from 10+ Elite Operators worldwide, team up with friends, and take on high-stakes missions. Brave relentless gunfire, master tactical gear and weapons, and show the world YOU are the best of the best!

[Make Weapons & Vehicles: Truly YOU By Customization]‚Ä®
Featuring 100+ weapons, a cutting-edge tuning system, and thousands of customization options, every decision shapes both performance and style. Craft your perfect arsenal!
Command land, sea, and air vehicles, fine-tuning every detail to dominate the warfare your way.

[Epic Battle: Optimized to Dominate. Play Anywhere, Progress Everywhere]‚Ä®
Immerse yourself in 120fps graphics, crystal-clear HD visuals and ultra-long-distance rendering. With ongoing optimization, even lower settings deliver impressive realism.
Sync your data across all platforms. Play anywhere, anytime!

[Global Anti-Cheat Protection: G.T.I. Security, Always Fair Play]‚Ä®
Our mission is to foster a healthy, fair gaming environment. Building on the legacy of Delta Force, we‚Äôve assembled a dedicated task force to uphold the rules of engagement. Equipped with cutting-edge tools, the G.T.I. Security team swiftly detects and eliminates cheaters and malicious behavior, ensuring a level playing field for all.

Follow us:
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/deltaforcegame
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DeltaForceGlobal/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deltaforcegameglobal/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/deltaforcegame
Twitter: https://x.com/DeltaForce_Game
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@DeltaForceGame
Tiktok: @deltaforcegame

Please contact customer service if you encounter any problems: service@playdeltaforce.com

Please read Delta Force's Privacy Policy and User Agreement
Privacy Policy: https://www.playdeltaforce.com/privacy-policy.html
Tencent Games User Agreement: https://www.playdeltaforce.com/en/terms-of-use.html

summary: The Ultimate AAA Shooter: Mobile Warfare Redefined.

scraped_reviews.content: The game is pretty okay. I only wish there was a feature where you could pick up a downed teammate and push them to safety that way, you're less likely to get shot while healing if say they died on a hill or something. I also kind of wish there were more skins for characters maybe different camo patterns like desert or even just more grounded, skins, I just can't wait to see what happens in the future.

I've played quite a few mobile shooters, and this one gets it right. Intense, exciting, realistic military combat, and the gameplay is always smooth. No ridiculous costumes, no pay to win. I only play warfare, didn't care for the other mode. It's easily 5 stars for me, but please do something about the repetitive moaning noises when your player is injured, and there's too many smoke grenades that last too long and obstruct vision.

It's fine. Can be laggy at times. I've played a couple dozen matches and I think I've only started at the beginning of a match once or twice, otherwise it keeps putting me in matches that are halfway over. Seems like 95% of the players are bots, and I don't know if it's lag/bugs or cheating, but it'll take me half a mag of accurate shots to drop someone, then I get killed in 2 hits from someone halfway across the map with the same rifle I have.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we suggest that you close all apps in the background, clear the device cache, and reduce the graphic quality in the Settings > Graphics to solve the problem. If the problem remains unresolved, please contact us through the in-game customer service. We will be glad to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: Great game overall, but a few things could improve: spawn camping is a big issue like in many FPS games. The free-fire launcher feels hard to aim‚Äîreticle needs better visibility. Gun customization menus are unclear and could be more user-friendly. Would love custom reticles and more weapon overlap across classes. Not sure if there‚Äôs skill-based matchmaking, but if so, it feels off. Still enjoying it, but hope for some polish in future updates!

This game only recently came out, but so far, it's really fun. There, large teams and vehicles to use give the game diversity. I know for a fact this game will become better and better as it's Fandom grows and the devs have more time to add weapons to vehicles and characters. I can't wait to see what's in store for this game and I would highly recommend playing! (Side note one mode reminds me of Arena Breakout another really fun game).

so long as they don't change any of the core gameplay; this game is great! very BF game adjacent with a EFT like mode as well. As of this moment the only thing holding me back from giving this game a "five-star rating" is the fact that the development team are dragging their feet getting "controller support" for the mobile version of the game, despite having a console version out. My old hands don't like to be this cramped when playing a game. it's honestly a shame.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your suggestion. We've taken note of it and will consider it based on the actual situation. We're constantly optimizing the game. The optimization process takes some time, so thank you for your patience. We hope in the near future, you'll be able to have an amazing gaming experience using the controller in the game.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a really good first-person shooter. A multi-player makes it even more fun. Play with friends on the go or just relax on your couch or bed. Very time consuming though so be careful when playing, especially in operations mode. If you die or abandon, you lose all your stuff that you had with you, so just evacuate fast and don't die. Good luck.

I think if they fix the pacing of certain maps i.e. "Crashed" and the overtime system needs a complete overhaul it doesn't make sense when the attacking side has one point and is in the middle of capturing the last one and tickets run out, it ends in a loss whereas another match when the same thing happens the round goes into overtime. it just doesn't make sense to me... Otherwise it's a really fun game

Great Game. Graphics are excellent, Matchmaking is pretty even. Doesn't seem pay to win. You literally spawn in with teammates and fight for control of areas. Like Domination in Call of Duty. What I like the most though is how real to war it feels like. Shooting through an open field, Continuous Action. Seriously. After playing for a few months, you also battle AI bots during Attack and Defend Mode. No way the enemy see me hiding in a bush. Pretty annoying dealing with bots.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We greatly value your feedback. Please be cautious as you‚Äôll meet various powerful and cunning real players in the game. At the same time, we will continue to assess and optimize the AI difficulty to ensure a better gaming experience. Enjoy the game.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a great game don't get me wrong but entering my second season for me i just keep getting Frequent Game crashing, every match I enter the game crashes between 1 to 3 times, this never happened until my second game update/Download. it's unfortunate to the point of having Stats but other than that I have no issues with the game, I like it and I hope this issue can be fixed/resolved in some way in the near future so other people as well can keep enjoying the game as much as I do.. thank you!!!

Solid game. Runs decent on my older s21. Too many game currencies. Piles of stuff I can't use. I mean piles. It really needs to be streamlined. I would totally spend more money. There really just isn't much worth my time. Endless collecting of tickets, and nonsense you never use, or couldn't find where to use it anyway. There is a co-op mission mode, but who really cares.

I've been playing it, for about 2 1/2 months now, and when I started playing I wouldn't get kicked off the game whatsoever, but once I kept leveling up, and the season changed I got kicked out 55 times in one day and that was on a good day. im not the only one complaining about it either, all my friends are having the same problem, even world channel players talk about it. Pls fix your game, and I'll change it to 5 ‚≠ê. I love playing it, I'd love it more without lag.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! If you encounter this issue, please clear the app cache, and ensure your battery is sufficient before trying again. If it persists, plz contact us via the headset icon on the right of the login screen and provide details: UID and a video of the issue to help us assist you more effectively.

scraped_reviews.content: There are two modes in this game: Warfare (The good one), and Operations (Serious issues). Warfare is a AAA level experience similar to Battlefield and a bit of CoD (The good stuff from CoD). Operations on the other hand has two major issues in my opinion; first is there's two little enemies between areas and objectives, second is that if you die, you PERMANENTLY lose all your items without warning, appealing to some, but I'm a more casual player, so I definitely need a setting for that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If defeated in the game, all items except those in the Safe Box will be lost. We suggest trying low-cost starts to alleviate gear pressure. Also, improve extraction success rate by better mastering maps and positions and arranging tactics reasonably. For other questions, contact in-game customer service with a detailed description.

scraped_reviews.content: This game NEEDS controller support. If you have to, set controller players in a way the only queue together. Either way, anyone not using a controller will still be able to outplay any controller user simply due to being used to touchscreen controls. I personally have issues with them due to various issues with my hands. Other than this, the gamr is good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for voicing your thoughts. We truly appreciate itÔºÅYour suggestion has been added to our optimization priority list. Every piece of feedback motivates us to refine the details further. Please rest assured, your input will leave a warm mark in future versions. Enjoy your gaming adventureÔºÅLooking forward to your 5 stars‚ù§

scraped_reviews.content: it's absolutely criminal that a game this polished and fun doesn't have controller support. This feels console quality and has really blown me away with how much enjoyment I've gotten for free. Not one to care about cosmetics, but I threw a few bucks towards some because I felt like the game earned my money. It would be 10/10 with any form of built in controller support, but either way it's incredible.

pretty good but there's a few random bugs where the game kicks you out after performing certain actions but nothing game breaking. The spawn system needs some kind of work as it will randomly kick you to Charlie point when you really need to be at A1 or A2 and squadmate tags will block the point that you're trying to spawn at wasting valuable time. The down tagging mechanic also needs some work. everything else is spot on though and the weapons balance is some of the best of there.

I would've rated 4 stars but this game is so infuriating!! I just lost all my gear because the devs failed to color and label the different types of extraction points. So when I went to the closest extraction point with barely any time left, I found out the hard way that it was a premium only extraction point. Words cannot describe how angry I am that this happened to me.

The new mode, however, is unclear. The Shotgun Storm mode is unclear. There are no rules we can follow. We get the highest score, we lose, we get the lowest, we still lose. There are also no indicators on the map that could at least show us what to capture. Only player indicators. I don't know but this mode is not the right thing for me.

The game is fun. However, it keeps crashing out going to an entire black screen and then proceeding to refuse to open or load. I have lowered the graphics to the point where where they are trash. The game would be very energetic if I could actually get it to work, I've managed to play a couple of Matches.However, like I said before, the game has attended to black screen and crash.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, black screen and glitch may be caused by phone cleaner apps that may delete resource files. It may be also because of an outdated mobile system. Please uninstall and reinstall the game to see if the problem is resolved. If you need further assistance, please contact us through the customer service button on the login interface.

scraped_reviews.content: The game has two Basic modes: Warfare and Operations. Warfare is great! It's like playing Battlefield on your phone and there's very little I could complain about with it. Then there's Operations. It's the Extraction, looter shooter part of the game. It's also fun, but its biggest issue is the Waiting time. I once waited 8 minutes for a game and at other times it's longer than that. If I or maybe 4 other players want to load into an Operation's map, let us. Nobody wants to wait 10 minutes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Regarding the issue of long matchmaking times, we are actively working to optimize the efficiency of the matchmaking process to ensure that players can find suitable opponents more quickly. Additionally, we will be hosting various events and offering rewards to attract more players to the game and enhance overall activity levels.

scraped_reviews.content: love this game and would recommend it to anyone. Operations mode is where it's at. I mostly play on console but, it's nice I can continue to play on my phone when I'm not home and bored. I will say, this game isn't for everyone. If you fear losing gear, it's not for you. If you enjoy the trill of losing it all or taken it all, then give it a shot. once you learn the maps it becomes easier, and before that you will die a lot, I mean a lot üòÇ. So stick to easy mode til you feel comfortable enough.

Warfare is fun, but I have a hard time with operations. I prefer solo play since I have no friends. Space City is extremely tough by yourself because you go against other teams of 3, and there is very limited opportunity to eliminate them. It's very frustrating there is no solo only mode for operations because I think it would be more fun to go against other solo players. I get it, it's a team based game, but not everyone has friends. (Respond to this review if you see this.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We are optimizing the matchmaking system. We will explore more ways to balance the gaming experience of novice players and veteran players. Rest assured that we will strive to create a game environment that is both suitable for beginners and challenging enough.

scraped_reviews.content: I see other people complain about this a lot of in game discoloration in game too many cheaters a lot of gameplay that is ai-based. when describing my issues to customer support it's frustrating because I get such vague responses that don't even hit the actual problem that I presented it's getting to a point where the game is fun however with this many issues it is a game that I can definitely put on one of my most played games but it's just frustrating and annoying to a point.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, the official stance is to take a strong stand against any violators. If you encounter any misconduct, you can report it by clicking Contact Us in the customer service section. We take every report seriously and are committed to maintaining a fair environment. We appreciate every player who contributes to preserving a fair gaming community.

scraped_reviews.content: Warfare is an awesome concept and play sometimes. Seriously bad imbalance. You either dominate a match or are slaughtered so bad that trying to play is a waste of time. You spawn miles away from where you want to be. Sometimes, you just get killed before making it a few steps. Your capture points get turned into a loss even when you have 20 guys surrounding it. Seems like the match is determined before it starts. Sometimes, it's just better to quit than try to play. Deleting. It's just not fun.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We sincerely appreciate your interest in our game. We know there is still room for optimization, and we are committed to making improvements for a smoother, more stable, and richer gaming experience. Optimization takes time, but we will do our best to bring you a better experience. We look forward to growing and progressing together with you!

scraped_reviews.content: It's been a pretty fun experience. I've noticed that there's little to no players on Operations but I still enjoy the other modes. Recoil patterns on certain guns are difficult but easy to learn. Sniping and using a marksmen rifle is honestly a satisfying feeling. My only complaint I have is making it a little easier to obtain those skin crates or whatever they're called

I would love to give this thing 5 Stars cuz it's the closest to Battlefield that you can get on mobile but the problem is the game is so damn laggy that you can't even play it. I'm running a new phone and since this hit console. it is a great game, but you can't play it. I'm getting really tired of being shot when I'm prone behind a huge boulder. there are too many bugs in this game to be able to call it a great game. if they fix the issues I'll change my rating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we suggest that you close all apps in the background, clear the device cache, and reduce the graphic quality in the Settings > Graphics to solve the problem. If the problem remains unresolved, please contact us through the in-game customer service. We will be glad to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: game has potential, but several issues that really take the fun out of playing. if you play mobile, you're at a highly disadvantage against pc players and should have the option to play cross platform or not. hitting inputs are hit and miss. having to doubletap several times a match just to perform simple actions. also a lot of hackers in the game with abnormal movements and insta kill. also, if you get put into a game that's in progress, you're gonna lose 90% of the time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We maintain a zero-tolerance attitude to any violation and will crack down on such behaviors. If you encounter a cheating player, we suggest that you contact in-game customer service, providing the nickname/UID of the reported player, the specific scenario, and relevant screenshots. Once we receive them, we will submit it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: This game is amazing. It's Graphics are Insanely good for mobile, it's gameplay is smooth and not laggy. and it gives you multiple game modes to play, with mini game modes inside of those game modes! It also gives you the choice of whether or not you want to download something like a certain map, or just chose the ones you already have. it's ranking system is also amazing, with ranking up not being too easy, but also not too hard. truly an all around amazing game.

The game is fun and scratches that Battlefield itch, HOWEVER, please stop putting me in matches in progress. It is especially annoying when I wait in queue for a minute or longer to be put in a match that is almost over and on the losing side most of the time. Also, I've noticed that the more I rank up, I get no rank teammates. I find it highly unlikely that this many people haven't played even a single match...probably bots but that's just sad and unfortunate and it kinda kills the fun for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Regarding the issue of long matchmaking times, we are actively working to optimize the efficiency of the matchmaking process to ensure that players can find suitable opponents more quickly. Additionally, we will be hosting various events and offering rewards to attract more players to the game and enhance overall activity levels.

scraped_reviews.content: After close to 300 hours of gameplay, I will say this by far is one of the best FPS on mobile. Whether you enjoy extraction games or large scale warfare, this game hits the nail on the head. Weapon customizations is second to none and the UI is organized extremely well. The content is deep as far as individual operators, maps and loot. Connection to their servers is top notch and I never have lag issues, even when my service isn't that great. You can play casual or ranked depending on your mood.

This game has so much potential that it isn't living up to. Matching in all modes takes way too long. The stash menu is way too complicated. I spend way more time buying/selling stuff, coordinating my loadout, and waiting for a match than I do playing the game. I often get mismatched with elite players who take me out in seconds before I can even see them. I want to like this game, but it's not even fun in its current state. Might as well go back to COD if this keeps up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Regarding the issue of long matchmaking times, we are actively working to optimize the efficiency of the matchmaking process to ensure that players can find suitable opponents more quickly. Additionally, we will be hosting various events and offering rewards to attract more players to the game and enhance overall activity levels.

scraped_reviews.content: DF is exactly what I thought it would be - awesome. Could it be improved? yes. I think factions or clans in the form of "units" or "teams" would be pretty cool. have your own BDUs or Patches. choose to be a Unit that PvP, loots, or combination. Add RPG or 30mm launcher as a Secondary weapon. Perhaps a wider variety of guns also. I'm not saying it doesn't already have PLENTY!!! I'm just suggesting a little more to break the humdrum of seeing or "procuring" during battle the same weapons. thanks!

Now, this game is really really refreshing for a multi-platform fps. I really enjoy how it doesn't feel clunky or overplayed. However, I'm really disappointed that the single-player campaign isn't available on mobile, and if this changes, my review would be 5 stars. I just feel like I'm unable to get a lot out of this game without all modes offered‚Äì especially because it was advertised as complete crossplay compatible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we've received your suggestions and the dev team appreciates your valuable input. We'll keep Delta Force going forward. Please stay tuned for our latest game news and updates by following our official communities, website, and in-game announcements.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the game. it's a lot of fun and really realistic in my opinion. I also love the revive mechanism. But I feel like it could be added onto by making it controller friendly. I play a lot of games on my phone, and I prefer to use a controller. I'm still gonna play it without the controller, but it would be a nice touch, since we can do the same on Call of Duty: Mobile.

The game is super fun, BUT it has way too many types of currency and types of draws. 3 different types of Mandelbricks are too many. 2 of them you get a ton of for charms, but they are way too stingy with the ones for guns. The draws are full of trash except for the main rewards, but don't think you will get any worth getting. Even if you do, it takes tons of spins to get them. So not worth it. They lose stars for that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We recognize that all players deserve better support and experiences, and we will continue to optimize the game to enhance satisfaction. Your feedback is crucial for our improvements, and we appreciate your valuable suggestions. If you have any other suggestions or questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. Enjoy your gaming experience!

scraped_reviews.content: this game is not bad at all. but I insist that I have an option for auto fire otherwise I just won't play it's too difficult for me to try to move and then hit the fire button and then also be looking around with the same button and etc etc. and I and do also end up feeling a little bit overwhelmed by all the options and attention flags and whatnot all over the place like I feel like there's stuff I'm constantly missing out on but I'm not really sure how to interact with it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We have noted your suggestion. The development and optimization of the game wouldn't be possible without your support. You can stay updated on the latest game news by following our official community and in-game announcements. We will continue to improve the game and hope to earn your five-star rating. Wishing you all the best~

scraped_reviews.content: honestly it's a pretty good game and I never used to have any problems on this exact same phone, but lately, the last few weeks or so the game is laggy as all heck even on the lowest settings and LITERALLY EVERY TIME I PLAY OPERATIONS THE GAME CRASHES. I've been patient but at this point I've lost over 2.5 million credits to the crashing. please figure this out because I love this game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! If you encounter this issue, we recommend clearing the app cache and ensuring your device has sufficient battery before trying again. If the problem persists, please contact us via the headphone icon on the right side of the game login screen and provide detailed information, such as your UID and a video of the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a very good and thrilling game to play. It feels like playing Battlefield with the size of the maps, the vehicles in the game, and the destruction of the maps during a game, all of this happening without my phone lagging nor heating up, but that was last month before the new update and my game is lagging, overheating and unbearable to play. Please fix these problems because I still really love this game ‚ô•Ô∏è

this game is a decent shooter game with good graphics but you need at least 15GB of storage on your phone to have the full experience. I personally feel like they have too many battle passes. my phone gets warm quite fast while playing for a few minutes. recommend for phones with fast prosscers and alot of storage to handle the game

Sad the mobile version is better than the pc version is but either way it's just bad. You either dominate or get dominated, no games that are close. Has potential, but just isn't fun, gets boring fast right after lvl cap. If you like COD this is close to it but sucks just a little bit harder. Edit: Have to give it to them, their adaptation of war zone is really good. The missions are enjoyable with bots and players to annihilate. Also the developers response to my 1 star was very professional.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the unpleasant experience. We will do our best to provide players with richer gameplay, and new activities and contents will be launched irregularly. You can follow our official community, official website, and in - game announcements for the latest developments. Thank you for your continued support!

scraped_reviews.content: Although it is a great game, the Skill based matchmaking is nonexistent. I was playing with the SBMM turned on, but I got matched with a bunch of professionals playing on a moderate match. The reason why this happens is because the game matches you with anyone that presses the play button, not by skill. Otherwise, I'd definitely recommend this game. I'd also prefer if there was a gamemode that is just battling for a set time, rather that controlling a set area.

Slow progression initially and full capacity of the game requires a lot of storage to explore. With that said, the servers are consistent,rooms always full, and the content and gameplay (graphics) are beyond expectations considering mobile application. This is detail , high pace vs. extras and fast pace. Modifications go beyond exp and reasonable to attain.

Great game but there are some glaring issues. The major one is fully highly equipped players with vast amounts of wealth going into the beginning level which is easy mode and farming, for some reason, the beginning and new players. Those with Maxed Level Equipment shouldn't be deploying against those with starting armour and whatnot. It is unbalanced as hell. Either match up with the same tier equipment or lower. Matchmaking is another issue. Operations are horrible with queue times.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We have been diligently working to optimize the matchmaking system. However, factors such as the current number of online players may have caused some discrepancies in the matchmaking process. We are actively making improvements and will strive to ensure a more balanced and enjoyable competitive experience for you as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: delta force ops five stars. stopped playing because my mobile device has a small battery an some phones don't play this game. but I've been playing it till I hit gold level and was amazed at how competitive it is. thank you. revised: I loved playing till the new update. Alan Walker was awesome. youve touched on important impacts in this game based on what i remember. I would play more but I fear being called a cheater for using more then one mobile device for game play. tablet is slow. nothanks!

great game. way better than COD mobile. with all that GB taking up your whole phone. the gameplay is awesome on this, upgrading weapons and adding parts is dope. I just don't like when you spend money then lose your items üòÆ‚Äçüí®üòÆ‚Äçüí®. also can you please add control play, so that we'll be able to use the controller, instead of using the phone, it can be a bit difficult to maneuver using the phone. other than that this game is amazing

I'd have given it a 5 but im still getting to learn it. But it's a kick @$$ game to be sure. the game is a very much like CODM in most respects, but it surpasses it in others case in point the ability to mod the hell 0utta your weapons...hopefully it won't turn out like most other games and mutate into something outta a sci-fi movie. the realistic nature of this game is one of it's endearing qualities for sure...

The game is better than I expected, I used to play COD and found it boring after a while since it's more about pay to win. But with this game, you actually have to play it, find items, sell them, and make money. Yes, there are things you can get with paying actual money as well, but it's way better than how COD promotes and literally has 10 pop-ups to buy things when you start the game. Great game overall

So, it was running fine on my old phone and now that I've switched to a Galaxy S25, the 8x thermal keeps crashing my game. it's specifically the 8x thermal. dunno why. Update, clearing the cache did, in fact, solve the issue. Decent response time from the support team. now if only they could get the rest of the operations maps to mobile and work on making things run a bit better in general.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! If you encounter this issue, we recommend clearing the app cache and ensuring your device has sufficient battery before trying again. If the problem persists, please contact us via the headphone icon on the right side of the game login screen and provide detailed information, such as your UID and a video of the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: this is a great game. but have only one complaint. when you are in the helicopters you cannot make out where the enemy is. or where the enemy armored vehicles are. the only group you can make out is your team. also opponents are able to kill me with 2 hits with the same gun I'm using and yet I have to dump multiple shots just to kill them. please fix.

I want to like it, but it's just too unresponsive with the touch controls and with no option for external devices like controllers I just can't help but get frustrated as I LITERALLY SLAM MY THUMB ON THE BUTTON I WANT TO USE AND NOTHING HAPPENS! And no, it's not my phone. I play other high action games with no issue. Too few letters allowed in the review to express my frustrations. Edit: Controls continue to be a major factor in unresponsiveness and unpleasant gameplay situations. Uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your suggestion. We'll submit it to our dev team and it will be taken into careful consideration. We believe that with your help, the game will become better. We also invite you to follow our official channels to get the latest game news.

title: IXL
description:
IXL is personalized learning! Trusted by over 1 million educators and parents, IXL is proven to accelerate student achievement. And with the award-winning IXL app, students can master skills anytime, anywhere!

See how IXL meets the unique needs of over 16 million learners (and counting!):

SUPERIOR SKILL-BUILDING
With IXL‚Äôs full curriculum of over 10,000 skills, students of all levels can learn the exact topics they need, whether they‚Äôre reviewing past concepts or exploring new territory. Immediate feedback and step-by-step answer explanations help students work through their mistakes and make lasting progress. Plus, question difficulty adapts to challenge students at just the right level and help them grow.

MATH MASTERY
With IXL‚Äôs preK-12 curriculum, every learner can excel in math! From skip-counting with pictures to graphing quadratic functions, students interact with dynamic problem types that bring each concept to life. And with unlimited questions to explore, students can practice as much as they need to master each skill, and never see the same problem twice.

LANGUAGE ARTS LEARNING
IXL‚Äôs preK-12 curriculum helps build strong readers and writers! From comprehension to composition, IXL breaks down each concept into highly targeted skills that help students grow from where they are. Fun and relevant questions engage students as they learn new vocabulary, correct grammar mistakes, analyze text, strengthen writing skills, and more. 

SCIENCE, SOCIAL STUDIES, AND SPANISH
Build knowledge across all core subjects! With comprehensive curriculum in 2nd through 8th grade science and social studies, students can learn exciting and relevant concepts about the world around them. And with foundational Spanish, students can get started on the path toward Spanish fluency!

REAL-TIME DIAGNOSTIC 
IXL‚Äôs Real-Time Diagnostic pinpoints each student‚Äôs current knowledge level in math and English language arts. As students answer questions, they‚Äôll discover more about themselves, and reveal personalized recommendations on the best skills to learn next! 

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE
Interactive features, from drag-and-drop questions to graphing tools, allow students to engage with the material in new ways. With handwriting recognition, students can easily write in math answers with their fingertips. On tablets, students can work through each problem by writing on their screen‚Äîno scrap paper needed! Plus, colorful awards highlight students‚Äô accomplishments and make learning fun!

PROVEN RESULTS
Research has shown that IXL improves student outcomes more than any other product or method. IXL is trusted by over 1,000,000 teachers worldwide!

ACTIONABLE ANALYTICS
View reports on all progress at IXL.com! Tackle any trouble spots with specific insights and clear next steps. And celebrate reaching each new milestone with an official certificate!

Practice 10 questions each day for free. To accelerate growth, become an IXL member! For $19.95 per month, you‚Äôll get access to a fully personalized learning experience with comprehensive curriculum, meaningful guidance, progress tracking, fun awards, and more!

IXL is kidSAFE certified and COPPA-compliant. For more information, please visit:
Membership details: https://www.ixl.com/membership
Privacy Policy: https://www.ixl.com/privacypolicy

summary: Personalized learning across K-12 subjects

scraped_reviews.content: I hate this. Have been using this app for a while and has been great up until now. I was doing my lessons as usual and spent nearly 3 hours on them, once I'm nearly done it freezes and crashes, everything gone. I get the lose point system to make sure you can't randomly guess, but all it does is make me angry to unimaginable extent. I'm on the verge of tears right now. Also, the "help" isn't that great. It gives you a nice way to do it but all it does is give you the equation, The bare minimum.

It's honestly annoying as hell. The point system is really messed up and they changed the levels to letters which I find hard to navigate. The problems are hard at the end and it doesn't round neither stay where it is when you get one wrong. It has other subjects but they're also bad. It sets you too high to practice and learn. Awful app PC or phone. Parents use another app like Dreambox, it's fun and you actually learn unlike ixl. Oh and don't use any version of lexia, you'll find that one out.

I usually don't want to slam my head into a keyboard. But when I do IXL, I want to do that. When I have used ixl, it has made me so stressed and discouraged. The "smart score" system is so rigged. In later levels, (70-99), you get 2-4 points when you get something right. However, if you get one wrong, you go down by 7 or 8 points, which can make some lessons be half a class period long. It makes me want to complete the lesson so much, I dont even learn anything. Get rid of it, or at least fix it

I have to use this app for school and I absolutely hate it. If you get one question wrong, it takes like 5+ points off. It is really annoying that there isn't a dyslexic font. I would like the choice to read the articles/questions in a dyslexic font. Also, motivational music in the background maybe? Overall, I hate this app and have nothing good to say about it. Not very good at explaining what to do and just expect you to know what everything is. It sounds fine, but it's terrible in my opinion.

This app has got to be the worst app you could ever get for a PC or mobile device. It doesn't teach children, it TESTS them. So why do you need a app to test yourself in math skills?! Also, to add salt to the wound, there is the overwhelming SMARTSCORE where if you get a question incorrect, you could lose a lot of points, and it's really hard to gain them back. So IXL Education, if you are hearing this, please add a confirmation box so that if we make a typo, we could go back and change it.

I would give it a 0 but I can't so I'll give it a one. this app made many people in my classes fail, I've seen kids cry, and it's overwhelming. this didn't help me, it's a confusing way of teaching and just feels like a pain in the back, I would rather the small building books when you build a bed. please take this into consideration, thank you.

Horrible app. Totally unusable! Crashes all the time. If it's frustrating for the parents, I can only imagine how frustrating it is for my kids or kids in general trying to learn. I thought it was the tablet I was using but the issue remains the same regardless of device. Definitely stop promoting this app because it makes me just want to cancel my membership. Horrible!! Do not download at all. Keep your sanity.. do not download.. it's that bad. Did I mention...Horrible?

IXL Overall isn't a very good design First of all, at the begining it adds 10 points for getting a question right. Great so you think its adding 10 for each one then you realize when your higher up it only adds TWO. In other words, It misleads you to believe it gives you many points, but really doesn't. Second of all, when you get a question wrong it subtracts about 3x the amount for getting a question. (Which is EXTREMLY frustrating) Third of all, ITS ONLY FOR PRACTICING! It doesn't teach.

I am an eighth grade student, if you're a teacher reading this, don't use it. Honestly the point system is completely screwed, if you do use it, make sure to tell students to do it for 20-30 minutes because I personally have spent many nights crying over a gosh darn math problem. It gives me panic attacks and freaking huge amounts of stress over the point system. Dont get me started when you get to the 'challenge zone' it gives problems you haven't solved yet, and then takes points away.

The app is not very good. You can't use skill plans or check on the progress of your child. It doesn't show recommendations on what they should be working on. We use IXL everyday and I was excited to have the app so we could use it while we were running around this summer and still get our practice in. The kids complain that it not easy to navigate and would rather do it at home.

I don't know why teachers make kids use this app. Out of a 0-5 scale, I would give it -999999, and that isn't even possible. I am being VERY generous by giving a 1-star. It teaches you NOTHING. Also, it brings you down like, 10 points each time you get one wrong, so when some bright kid wants to challenge themselves, it just ends up being a waste of time for about an hour. The producers of this app should seriously consider disabling it or something.

I have used this as a replacement for iready, and it still sucks. Every time I get a question wrong on the skills, it takes like 6 to 10 points away, like why, you only get 2 3 points. If it's supposed to be for kids then make it interesting for them. I always thought it would be better than iready, because they only do the diagnostic once, but on the other stuff, it's not worth it.

I use this app in school and it is very frustrating to say the least. the point system is trash. For example if you made it to a 83 on a assignment or assessment and get a question wrong then it brings you down to a 71 or 75. Its honestly frustrating and garbage. The problems get harder around the end also. I know it's suppose to get harder at the end so that IXL can test our knownlegdge and how well we do know it but that just makes it harder for people like me to make a 100 on the assignment.

This app is the worst. It's not just the problems, but you have to SIGN IN to play it? Really? If you don't sign in, you have a limited amount of time and don't get to play or use the app unless you can sign in. I am in seventh grade and my school doesn't have this, so I thought I could just use guest, but when it said 'unlimited practice' I was fuming. Instantly uninstall. I'm not good at explaining, but I hope you get what I mean.

IXL really helps my kid have lots of extra practice on specific topics within each subject area, and even displays when it's "mastered". My greatest criticism is that this app does not help parents assign and/or check the progress of students. It just shows the possible topic areas of study, and provides a way to do a mock run through each (basically the same as the student except without being graded). So if you want to "play" along with the kid on a separate device, that's all this is good for

1 singular thing I hate about this app, and that thing is the sole reason it takes me HOURS just to finish a single lesson. first, my phone isn't laggy, the app is up to date, I haven't even used half of my storage. Now, with all of that, I realized my phone isn't the one lagging, it's the app, it takes me an average 2-3 minutes just for a single question, and turns out I placed it in the wrong order even though it could be playe either way, yes even gpt said it and that's also one of the reason

I love the app, and my daughter loves ixl. I just want to use the app the same as we use the desktop version. I want to turn off it, sending her back if she gets it wrong. i have to help her because some of the questions are a bit confusing. My daughter is a level 1 and 2 autistic. she loves earning the prizes and doing the science section. I gave it 4 stars because im rating the app. I can't use the app the same way I would use the as the desktop version.

As a middle schooler I hate this app its easy at first but it gets hard if u have above an 80% and even harder if u get to 90% and if u get one wrong u go down by so much it will take u 2-3 questions to get u back to where u were and this is really draining when your teachers are passing these things out like Halloween candy its just so frustrating! I would give this 0 stars if I could.

IXL is hands down one of the worst ‚Äúlearning tools‚Äù I‚Äôve ever had to use. Instead of encouraging students to learn, it punishes them for trying. The scoring system is absolutely ridiculous ‚Äî you can spend 20 minutes answering correctly, inching toward a goal, and then lose all your progress for making a single mistake don't download this, it is a complete waste of time

As a homeschooling parent just starting, this app was recommended to me. I hate it. It is not user friendly for newbies. I am unable to recommend skills to my child from the app. I have to log into the actual website to do that. We are mostly using tablets so that is extremely inconvenient because it automatically opens the app when I try to use the website for anything. I'm glad I only paid for 1 month instead of a full year.

the score bar is also ridiculous. when my kid worked 30mins on a assessment and got to 56 or something she gets one question wrong boom üí• she is at 45 or something that is ridiculous it is sometimes impossible to finish sometimes even makes my kid cry!! the ads online are also so fake in the ads it look fun and interesting but when you get the actual app it so different and not interesting. it makes my kid be scared to make mistakes it doesn't worth 20 dollars I highly recommend boddle not IXL

I gave this website one star because Well i'm a kid and maybe my opinion will change later, but For now , it looks like this is kind of boring and I don't see the fun away my mother was talking about from the ads and I don't see the very fun way that assad show us that had the kids ecstatic, also very happy so. It's all right guess so far.
Great app, though I wish the draw tool was also on mobile. One issue. Question panels have started flashing and disappearing during lessons.

very bad everytime I get a question wrong it goes down by 15% and when I get it right it goes up by half of that,its torture to students and whoever made this app is needs to get slimed out,I hope this app goes bankrupt and the app gets deleted forever it's also rigged asf,teachers be assigning 5 ixl a day for what? then gets mad when students don't do them very very very bad app.
i love using this app to improve, revise and sharpen my maths skills. the full subscription, including English and science, is also fabulous.

I hate this app only for one reason most of the time it's wrong and I know this for calculus W. it makes me do an extra step so I try to find this if you have to do this extra step so I put in the same problem I do not see the extra step anywhere and I do this way to much times and plus for the last step for a normal definite integral there just doing wrong and this is hurting me I got like 50 problems wrong and now it's really confusing me for that reason that's why I hate this app

I have found this is a challenging program. I do like that it has the skills practice units. Our granddaughter likes the science and social studies units the most. She has her challenges in math and reading.
I like the app! The app helps me to know some things that i dont really understand but some times makes me stress because if we are wrong more and more the difficulty will increase.
I hate this app. The lessons are boring and repetitive. They constantly change right and wrong answers and has never helped me at all.
awesome app, easy to use but I would love a dark mode on the app. it will be easier on the eyes! other then did that, good app!!
It's the worst app ever üò´ I'm in grade 8 and it's too hard!! ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ PLEASE make it a little easier!!! Then maybe I'll change my rating!!!
Great way for your kids to work on things they need a little extra help with and also helps you see how they're progressing. Great app!
alot of the math answers get counted wrong even though Google and a calculator confirm they are right. confuses the children when their right answers are being counted wrong.

a job application make a joke on this I hate math sm when you lose ponts in this app I currently in primary school also in that space almost in high school I show an ads for this I click on this this I'd the worst app I hat math sommuch even in this app just wow this abt hurting the point form shame on this app
Fun way to learn different subjects from math to language arts to social studies and science. I never really liked half of those subjects but now I enjoy them a lot more.
I like the questions but when my daughter gets one wrong the question bar gets back a lot of questions.
app is better than the website ... make the prompts auto play so it feels like a lesson with a question in the end . feel free to adapt ... just help me click lesser
I think thinsuck because whenever you get a. answer wrong you go back a lot of steps. it's just stupid. dont waste ur precious money on some dumb app.
I don't like ixl because there are so much work.and on the ads they say it's fun but it's not at all üòûüò°

this was kind of good for me but I didn't want to sign in I don't know what was my password and my username but I have a username that's on Roblox but it did kind of work though but that's why I put it on three stars.
I love ixl it has helped me with school work and tests I would recommend this for anyone who is failing in math, science, or English

Teaching is no longer. Before installing this app, I read the reviews. What happened to the educational system humans?? There are students literally CRYING, ANXIETY ATTACKS, STRESSED OUT over THIS app? Are you people that unattached to teaching where one teacher made this 60% of a childs grade? What happened to books and chalkboards where TEACHERS DID SOME DAMN WORK AND SHOWED HOW ITS DONE. This scares a GRANDMOTHER of 10. Did all the funds for education go to PAYROLL ONLY? It sure looks like it
a great way for your. children to learn. not just boring tests, but ixl is better than preparing for a test on paper!

the baddest experience I I never seen like this the two correct answer I pick one correct answer but it ended up being wrong how bad very bad I don't like this kind of ixl very bad it doesn't even look like the real one in clever and I also wish I can give you zero's Stars
IXL is a very good app and it's chosen by our children's school. Also, it helps our children learn everything! 5 stars!
IXL is a very simple, no hype, old school way of learning Spanish. You have to pay close attention to your answers. You just can't be sloppy. Lovely program.
really great for kids to learn and very fun.
this application is superb. I've spent time on varies subjects including the Spanish section and it's been a delight to review material that I have encountered in the past 5/5 stars
it was terrible! my 2 kids both hated it and would rather do brilliant, which is not normal for them because they hated brilliant too!
I hate this app should be deleted. gives me anxiety. never should have made this. takes me 2 hours or more to get to atleast 80 percent. delete this app

title: YouTube Music
description:
Connecting you to the world of music:
‚óè Music content including live performances, covers, remixes and music content you can‚Äôt find elsewhere
‚óè Thousands of curated playlist across many genres and activities

Get personalized music, perfect for every moment:
‚óè Personalized playlists and Mixes made just for you, built around your favorite types of music
‚óè Personalized activity mixes for your Workout, Relax, and Focus sessions
‚óè Create playlists with song suggestions or collaborate with other music fans to create the perfect playlist
‚óè Personalized Library to see all of your liked and added songs, playlists, artists, and albums

Stay on top of the trend and discover new music:
‚óè Check out curated for you mixes such Discover Mix and New Release Mix
‚óè Discover music based genres (Hip Hop, Pop, Country, Dance & Electronic, Blues, Indie & Alternative, Jazz, Kpop, Latin, Rock, and more)
‚óè Discover music based mood (Chill, Feel Good, Energy Booster, Sleep, Focus, Romance, Workout, Commute, Party)
‚óè Explore top charts from all over the world

Enhanced your listening experience with unique features:
‚óè Song lyrics so you can sing along to your favorites
‚óè Switch seamlessly between audio and video
‚óè Listen on your phone, desktop, smart speaker, smart TV, car, smart watch and within your favorite apps.
‚óè Add a Tile on your Wear OS watch to quickly access your music.
‚óè Compatible with Google Maps, Waze, Google Assistant, and more.

Upgrade to Music Premium (available in select countries) to enjoy:
‚óè Listen to music ad-free
‚óè Play music in the background
‚óè Access your music downloads, including smart downloads
‚óè Switch seamlessly between song audio and music videos, only with YouTube Music

----------
Only first-time YouTube Red, Music Premium, YouTube Premium and Google Play Music subscribers are eligible for free trials, introductory offers or promotional pricing.
