summary: The world of music dedicated to you

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for a couple of years now, and i can't say that I have many complaints. however, i accidentally turned "Voting on" on my Playlist, and now my 670 songs are completely rearranged and longer how they used to be. songs i literally NEVER listen to are at the very top of Playlist, and songs i listen to every day are at the bottom. there is no way i can undo it or fix it, besides having to fix every single individual song back in its original order. it's just very stressful.

Huge library for building play lists. Almost every song I could think of was available to me. Two minor gripes: 1. Tapping a notification for new music doesn't always get me to the relevant screen, and instead just opens the app to wherever I had it last. 2. I would like an "undo" feature if I am in the middle of a playlist and I accidentally queue up a different song while browsing the app. That way I can just go back to what I was playing without having songs I recently heard.

Hands down, one of the best music streaming apps out there. YouTube Music separates itself from other music streaming apps by including YouTube music videos, lyric videos, and live performances uploaded to YouTube. The only thing I would love to see implemented is an easier way to add songs to the queue or "Play Next." I'd love to be able to swipe left or right on a song to add it to the queue or play it directly after, and have it NOT be changed when I hit shuffle.

I used to be able to see related suggestions while song was playing. ever since they updated. they made the save to option buttons wayyyy too small to see. and completely removed the option to view related songs depending on what your listening to. then when i shuffle music by playlists i create. it shuffles the same songs over and over. i have a playlist with 300 songs. it will shuffle only 50 of the same songs. used to be my favorite music app. going back to pandora.

The free version is actually horrendous. Ads after every song/play of a song, if you get an ad, skip it and then select another song, it gives you another ad, most ads have a drop-down box with a link to their website that prevents you from swiping the 'currently listening' box down to pick a different song, said drop-down box doesn't close automatically if the ad ends or is skipped. The literal only good thing about the free version is that you can listen to music, everything else is terrible

Things are getting smaller & smaller! this latest update has the like/unlike, save, lyrics buttons smaller that I can hardly find them unless I have the phone right near my face (my vision is 20/20). it would be nice to be able to sort the Playlist order when saving songs, sometimes a-z is better. only play what is in the list, YT don't add to it. I miss the unlike button skipping the song. Having stats would be nice. genre, listening time, etc It would be nice to set shuffle in your profile.

I've been using YouTube Music since it was created, over a decade now. YouTube Music has played an essential role in the latter half of my life, and other than occasional frustration with the song recommendation algorithm, I think it's perfect. I just hope it doesn't choose to change everything and cram "AI" down our throats, the way other things have been doing. Keep practicing one kick 10,000 times instead of 10,000 kicks once, YouTube Music.

I really enjoy YouTube music, and it's actually a great app for listening to music! I'm not sure if most music app does this, but I especially enjoy my recaps that I get every three months. I'd say the app accurately tracks my listening time. I don't know if it's my headphones, but sometimes my music glitches, and there are often changes to the like button size etc that go back and forth, but I generally don't mind it. I definitely recommend this app to anyone wanting to listen to music!

I use this app every day! I don't think I could do without it! I always need to have music going. I literally can't be still, I have ADHD! Being still can be weirdly painful. Having music going, I can always be dancing and wiggling about. üòÅ Of all the other music apps, this one works best for me! Also, it keeps track of my likes and rarely recommends music that doesn't suit my tastes. I have premium, so there's no adds. Plus, I can lock my phone and still listen to my music!

HONESTLY, I'll never use another music app over this one. You can customize your playlists. If you search a song and click on it, it plays the actual song you searched, instead of a radio of other music that's similar to what you searched for. And if you're willing to pay for premium (it's worth it, on my life) you can do it all without ads AND listen to your fav songs/playlists in the background. This is such a well rounded app. You really can't go wrong

For the last month (maybe longer), I've noticed my volume levels are significantly lower than they used to be. At first I thought it was just me, but this is consistent across my phone speakers, Pixel Buds, and car Bluetooth. Today, I discovered that clicking between songs rapidly results in the same track being played at different volume levels at random. Seriously? I don't know what kind of processing Google added, but there NEEDS to be an option to disable all of it. This is ridiculous.

Recently, I started paying for Premium, because the idea of having my music with my screen off was too appealing. It used to be that I could go my whole work day across several apps with only one press of the play, unless i accidentally closed the app. Now, YT will stop itself not even halfway through the first song. It is a constant battle to hear the song stop, close my current app, open YTM, restart the song, go back to work, listen to maybe 2 songs and start all over. Terrible. Pirate.

YouTube music is my 1st choice when I want to listen to music. I can easily search for any song by title and musician and a very high percentage of time it is available. Most of the time it will play similar music for hours after that selection. However, occasionally the app doesn't recognize any or much related content. The thumbs up and down ratings help the app decide what to play but it doesn't limit it to selections you've rated.

I've had the app about a year now, and I am a YouTube premium member. My favorite things are that (if available), you can see the lyrics or view the video. If you know where to click, you can view info about the album and all the artists' most popular songs (if available.) I don't like if an artist doesn't have an album cover they don't show listed in my Playlists? They deserve to be visibly listed somehow? My music turns off after awhile...? I hate that.

It's an amazing app to use for music and helps download music, but I couldn't find the songs I was looking for. But it does have song recognition, and you're can pick your own songs. Although it doesn't recognize some songs and I hope they fix the app soon, but other than that, I recommend it. Way better than Spotify, Pandora, and other music apps

I've been using YT Music for so long, love the ad-free music, the varieties, and the unlimited playlists you can make and how communitive it can be with AI and other playlists by others. But I've caught this one bug where the suggestion songs aren't playing it's music, instead, all the suggested songs play the first song listed on the playlist. I've tried restarting my phone, closing out of the app and pulling it back up, and refreshing yet nothing has helped.

It WAS great, until almost every song in "autoplay" or shuffle starting playing the clean version of songs. I'm am a 33-year-old grown man. I do not want to hear pauses every few seconds. This is extremely annoying and I saw I'm not the only one. PLEASE fix this ASAP before I cancel my subscription. $15/mo is already too expensive for a music app, especially since I already pay for YouTube Premium and YouTube TV. Very disappointed! Update: talked to a live agent today... trash!!!

This is the only app I'll use simply because I can actually build a library saving specific songs/albums and not just artists. And listen to exactly what I want when I want to, unlike Pandora or Spotify. I've been using this since it was originally Google Play Music. I wish they would make it so you can jump ahead on your artists list instead of endlessly scrolling. As well as organizing your music by genre and not just artists, songs, and Playlists.

PLEASE add an alphabetical feature to playlists!! I had my playlist organized perfectly and I attempted to use the "newest first" option. Terrible idea. My playlist is now completly messed up and the hours I spent organizing are put to waste. This is extremely frustrating. I love using this app for music but this is not helpful. I would sincerely appreciate it if you added the option to order playlists in alphabetical order. It would make things a lot easier for myself and other who prefer this.

I have YouTube Premium, which I only mention to give the most accurate and relevant review. I am not certain of the differences and how they impact the experience between Premium and Non-Premium. That being said, I adore the app. It's easy to navigate and laid out nicely. It's extremely similar to the "normal" YouTube but I love that it's for music only so there's no need to sift through videos that aren't related to music. It's common for there not to be a music video with the songs

I would be TOTALLY LOST without my YouTube music,literally. I have so many Playlists! it's so easy to use i forget alot of the names of songs and so I type in the most ridiculous little exerps from what I can remember and it's almost always able to find exactly what I'm looking for. soooooo much music from every single genre!! I'm not crazy about not being able to download the music to my device however I feel with a paid subscription this should be an availability for sure. other than that, 5‚≠ê

it used to work fine. I've had issues with the UI not responding for 30s-1min when I go to my downloads folder, and my connection works perfectly fine for everything else. lately, the reason why I'm giving it 2 stars, after about 2-10min, the current song/podcast/etc I'm playing will cut out a few times and the app will crash. if this bug doesn't get fixed within the next month, I'm switching back to Spotify. Having to babysit the app to make sure it doesnt crash is game-breaking for me

This music app does it all, as well as having it all. If you want to listen to music your way, your song, any type of way YouTube Music Premium is the way to go. The free version has ads but not introsive and the Premium alittle high but worth it. You could split it, me and my daughter, and really I cannot live without it. They will give you a month trial, give it a try. Playlist , you got it, plays in the back ground, yes any music any way, Your Way. Ty YouTube Music

I'm paying for this service. Its cuts off after every other song. Puts together a playlist but if you dont keep youtube music on screen, it will surely lose connection. Every. Single. Song. I'm not sure what exactly I'm paying for. No other app "loses connection" as often as this and all my other apps are free. This is still owned by Google correct?

I usually have another music streaming services that I use, however I find myself on YouTube Music app more often now. I'm always find artist and music that I like and have never heard before. I love that I can create a playlist just from the vibes of my 'liked' or 'thumbs up' music too. Great suggestions for music. Well worth the price of admission!

worst music streaming platform currently available. the free plan won't let you turn off your phone even like any other streaming service. plays an ad after literally every song. completely awful. almost anything else is better. no ability to sort songs in a Playlist by alphabetical order. no option to search for songs in longer playlists. I can't skip more than 5 songs at a time. nothing, nothing makes this app worth switching to. any of the competition is better.

This WAS my favorite app for podcasts. I go on very long drives for my job, anywhere between 3-8 hours. As of the last 2-3 months, the app continually crashes and closes, especially when attempting to subscribe and follow a new pod. It also refuses to allow me to download the episodes (imperative when driving through mountains). With the latest Samsung Ultra, it alerts me when there are bugs in the app, and it gave me an alert about YTMusic more than a month ago. Where's the update? FIX THIS!

You won't find a better music streaming app. This tops em all. I've spent more hours on this app than probably any other. It's easy to use but still has all of the proper in depth controls, it will download music to its own database while you have service, then allow you to access that music when you don't have service, get the Premium, it's worth it(Unlimited Skips)!

Amazing!!! I been using YouTube Music for years now and never looking back. Personally I hate how all other apps have become one in the same but at least with this app u can find 99% of music you won't be able to find else where and is super easy app to use. Worth the subscription. wish the free version didn't have the ads but other then that 11/10 app in my opinion!

I've been using YouTube music for about 8 years or so and I'm very satisfied with everything. I opted for the $10.99/month subscription so I don't have to listen to all the annoying adds. Money well spent!!! Also with the subscription it allows me to download music and be able to keep it and listen on any of my devices. Even musicians who require royalties for downloading their music üé∂ üéµ üëå A must for true music lovers.

I was originally using the website (on Chromebook), which after a few minutes won't let me click on anything, so I have to constantly refresh the page if I want to change the song. I downloaded the app to see if it would be better, but now the songs just glitch and freeze at random parts, and even makes the screen freeze. Both the website and app wont let me change order of songs in playlist; the website, after refreshing puts it back in the original spot, and the app just wont let you move it.

I used to really like this app but lately it freezes, crashes, & won't let me download music, I press the download button and nothing happens. App is slow to open, can't even access my downloaded music to use offline which is what I mostly use it for when working in places without cell service or driving. I've had this happen before and I had to delete the app which caused me to lose all of my downloads and start over. Seriously frustrating to not be able to open and use the app that I pay for.

YouTube premium has become completely inaccessible to me. I can't access it and was given a free trial after already using the first one. I can't use it or buy a new subscription especially after the two week free experience thing. I can't do anything I could do before on the app anymore. I would like it all fixed so I can resume my subscription.

I pay for this app because I wanted to listen to music while using other apps. It was great at first. But lately when I go to use other apps it'll play for a minute or so then crash. And trying to respond to messages while using it is insufferable because of the audio ducking everytime I type. I've gone over all the settings and I just can't get it to stop.

Seemed great at first because it came with a 2-week free trial of Premium... then went downhill after that expired. Can't listen to songs without endless ads, can't even turn my screen off and keep listening without Premium! Honestly, this is getting to the point where I'm back to using Spotify, of all the streaming services... If you make a streaming platform with a premium plan, at least give the free plan basic features that other platforms have for free.

I still love this app, but there are a few cons, which have me debating whether or not to search for another music app. The shuffle is the worst. It plays "work force blocks" where songs from the same artists get played as a group. I would welcome that as a separate feature, though. Also, YTP seems to randomly sub your picks. You put a 3:00 radio edit on your list, but it's playing the 9:00 Australian Maxi version instead.

Moved to yt music since it replaced Google Play music. Had to pay for a subscription to download my music. Regardless, it has a wide selection of music, and it allows you to download some videos as songs. Otherwise you have ads between songs. I had no issues up until recently, where I am unable to download or delete any downloads. I tried restarting my phone, clearing cache, and checking download settings, but nothing's working. I'm pausing my subscription for now.

I love this app. Great music, easy to use, download songs without issue and smart download saves alot of songs from your downloads as well. Only thing I would change is that the YouTube and YT Music apps combined into one app while saving your search history separate would save phone space and allow multi functionality. Doing so may also allow for YT videos to be played while the phone is locked so you can have only the audio playing through headphones for education, entertainment, etc.

The new music feature is awful. No way to set preferences or opt out of artists you don't like. No way to sort by new singles vs new albums. Every time I open the app I get a pop-up that says "Internet unavailable. See downloaded music" even though it is streaming fine. You can't prevent poor quality YouTube videos from being added to your queue, and they are shoving YouTube shorts down your throat. All enjoyment I receive from this app is in spite of the development teams best efforts.

LOVE ITüíûüíïüíìüíûüíïThe only issue is that every time I change phones I end u getting kicked off the Prime Edition. Last night I spent hours adding new music to my list since I'm starting to go to the gym again. I couldn't after the already hundreds of songs I have on my playlist I could've added 100 more. Every song brings me back to a special time in my life. Great selection and easy to use!! I would rec this music app over any other.

Not sure if YouTube music or Android Auto, but why on earth would you make downloaded songs unable to be found via the YouTube music app in a car? I will never stream music on the go; I'll only listen to downloaded, which now won't show in any options, so I guess I'm not gonna listen to YouTube music on my car anymore. Very poor design. Similar to how the shuffle button was replaced on the main screen by the like button. Dislike that change. Not impressed...

I LOVE YT Music, but some artists have music that isn't even shown on their page! I was trying to listen to a great band's music, The Aubreys, and I THOUGHT I was listening to all their songs, until I realized a whole album wasn't included a few weeks later! You have to look up the exact album and I think it has something to do with the software. Also, when I press the "play next" button and then accidentally click a song so it deletes everything I wanted to play next, it drives me insane!

I pay monthly for no ads and have thousands of songs downloaded onto various play list. The last few months my app has been crashing with literally every song and kicking me out! For the money I pay this is unacceptable. I've updated the app, reinstalled the app, cleared the cache, (my internet is 6 with 4 bars so it's fine), and NONE of it is working. They need to either fix the problem or refund my money. Can't listen to anything without it crashing.

I have been using this app to replace Spotify and I'm thinking of coming back to it at this point. First, the songs on speed dial, on moderate internet speed it doesn't play the next song or there is no option to play the next song, making it inconvenient especially if you want to listen to music. Second, the songs having a low quality of sound for some reason, much worse if they are downloaded. Third, the strong consumption of mobile data, why does 10 MB shoot up to 50 MB so suddenly??

At first this was the BEST app, now every list it makes for me is the same. I have 7 pre-mixed music lists from YouTube that should be different, but no, they gave the exact same songs in the exact same order. I am no longer pleased with the amount of money spent on this and won't be renewing. Later- it still isn't worth what I pay. the playlists freeze up and get stuck on one song... it doesn't move on to "up next". Pauses between songs when it's MOSTLY functioning are way too long.

The app Autoplay feature doesn't work nor does it appear as an option when you're casting music from your phone to a streaming device or speaker so when your playlist is done playing all your songs all your music stops and it's annoying.. like why would you guys mess with this feature there was nothing wrong with it. I have emailed I have went through forms and nobody seems to care or even notice. p.s. everything was working just fine until the end of October

No, seriously- I love YouTube Music, SO MUCH!Usually if the app offers a free version then that's it for me! I can't stand recurring bills lmao but- I must say this app is my one and only exception! It's perfect for me because I'm always "on the move" and it's effortlessly interchangeable between all of my devices.

Went from rating this 5 ‚≠ê last year to 3 this year all because of the podcasts. Though I've been against the integration of podcasts, I'm left with no choice since the google podcast app is closing down. My main qualm is that after listening to just a few minutes of a podcast, now podcasts are the first thing I see when I open the app. Let's not forget, this is YouTube MUSIC not YouTube podcasts. The music should come first, that's why I'm here. Make a separate page for podcasts plz.

Some features of the app were removed and then brought back, which makes me happy. For a while I couldn't slide my finger through the mini player to skip through songs, but I'm so glad that's back. I don't love that my liked music is sometimes interchanged with more 'official' versions, especially since my specific likes are there because of the language they're in. No, I do not want the English version. Some songs that used to have lyrics available suddenly no longer do, which is sad.

Ads are ridiculous. Seriously. I have to click off the ad in 2 separate spots for every single song. It's not very convenient to listen to in the vehicle while going down the road, and the second X that you have to click off the ad to have access to the sound and song control is so hard to see. If the ads continue in this manner, I will most definitely find another way to listen to music. I know I can purchase a subscription to make the ads go away completely, but this is overkill. Seriously.

summary: Join 7M Sudoku players! An offline game to train your brain and stay sharp!

scraped_reviews.content: It's pretty much like every other Sudoku game out there. Missing a feature I wish any of them had (color-marking squares, not just noting). Ads are not as pervasive as other similar apps, but it does do one thing very concerning ‚Äî interrupting your game with an actual Chrome browser pop-up ad. These ads are often the kind that are common scams (such as claiming your device is infected).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback.üíñ We hear youÔºÅWe've passed your thoughts directly to the team. Your input is what helps us make the game better, we truly appreciate youÔºÅ‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: Ads upon ads upon ads. This used to be a good game. Now you are fighting ads more than playing the game. The small ads at the bottom would not be a big deal but they now have sound which is obnoxious when trying to play a game. If you mute one, it does not mute others. There are also full screen ads that slide in in the middle of a game. If you can imagine it, an is going to appear. And this is all happening when you are trying to complete a puzzle in the best time possible. INEXCUSABLE!

Constant ADs: banner ads, before, and after a game as well as whether or not you want extra items. Game functionality is good but the number buttons on the bottom are a bit too small and close together leading to incorrect inputs sometimes especially if you have long nails and likely an issue for larger fingers too. Game on its own is 4.5 stars but ads every other minute (especially if you solve the easier puzzles fast) are WAY too many. They should implement a timer so you can't have too many.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any inconvenience our game may have caused you. Ads are crucial for free games to improve quality. However, we're reducing ad frequency and length to lessen the impact on your experience. Thanks for your understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: The app itself is mostly fine. the issue is that if you want to play a difficulty other than beginner, you have to beat a few games in the easier difficulty. no big deal right? except that after every game you play, and sometimes BEFORE your next game again, you're going to get the most obnoxiously long ads you've ever seen in your life. Some of them I've waited over 10 mins, no x button to exit, no skip, and no way to get past. actually locks the game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're truly sorry our ad closing method caused frustration. Please visit in-game settings > Help Center to contact live support. We'll provide tips on closing ads. Ads typically close in ~30s or proceed. Avoid clicking anything except 'X', right arrow, or Google Play icon! üôè

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: These minute long or multistep ads are horrible. I had to lower my rating to 1 star and will not be playing anymore. I am very upset since I have made it to Grandmaster. I just cant deal with the ads any more. i want to give this more stars. i love the game, but the amount of ads is ridiculous. 1 before every game and 1 after every game, minimum. when you complete puzzles in 2 to 4 mins, you spend more time on ads, then you do playing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback.üíñ We hear youÔºÅWe've passed your thoughts directly to the team. Your input is what helps us make the game better, we truly appreciate youÔºÅ‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: Garbage. Intrusive video ads ruin what's supposed to be a stress-free puzzle experience. They don't tell you about the video ads until after you complete the first introductory puzzle, then they annoyingly end your game after 3 mistakes unless you watch a video ad. I don't see a video ad pop up in my face in real life everytime I guess a wrong number, forcing me to watch it or my game ends. I got a pencil in real life as my continue button. So lame and completely ridiculous.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback! We understand your frustration with the ads. Good news‚Äîyou can actually disable the 3-mistake limit in your game settings! This should help restore that stress-free experience you're looking for. Please check Settings to adjust this feature. Thank you for playing! üíô

scraped_reviews.content: Ads take over the app, at least on my phone (Pixel 7 pro). Even after their timers run out, you can't get rid of them except by clicking on them and hoping they'll be gone by the time you navigate back (they sometimes still stay up). Half of them don't even have mute buttons. Game is solid but not enough to overcome scammy ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inappropriate ad. üôè That should never happen! Please report it to us via the in-game Help Center with a screenshot or the ad's name so we can block it right away. Thank you for your support! üíñ

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy the various difficult levels, progress tracking, scores, and daily challenges. However, this app has been declining. The ads have been getting longer between games. Now, I get links popping up midgame that I am sure are scams like "your device has 3 viruses. click here to clean them" and whatnot. Very bad practice to be allowing that kind of thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inappropriate ad. üôè That should never happen! Please report it to us via the in-game Help Center with a screenshot or the ad's name so we can block it right away. Thank you for your support! üíñ

scraped_reviews.content: This app has gone so downhill. First off, random ads at the bottom of the screen open up browser windows with scams saying "your phone has a virus" and other nonsense like that. This happens without even clicking on the ads. It's terrible and really anoying. Also, other ads at the bottom of the screen start playing music without any way to stop it. You have to force close the app to make the sound stop because just pressing the home button doesnt work. Had this app for years, deleting it now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're truly sorry for the frustrating ad issues, especially the persistent fake virus ads. Our ad department is actively investigating daily but, regrettably, without leads so far. These ads use advanced techniques, making a fix complex and time-consuming. We're doing our best to resolve it and hope you might reconsider us once it's fixed.

scraped_reviews.content: There's a 3 sec timer between ad events. I finish a puzzle, ad. Accept reward & continue to start next puzzle, ad. Pause, ad. Literally back to back ads. Not worth it. I can understand needing ad revenue, but this is pure greed and I'm spending more time waiting to be able to skip ads than I am actually playing the games. There's no fun in wasting this much time. If they had fewer ads it wouldn't have chased me off and they could have continued making money off me. Uninstalling. Now you get $0.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're so sorry for the poor experience. üòî We're already working on adjusting the number and length of ads to minimize the disruption. Thanks for your understanding! üôè‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be a decent game. Nice gameplay, plenty of options, tournaments. Sure, there were ads, but only between games and they were short. The developers have to make something somehow after all. Now however, the ads have gotten longer and longer, and there are now ads popping up in the middle of a game. It has become all but unplayable. If there was a once and done pay option I would take that, but they want you to pay month after month for a simple game. not happening.

I used to love this game but the ads have gotten so bad. I don't mind ads popping up before and after but the new ones don't just have a close button, some require you to view whatever they are promoting in the play store, then return to the game to close the ad. others just take up the whole screen and require closing the app to get past it. I would buy the game outright, but they want a subscription. I'm not paying for a subscription for sudoku. I'll just go purchase a different one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Oh no! ü•∫ We're so sorry the ads are spoiling your fun! Please don't be disappointed in us! üôè Pop into our in-game Help Center and chat with a human agent. We can share some super helpful tips on managing or even turning off those pesky ads for you! We really want you to enjoy playing. ‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: The game itself is good. The app functions as it should. however, the ads are unbearable. The X to close out the ads are often hidden in the extreme corner of the display. The area you have to tap the X is so tiny you often click the ad inadvertently. Also, the app will sporadically launch ads in the middle of the game, often leading to accidentally clicking the ads. It feels more like a scheme to drive clicks to advertisers than anything else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inappropriate ad. üôè That should never happen! Please report it to us via the in-game Help Center with a screenshot or the ad's name so we can block it right away. Thank you for your support! üíñ

scraped_reviews.content: Love the game, just have one small issue; no pun intended. I wish the number buttons were about 25-50% bigger, with more horizontal spacing between them, even if it means it has to wrap down to a second row. Maybe as a UI setting that could be toggled. My gorilla fingers keep hitting multiple numbers causing mistakes and sometimes repeated use of the second chance function. Especially with 1, 2 and 3. I've ruined many a perfect game in the last stretch this way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wow, thank you for taking the time to share your ideasÔºÅüíñ Our community's suggestions are the key to our success, and we've already shared your thoughts with the team. You are a huge part of what makes our game great. We appreciate youÔºÅüåà

scraped_reviews.content: FRAUDULENT DESCRIPTION: The description states the game is ad-free. Not only does it have ads, they are frequent and insanely aggressive: Sit through a minute long and for the same lame cartoonist games, then go to the lame cartoonist games download page on Play Store...by force. Then you can back out and find your way back to the game. If they want to release a game like that, fine, go right ahead. But swindling people to get your game on their devices would be criminal in the real world.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're truly sorry our ads have caused you frustration. That was certainly not our intention. Our ads are designed to be skippable within 30 seconds. For more details or direct assistance, please contact our live support team through the in-game Help Center.

scraped_reviews.content: I like this game. I wish they would have kept the number/letter sudko puzzle that was fun. Maybe add some Samurai Sudoku puzzles. I do have an idea, I like going back to old months and playing the daily challenge to win the trophies, but hitting the back arrow all the way back to 2019 is a lot, then If I leave the game or get a ad I have to hit the back arrow again. My idea is to make it easier to go back and play the old ones.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wow, thank you for taking the time to share your ideasÔºÅüíñ Our community's suggestions are the key to our success, and we've already shared your thoughts with the team. You are a huge part of what makes our game great. We appreciate youÔºÅüåà

scraped_reviews.content: Pure exploitation of ads. There are advertisements between every match. In 15 minutes, you'll have to watch like 5 ads. Most of the ads don't have an option to bypass and will require a click to open the app store for an ad to close. At a market average of $0.02 per impression, that's $0.06-$0.10 per session of gameplay. 100M+ downloads? Yeah, you're pulling absurd amounts of money from excessive ads. Greedy hogs are running the app that requires minimal upkeep.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We're constantly working to improve the game experience. If you've been affected by ads or are unhappy with them, please reach out to our support team via the in-game Help Center. We‚Äôll do our best to assist you. üôè‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: ads ads and more ads. wish I could get through at least 1 sudoku puzzle without getting interrupted by ads. can't even get into the daily puzzle first thing without an ad playing first. then one pops up in the middle of my game and at the end of the puzzle as well. then when I go to start another puzzle I get yet another ad. would not recommend
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're so sorry for the poor experience. üòî We're already working on adjusting the number and length of ads to minimize the disruption. Thanks for your understanding! üôè‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: The ads have become very annoying and sometimes do not show the option to close them to continue with the game after waiting for a long time. They trick the customer to click the ad, and that's not fair and some ads look like spam. I understand that they need ads to be profitable, but the game now forces you to wait a long time watching them. I prefer to close the game after a long ad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inappropriate ad. üôè That should never happenÔºÅPlease report it to us via the in-game Help Center with a screenshot or the ad's name so we can block it right away. Thank you for your supportÔºÅüíñ

scraped_reviews.content: I love the app BUT. The hints on the Android version don't seem to work properly. Rather than giving a hint, it just fills the cell with the correct value so I don't learn why that's the correct value. I've seen this in the Apple version and it's a different experience. Other than that and the ads that take forever, I'm happy with it. The ability to customize the view and settings is great!

scraped_reviews.content: Fun game that I have played for a couple years. The ads are taking over including very intrusive and sketchy ads and pop-ups. Some of which make you restart the game to get rid of. This to me is the definition of profit over customer satisfaction. Update. I have tried to give the game some time to fix the ads issues. It has only got worse in making you go to Play to even close the advertisement. While I understand the need for profits this is by definition deceptive and profit over product.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the inappropriate ad. üôè That should never happen! Please report it to us through the in-game Help Center with a screenshot or the ad's name, so we can block it immediately. Thank you for your support! üíñ

scraped_reviews.content: I recently subscribed which takes away all of the ads. It has made game much faster for me. I play a bit each day and I sometimes wonder if I'm playing the same puzzles over and over again? It seems like the same numbers are left at the end. Same numbers are the easiest to fill--like 9. For just last 2 days it seemed like 1 and 3 were the final numbers at the end of each Extreme game. I think extreme level could be more difficult. Wonder how many Extreme puzzles in total are there?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our puzzles are limitless and endless. Since only a handful of players can solve extreme puzzles, bugs in many puzzles may be difficult to detect. If you encounter duplicate puzzles, please report them to us via the in-game Settings > Help Center (screenshots are appreciated), and we will promptly investigate whether any puzzles are duplicated.

scraped_reviews.content: Not only do u have to deal with Ads ( yes I know getting premium will "solve" the issue) between games, but to have ads WITH SOUND in the middle of a game is ridiculous when there is no mechanism to turn off d sound for the ads that run while u play. No option to skip it either. Having to exit n go back in, to temporarily turn off d sound, is extremely distracting and annoying. Getting out n back in only solves the problem temporarily, as d ad will run again eventually. RE: Sound was off already
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We've removed all ads you encountered during the puzzle-solving process. Please give it a try. If ads still interrupt your experience, let me know and I'll file a complaint to have them taken down.

scraped_reviews.content: the constant flow of ads is so awful. it just mostly sucks the drive to solve the puzzle because you'll be met with an ad at the end of it. luckily I find NordVPN helped so much with the ads. its threat protection feature blocks all ads and it so relieving it makes me play the game and enjoy it for what it is. anyways if ads were on a timer and not event triggered thing then maybe it would be better and I wouldn't have to find a work around

scraped_reviews.content: can't even play the game.. ads won't let you play. I played one Sudoku puzzle and the app will not let you play ever again. I click on it and the ads come up and they want you to download a bunch of other video games. but you won't be able to play a Sudoku game at all. You have to reinstall the game and play the game every single time. otherwise you'll sit there and watch ads. and there's no way to skip the ad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi dear üíñ Sorry for the ad trouble üò¢ Some ads may jump to Google Play ‚Äî in that case, please tap the small Google Play button on the top left, then return to the game and the ad will disappear right away üåà‚ú® Thanks for your support, enjoy the game üíï

scraped_reviews.content: The controls are really annoying. I think that I have selected the number that I want, only to find that i did not. I then get an error for that, to the point that I have to start over. Then, I have to watch an ad either to start over with a new game or with the same game. Win a game, watch some ads. Lose a game, watch some ads. I know that they say that ads are necessary to the game company, but not if it makes people quit playing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I understand your frustration with the controls and errors! To avoid the game ending after mistakes, you can disable the 'Game Over after 3 mistakes' option. Just go to Personal > Settings in the game. This should make your experience smoother! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: ADS ARE RIDICULOUS!!!! Would give 5 stars but with the amount of ads, I'm about to uninstall. finish a game, ad. start a game, ad. check your tournament status, ad. I even get a pop up ad in the middle of the game!!! Everything is so saturated with ads nowadays I actually make a mental note so DON'T get the product!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback.üíñ We hear youÔºÅWe've passed your thoughts directly to the team. Your input is what helps us make the game better, we truly appreciate youÔºÅ‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: Ad-pushing app. starts off slow, but builds to more and more ads you have to wait for to continue from one game to the next. now it's gotten to the point where the "skip/close" button which normally pops up after a few seconds is no longer there. now you HAVE to click the ad which takes you to the Google Play store to download whatever garbage game app is being pushed. and even then, the ad won't close. Uninstalling.

It's sudoku, sure, but the ads are egregious and invasive. An ad to start the game, an ad after finishing a game, an add to get a hint, an ad to get the fast pencil, an ad for loading a previously started game, etc. I'm all for games making money, but throwing 30 second unskippable ads at me every 3 minutes is a big no-no. And that's not even counting for the random pop-ups that open your browser in the middle of playing. I play every day, and now I'm uninstalling. It's that bad.

I play often. You have recently introduced ads that hijack the screen. The only way to end the ad is to "force stop" the app. Occasionally the same ad will pop up again after the force stop, which means that I have to repeat the process. I will be uninstalling this app if this issue is not corrected within the next 48 hours.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: HiÔºÅWe apologize for the trouble. Has the problem been resolvedÔºüIf not, please go to Settings ‚Üí Support ‚Üí Contact Us in the app. Our team will help you directly as soon as possible. Thanks for your supportÔºÅ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: The game was such a good pair for someone looking for a brain puzzle. Easy-on-the-eyes graphics too. But the new updates create a distracting explosive bubbles everytime one line is completed and ends up delaying me to complete the game, especially with the timer. Other than that, the pause button has been minimized to intentionally disable players to pause and keep the timer off. If your updates were meant to crash gamers, then great efforts. Thumbs down, guys üëéüèº. Bottom notch.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We sincerely apologize for the unpleasant experience. Regarding the exploding bubbles and the small close button, I have already relayed this feedback to the product team for improvement. As for the timer, if you prefer not to use it, you can turn it off in the settings. Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention.

scraped_reviews.content: Some improvements were introduced a while ago, and I reviewed accordingly, with 4 stars. However, I had had my suspicions, but it has just been confirmed that when completing the daily challenge on the day, one is not always awarded a hint. Also, I have tried to use the 'multiplier' twice, and on both occasions I was award zero hints. No reward for sitting through yet another ad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for this. We sincerely invite you to report these inappropriate ads through the help center in our app, and we will actively address them. Thank you for your support.

scraped_reviews.content: Great sudoku game, but the ads are obnoxious to the point that I would rather find another game altogether. Starting a game, finishing a game, pausing, resuming, and other actions ALL force you into an ad. They also have optional ads that you can use for hints and such, but those aren't a problem. It really takes me out of the zone whenever I get thrown into an ad, and I usually just wind up closing out of the app entirely.

it used to work fine, but there was a game ad before and after each puzzle. not great, but not awful. now there are ads that are for other items, and you cannot continue past the ad...ever. it just sits on the screen. the game is literally unplayable at this point. not even difficult or annoying, but impossible to play a single puzzle.

The puzzles are great but the ads are just terrible. I understand getting paid but the marathon length of time you have to watch some of them are awful. For some, if you touch the screen, it does a rapid install of what they were advertising so be careful. For the developers. it would be nice to have an option to change the user interface to accommodate larger fingers. I would prefer to have the options of notes and hints at the top of the puzzle to have a larger 3 x 3 number pad to use.

Ads are understandable for a free game. HOWEVER, some ads open browser tabs (even with protections in place and permissions denied). Some ads can be closed right away, annoying but acceptable. While others make you wait for at least 30 seconds only to have another window that makes you wait 10 seconds followed by a third that makes you wait 5 seconds. entirely unacceptable. when those start, I close the game.

this game has done nothing but get worse and worse. I spend 8 minutes solving an 'expert' level puzzle, for what feels like 10 minutes of ads. and the ads have started breaking the game. and you get watch yet another ad.when you have to restart the app. and another app when you pick a game mode. and an ad when you pause. and one when you unpause. the ads themselves aren't skippable and last longer than 30 seconds at a time.

I've had this app for many years and always really liked it. Unfortunately the last month, the ads never turn off and there is not an option to cancel (no "X") and the back arrow does nothing. This means I have to continually shut down the app, open it up again and hope the ads stop popping up so I can play the game, which means often it's now impossible to play. And, no more earning Auto Pencils from watching videos. If these continue, I'll have to delete this and find another Sudoku app.

This app works great. The games are fun and challenging. The interface works great. The problem is, there are constant ads and no option to pay for premium to get rid of them. You finish a level, you get an ad. Pause the game, ad. Start a level, ad. Ads even play in the background (with sound) while you're trying to concentrate. They are so desperate to make you watch a bunch of stupid ads. This is pure greed, and it ruins the experience of the game. I loved this game, but I'm uninstalling it.

used to be good but now it plays an ad after a puzzle and before a puzzle (so two ads in between puzzles) and now they also have pop up ads at the bottom (which didn't bother me at first) and they play sound. do. not. have. in game ads that play sound. not only will they make me never buy whatever they're advertising, it will also make me uninstall the app. I get it. they're trying to get me to subscribe to no ads by putting a ton on there but really that just makes me look for a different app

I used to enjoy the app. Now, there are too many ads. There are ads before and after games, and between the 2 can sometimes last longer than the puzzle itself. There are banner ads while you are solving puzzles. I have grown to accept this from the game. Just today, they have added audio to the banner ads. I listen to youtube or Spotify while I play and have to silence the banner ad every time a new 1 starts. Awful. After 61 hours spent on this app, I am uninstalling and finding a better app.

It started out great. one of the best sudoku apps I've come across. Occasionally, it had an ad, or if you needed a hint, you could watch an ad. That was understandable. Now, I can't start, get through, or finish a puzzle without at least 3 ads. Absolutely garbage. Don't waste your time. Don't download.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for loving our game üíô‚ú® Ads help us keep improving quality üåà But we know they can bother you üò≥ We‚Äôre already adjusting ad length & number to be lighter ‚ú® Thanks for your patience & support üíñ

scraped_reviews.content: I had given us three stars because I play on my phone and that makes the numbers smaller so I would accidentally hit the wrong ones and have to see more ads. I thought I would give it another try. now the ads keep freezing and I have to back out of them and lose whatever progress I've made on the game I was playing. going to give up on this one.

I had previously rated this app 4 stars - I like the game play, and I'd be willing to pay money for it to avoid the ads, but I'm NOT going to subscribe to a sudoku game, ever. Recently, though, audio ads have started playing DURING games, as well as ads being triggered randomly during gameplay. (The audio ads can be muted, but they un-mute themselves after a few seconds.) This really makes the experience unpleasant enough that I'm ditching this app.

Game is fine when you can actually play it, but the ads are crippling. Hit the "x" - it opens a window. Hit the "Close" button - it opens a window. Hit the "Stop" button - this may be hard to believe, but it opens a window. I had to close the app because there was no other way to navigate back to the game without installing another app or buying something from Temu. Uninstalled.

The game itself is fine. They locked the harder levels until you clear a certain amount of levels in the previous difficulty. That wasn't there before since I've had this app on previous devices. I go on and off on it, so suddenly not being able to access the 16x16 chart is quite disappointing, since you have to jump through hoops for it now (clear 3 hard to get Expert difficulty and then clear 5 Expert to get the 16x16).

Trying to do event, finish the first level. Theres an ad, thats cool. Expected even. After finally finishing it theres another ad. Okay i guess. Open my once daily gift for completing the level. Do you want to watch an ad to get 3x the amount? No thanks. HERES ANOTHER AD ANYWAYS. I forced closed the app and thinking that it must have processed that I finished the level, nope. I'm not going to finish another puzzle to watch 3 ads again...

At first I told myself this was a great game because there are so many ads I end up quitting and doing something else with my life. Now I just uninstalled after I got 3 30 second ads after solving a 2 minute puzzle. A subscription for the ad free version is rediculous. Can't even "own" a digital game these days. The ad frequency and type are awful. Forcing you to play games like you're mindless cattle that will go get the game with enough exposure. Pathetic
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're so sorry for the poor experience. üòî We're already working on adjusting the number and length of ads to minimize the disruption. Thanks for your understanding! üôè‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: The game is fun, I like that it has an option to compete against others. my ONE complaint is that I keep playing the same sudoku challenge, same numbers and placements. I've memorised some of the placements. unsure if I've basically played all of the sudoku you have, but there's one in particular that is always reaccuring every day I've played. and I play a lot

Great app. Levels are challenging. Easy levels are great for introducing people to the game. I enjoy the really puzzles. Extra features and pencil feature are smooth and easy to use. I'm not big on the events but that's just me. The ads can be a little annoying due to being given an ad after every level completion, hint, pause, resume, etc. Thankfully they are 5 seconds two or three times. It would be better if you were spared the ads if you solve a without any mistakes.

title: Macy's: shopping & top deals
description: Get the best online shopping deals, discounts, and rewards on the Macy‚Äôs app. Your all-in-one destination for fashion, beauty, home, and more. Find exclusive offers and rewards that make shopping more rewarding. right at your fingertips. The Macy's app is your go-to shopping companion ‚Äì designed to help you unlock amazing savings, shop online and in-store, and manage your account anytime, anywhere. 4 reasons users love the Macy‚Äôs shopping app! 1. Macy‚Äôs Wallet ‚Äì all your offers, and gift cards in one place! 2. Shop Online or In Store ‚Äì scan prices, browse top deals, or get FREE store pickup with in-store inventory access. 3. Macy‚Äôs Pay ‚Äì faster, contactless checkout with your coupons and rewards. 4. Star Rewards ‚Äì Track your points, earn Star Money, and access exclusive member-only sales and bonuses. And there‚Äôs more! Free shipping at $99, exclusive app-only deals, seasonal rewards, and personalized offers help you save on every purchase. Whether you‚Äôre shopping for fashion, jewelry or home must-haves, Macy‚Äôs app brings smart savings and exclusive discounts to your fingertips. MACY‚ÄôS WALLET Store all your rewards, offers, gift cards, and coupons in one place. Get reminders before they expire so you never miss a deal SHOP ONLINE OR IN STORE Check local store inventory, scan barcodes for prices, and explore reviews, colors, and sizes. Can‚Äôt find it in the store? Buy it in-app instantly with free shipping at $99. MACY‚ÄôS PAY Speed through checkout with one QR code that loads your offers and discounts‚Äîonline or in-store. MY MACY‚ÄôS CARD View your Macy‚Äôs Card, track payment history, and schedule payments. Stay signed in for quick access. SHOP THE MACY‚ÄôS RANGE From fashion and beauty to home, shoes, jewelry, and seasonal must-haves‚Äîfind everything in one place. Enjoy exclusive deals and personalized rewards tailored to you. Download the Macy‚Äôs app today for easy and rewarding shopping with app-only discounts, coupons, and deals!

summary: Shop holiday gifts, fashion & home. Save with shopping deals & discounts!

scraped_reviews.content: Lures you in with an offer of 30% discount and then says the item didn't qualify. Then after getting approved for their credit card, it won't auto fill the card number like it states it will. Then you try to fill it in manually, but the email doesn't provide the 3 digit customer security code, so that won't work at all and then you have to go to another totally different payment method and you've just wasted 30 minutes of your life and no discounts!

This is the 3rd time now my favorite list has been deleted. I shop at Macys A LOT like 2-3times a week I buy a new outfit. I spend time saving things in my favorites list putting outfits together. When I make a purchase I unheart the item I purchased. When you delete the item from the favorites list, it deletes everything you saved. This app used to be amazing. This just makes them lose sales. I have read this is happening to others in the reviews as well so I know it's not just my phone.

Only the most absolutely beautiful, highest quality products offered for sale on the Macy's app, at the highest prices. $100 off an item priced at $300, when it should be priced at $100 is not a bargain. Today, with prices higher than they've been since the 1970's, I think wise shoppers will avoid spending their $ frivolously. Sorry, Macy's! Great Products, Terrible Prices!!!

Not bad. Considering how massive Macy's inventory is, this app is pretty impressive. So far, my main gripe is that every time I add or remove an item from the cart, any discount code I applied disappears and I have to enter it again. This could make it easy to forget to reenter it, because I shop online by adding lots of stuff to the cart, deleting, adding, on and on, sometimes for days before I actually place any orders. Otherwise, it's an impressive app. The search function seems to work well.

App has improved a lot over the past year. Much easier to sign in and order. Ordering doesn't appear to take as many clicks and once I put an item in the bag, it let's me "continue shopping" and takes me back to where I left off shopping, which I like--some items leave you at the bag and the you have "go back" to continue shopping which can sometimes take items out of the bag..

Overall, a great app, but it has its quirks. I like the feature of being able to scan an barcode of an item in the store and check the price. This from back when we used to go to physical stores, that is. There are some features that need improvement, such as search, ability to log in without having to enter a password every time, and viewing the items price and description from the previous orders. If these features are added, it would make the shopping and return experience much better!

I've shopped at Macy's from the very beginning, I love Macy's!! I appreciate this app because I'm not always able to shop during normal hours and this way I can shop at my leisure day or night..the ONE thing that drives me absolutely CRAZY is if you 'like' something (or add to your list) and tap the ‚ù§Ô∏è it takes you ALLL the way back to the beginning of your search!! If you can fix that it would make my shopping experience 5 stars!!

I like using the app to browse and order because the closest store to me is 30 miles away. The only thing that I don't like is when I usually change to sort price low-high or high-low it doesn't show all the products. Ex: It might be hundreds, thousands... of items and show only 7, 50, 90... products or so. Other than that simple to use.

With all of the logins and passwords that we have to memorize these days, it is far too unreasonable for this app to force a password login EVERYDAY that you use it. Downloaded the junk and started an account because they make it the only way to track a purchase. Multiple days of 'Processing'...and have to input password every single day you wish to check the status. I promise a 1 star review and an immediate uninstall when my packages arrive!

Love Macy's, love their app. So easy to navigate and find what I want. Check out is a breeze, as it remembers my card number, and all my coupons. My only negative comment about the app is in the product description. if you have your text set somewhat larger than tiny (for old eyes), you can't always see the full description, making me go to the web version to see fabric content and care. Bummer.

No option for zero stars. It is fustrating to use it. It has the credit card info but never able to actually see the summary, transactions, payments. Every single month I have to keep trying to make a payment and cannot see any previous payments or transactions. When using the Search options to look for products, the results are not quite accurate. I do a lot of online shopping and this is not the most friendly app.

Just like everyone else who has left a review, the app would not load for me either. After quite a while of trying to sign in, I gave up on the app, uninstalled it, and went to the website where it let me sign in immediately. For all who are struggling to get it to work, I recommend just doing the same thing I did and save yourself some time. Update: they updated the app, but now I can't add an account to make payments with. I add it, and it loads, then takes me right back to the beginning.

Difficult to shop since it won't allow you to see the different options of items. For example, it shows a sweater in white and there are 6 other colors. If you select a different color, it continues to show the white sweater. I won't order a different color if I can't see what the shade of the other color is. So, I went somewhere else to purchase my items.

This app works fairly well. Searching and filtering work really well, so great job on that! It has the full Macy's selection, which is awesome, and great sales! The app has gotten more stable, so I added a star. Now for the less positive. Making lists in the app does not work great. Package tracking is TERRIBLE. Why they would not allow you to copy a 20 digit ups tracking number, I have no idea. Overall the app works well enough; Macy's can do better.

The Macy's app is easy to use and allows me to make purchases quickly. I love that I can add my coupons before finalizing my order. When a product is no longer available, I wish the app alerts you. I recently tried to purchase something using the app and the product wouldn't get added to my shopping cart. I thought something was wrong and immediately used my laptop to go to the Macy's site only to find out the product was no longer available.

Easy to use. Very convenient. I love it. I use it to browse things I want then go in store to buy it. Also buy online pick up in store is awesome. If something doesn't fit you can return it right there. I would suggest becoming a card holder if you're not one yet as the perks are great and you can see all special offers in the app. Really cool!

How can this app suck this bad in 2023? Can't access statements, can't see recent transactions, continuous Prompts to log in even when logged in. Too many bugs. Do not make payments through the app, they don't go through. I found out the hard way. If you find an item and view it, you'll have to start over completely when you go back to the search.

This app shuts down every time I check the PURCHASES tab. Never fails. There's also no need to initiate a REFUND from within the app. It does NOT speed up the refund process, even if you drop the items off at your local Macy's. In fact, the code wouldn't scan in the store. Thank goodness I had the card I used to make the online purchases. Lots of room for improvement.

I'm more frustrated with customer service. I made a mistake while purchasing an item while the store was closed. I choose standard shipping instead of expedited. I called a few hours later as soon as Macys opened and I was told that everything was ok and that I could change my shipping status. A few hours later, I noticed that I never received a new confirmation email, so I called back only to be told that there is nothing they can do about my shipping. So, becareful shopping between 12a-9a.

The app apparently has a bug in the log in. I've uninstalled the app, added it back, reset the password...still tells me there's an issue with the password. Was on the phone with tech support who was very patient and helpful but could not resolve the issue. I was able to log in using the online website without any issues. Please fix the app! It's how I shop, and manage payments. I missed my payment by a few days due to this error. Same issues reported as other reviewers as well.

Do not buy anything here or if do make sure you actually want to order what you are. They only cancel orders if it's been 30 minutes or less even if they haven't shipped it out yet. Terrible policy. That tells me they value money over customers. Another greedy corporation. And their return policy is 30 day. Other stores is longer. Absolutely wrong of them! I do not recommend.

Overall pretty good. As of right now July 3rd 2020 they are having a whole bunch of sales which is really nice, and on top of that if you are a member they are giving like $10 back for every $50 you are spending. One of the things I like is how if you are purchasing one piece of an outfit when you pick it; it'll directly lead you to the other pieces. Notice it did this for multiple pieces, but not for all. Will update if I notice anything else.

I'm standing under the flickering florescent lights in a mostly vacant Macy's. The one staff person I find has no idea how to add things to a wedding registry. "We used to have a scanner," she says wistfully. I think, "Oh, the app!" I open it. I give it camera permissions. I give it location permissions. I click the barcode scanner. All I get is a warning, "We're having technical difficulties." Same when I try and click anything else. I'm thinking maybe it's time to register somewhere else...

The app runs smoothly but please fix the issue of returning to a start point of a list after clicking on an item (or when removing items, I am returned to top, rather than at next item). Also, I would love the option to be able to save brands and see what new items have been added to them - would save me from a lot of searching! :)

CAUTION! Be careful if making a payment on your due date! I just logged in to make a payment and the default date now pops up for the next day. It's not clear how to change the date. Once you click on the date, you get a pop up message about payment dates, but it isn't clear where tap to open the calendar. (Click name of the month) Shady way to trick late fees out of customers! And if someone has a deferred interest purchase they could get charged for back interest if their payment is late!

Excellent! Pros: save items to a list and get notified when they go on sale. Search function is great - you can really leverage it to get some great deals (show me boots priced between $100 and $200 that are discounted 50% will find boots for $200 normally priced at $400!!). Cons: The displayed list of items is a bit quirky. When you select an item to view details, then go back to the list, it often loses its place, or sometimes resets to the beginning. Very annoying.

No issues with the app. Works well. Easy to navigate. I'd recommend adding anything you may think you want to purchase to your cart, if you exit for any reason before checking out you'll lose it, can easily remove if you decide not to purchase. This way you don't lose the item. Easy to apply your rewards or coupons as long as your logged into your account. Supper fast to check out.

I have ordered from Macy's for years, and if something doesn't work for whatever reason, I send it back (with their return label/provided). I enjoy the things I order, and the process is always being updated to make the entire process easier. If you have a problem there is a customer service # available for your convenience. They are my go-to store!

Frustrating website. Clearly older software that remembers VERY old accounts, interactions literally from a past life of mine. Tried to order a wallet to the store for Christmas. Showed up two weeks after and they would only hold for 6 days! Ridiculous Reordered with the cost being $20 higher. I laughed out loud, because it told me I had this wallet in stock at my local store! Like gee I wonder how that got there?? Never ever will I pick up from the store because it delays the product!

The consumer experience on this app is the worst... you select filters, it still shows you everything, it crashes and freezes all the time. I uninstalled it for a while hoping updates would make it better, but nope.. I don't understand how such a big company doesn't have a solid Product and IT department and doesn't prioritize the digital customer experience which shoukd be key to the bread and butter of the organization.

I have never been this disappointed eith Macy's as much as I have this past Christmas. So, I purchased MK 3-Suit sport jackets on Macy's website at a very good price, apparently their size are a lot smaller than other brands. Now, the issue with Macy's is, when I wanted to change it just to change the size only, apparently they don't accept size change even at the actual store, they can only take a return and you have to repurchase the items. Now the price are back to reg price. Unfair policy!

This app is a waste of time. It never filters correctly, it won't tell what's actually in stock in your store altho it says it will & now tonight they text me re: a 6 hr flash sale but it won't add anything to my cart due to a "technical error". But it's just in that section! Go into any other page via the home button they add fine, but you can't get to the flash sale items! Every time I try to use the app or website there's something basic that's broken. I'm over it.

I want to use the app to manage my Macy's card, but the app is completely broken. The only thing it will allow me to do is make payments. It won't allow me to view the summary, transactions, post payments, or even access settings. Trying to view any of these things results in an endless loop of being asked to log in, even though I'm logged in already. Please fix this bug. Totally unacceptable.

It makes shopping a breeze & unfortunately almost addictive. Nice easy way to keep track of your points & any sales going on. It's a great way to use your money wisely, while still buying a high quality products semi-regularly with a great sale! I've even used the app to find sales & then go into the store to try things on I see on the app. #LovesIt!!!!

I don't shop often at macy's, but when I do, I use this app and save a boat-load! Being tied into PayPal makes it even more convenient. If I have to get up and fish for my credit card, I typically will think a little bit more about my purchase and might decide to ignore my shipping basket. But by having PayPal partnered with your app, I just hit PayPal to pay, and it's done! Thanks up much for an easy to use app!

The app only goes back 2 years of purchase history. Also, no shipping info just shows shipped but no tracking. Get charged if want to return items unless you're a star rewards member, is free if return to store, closest to me is in a mall, no thx, behind the times. No wonder they losing sales to Amazon. Positive is they sale good quality items on app.

You can only see your credit account summary. You cannot see any "recent card activity". You get a pop up that says something to the effect that "sorry this information not available". Definitely it Ely needs fixed. As of 9/27/19 this app doesn't recognize my credentials and I can't log on!!!! Completely worthless now. I have to use a desktop to shop or pay my bill or check order status. Junk.

Troubles with my name associated with another aact. Called Custmer Service a couple of times, and I believe it was IT that helped me solve the problem! I tried to place an order, unrelated to the last problem, and it was delayed. Your site was having difficulty. A couple of days later, I was able to get through. However, On of the dresses was unavailable, d/t the delay. Just a heads up! Good luck!

The app is not recognizing my "credentials". This is quite frustrating since I can go online with the same user information which had worked for me in the past. The error was resolved. I actually love this app. I am able to see the balance of my credit card, price items, make lists, make purchases see my prior purchases in store and online and track my purchases. I am on it practically every day. Good job developers.

I find the best deals on Macy's every time I shop the website. It's convenient, the selection is huge and I always find my size in everything. The customer service is top notch as well; the only time I've ever had a complaint was when they refused to accept return of a bracelet because it was "not in condition for sale" when I returned it. Of course it wasn't, but it was that way when I received it (and why I returned it!)

There is a glitch when checking out that would scroll up whenever you tried to scroll down and select your state. And another when trying to checkout with PayPal. It would start to redirect and keep loading. So the only way I was able to checkout was by using Google Pay. Also, it's advertised that you get 25% off your first purchase using the app, NEVER happened, that was the only reason I got the app in the first place.

This company has no idea how to do online sales. Their service is the worst. Over one month just to do a simple return of an item received damaged. The app and store don't work together. The return labels don't print from your phone. The chat is a non-human bot. It doesn't keep track of your purchases properly. Can't write reviews. The worst app ever. Total Yuck

Macy‚Äôs is my go to for fashion and deals! The app makes browsing easy with a great selection. My experience has been great, from placing orders to fast deliveries. Occasionally, items aren‚Äôt exactly as expected, but the return process is simple and hassle free, giving me confidence when shopping. Customer service is always helpful. I appreciate how Macy‚Äôs keeps online shopping smooth and convenient. I‚Äôll definitely keep coming back!

"Attention! There was an issue with our connection and we were unable to schedule your payment." Pops on my screen when I try to submit payment. I cannot tell you the number of times I have had errors with the app conveniently centered around bill payment. I used to work for Macy‚Äôs as a manager and would frequently have upset customers complain in store about the app. I ended up telling customers to pay their bills in store because the app was so unreliable.

Ordering is bad. Macy's gives you a tracking number but. They have you download their app so you can shop through the store again . There is no track my package. Really pisses you off. First you buy something then to track package told to download Macy's store app to track package.But there's no tracking its shopping again. Macys fix this. It should be the first thing there. We already shopped. We don't want to stay on this thing all day. Probably the last time I shop Macy's

It has lots of glitches still. I can't get my statements or payment activity but they make sure you can buy stuff. I literally can't access any details just buy and pay. This is a terrible app. I wrote that exactly a year ago January 15th 2021 and I literally still have the same issue after updating the app they need to be sued for this!! I definitely feel like this is cause for a class action lawsuit.

Easy to use, swift shopping, love honest reviews. I love to shop the sales and the Checkout is so convenient. I shop online for about 95% of my purchases, but I think that this app would be easy for those new to the online experience. My only concern is dealing with your return process. Invoices, looking up orders not paid by my Macy's card, why so complicated? On all other sites you just press "Print", you receive a label, and send back your item with the receipt.

Macys lures you by telling you'll get 25% off your 1st purchase after you download the app... thats pretty big lie. They tell your discount will be applied to your cart once you've made a selection. Well, I did exactly that. I made a selection, put it in my cart to then find out it dosent qualify...lol. Macys wasted a half hour of my time and patience. This type of antiquated marketing is exactly why Macy's is shutting down their stores left and right.They just lost my future business.

Absolutely ridiculous!
